meaning: प॒वित्रे॑ स्थो वैष्णव्यौ । स॑वि॒तुर्वः॑ प्रस॒व उत्पु॑ना॒म्यच्छि॑द्रेण प॒वित्रे॑ण॒ सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिभिः॑ । अनि॑भृष्टमसि वा॒चो बन्धु॑स्तपो॒जाः सोम॑स्य दा॒त्रम॑सि॒ स्वाहा॑ राज॒स्वः॑ ।।

text:
Sharers in joy are these majestic Waters, inviolate, industrious,
 investing.
 In these as homes hath Varuna made his dwelling, he, Child
 of Waters, in the best of mothers.
meaning: स॑ध॒मादो॑ द्यु॒म्निनी॒राप॑ ए॒ता अना॑धृष्टा अप॒स्यो॒ वसा॑नाः । प॒स्त्या॑सु चक्रे॒ वरु॑णः स॒धस्थ॑म॒पाँ शिशु॑र्मा॒तृत॑मास्व॒न्तः ।।

text:
Thou art the inner caul of princely power, Thou art the
 outer caul of princely power. Of princely power thou art
 the womb, the navel.
 Thou art the Vritra-slaying arm of Indra. Mitra's art thou,
 thou Varuna's possession. With thee to aid may this man
 slaughter Vritra.
 Cleaver art thou; thou Render; thou art Shaker. Protect
 him ye in front, protect him rearwards; protect him sidewards;
 from all quarters guard him.
meaning: क्ष॒त्रस्योल्व॑मसि । क्ष॒त्रस्य॑ ज॒राय्व॑सि । क्ष॒त्रस्य॒ योनि॑रसि । क्ष॒त्रस्य॒ नाभि॑रसि । इन्द्र॑स्य॒ वात्र॑घ्नम् । मि॒त्रस्या॑सि॒ वरु॑णस्यासि । त्वया॒यं वृ॒त्रं ब॑धेत् । दृ॒वासि॑ । रु॒जासि॑ । क्षु॒मासि॑ । पातैनं॒ प्राञ्च॑म् । पातैनं प्र॒त्यञ्च॑म् । पातैनं ति॒र्यञ्चं॑ दि॒ग्भ्यः पा॑त ।।

text:
Visible, O ye men, Informed is Agni, Master of the House.
 hold. Informed is Indra of exalted glory. Informed are
 Mitra-Varuna, Law-Maintainers. Informed is Pûshan, Lord
 of all Possessions. Informed are Heaven and Earth, the
 All-propitious. Informed is Aditi who gives wide shelter.
meaning: आ॒विर्म॑याः । आवि॑त्तो अ॒ग्निर्गृ॒हप॑तिः । आवि॑त्त॒ इन्द्रो॑ वृ॒द्धश्र॑वाः । आवि॑त्तौ मि॒त्रावरु॑णौ धृ॒तव्र॑तौ । आवि॑त्तः पू॒षा वि॒श्ववे॑दाः । आवि॑त्ते॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी वि॒श्वश॑म्भुवौ । आवि॒त्तादि॑तिरु॒रुश॑र्मा ।।

text:
Appeased by sacrifice are biting creatures, Ascend the East.
 May Gâyatrî protect thee, the psalm Rathantara, the
 triple praise-song, the season Spring, and the rich treasure,
 Priesthood.
meaning: अवे॑ष्टा दन्द॒शूकाः॑ । प्राची॒मा रो॑ह गाय॒त्री त्वा॑वतु रथन्त॒रँ साम॑ त्रि॒वृत्स्तोमो॑ वस॒न्त ऋ॒तुर्ब्रह्म॒ द्रवि॑णम् ।।

text:
Ascend the South. Be thy protectors Trishtup, the Brihat
 Sâman, the fifteenfold praise-song, the Reason Summer,
 and the treasure Kingship.
meaning: दक्षि॑णा॒मा रो॑ह त्रि॒ष्टुप्त्वा॑वतु बृ॒हत्साम॑ पञ्चद॒श स्तोमो॑ ग्री॒ष्म ऋ॒तुः क्ष॒त्रं द्रवि॑णम् ।।

text:
Ascend the West. May Jagatî protect thee, the psalm Vairûpa,
 the seventeenfold praise-song, the Rain-time, and
 that store of wealth, the People.
meaning: प्र॒तीची॒मा रो॑ह॒ जग॑ती त्वावतु वैरू॒पँ साम॑ सप्तद॒श स्तोमो॑ व॒र्षा ऋ॒तुः विड्द्रवि॑णम् ।।

text:
Ascend the North. Thy guardians be Anushtup, Vairâja
 psalm, the twenty-onefold praise-song, the season
 Autumn, that rich treasure Fruitage.
meaning: उदी॑ची॒मा रो॑हानु॒ष्टुप्त्वा॑वतु वैरा॒जँ सामै॑कविँ॒श स्तोमः॑ श॒रदृ॒तुः पलं॒ द्रवि॑णम् ।।

text:
Ascend the Zenith. Pankti be thy keeper, Sâkvara, Raivata
 the pair of Sâmans,
 Praise-songs the thirty-threefold and thrice-ninefold, both
 seasons, Winter, Dews, that treasure lustre.
 The head of Namuchi hath been cast from me.
meaning: ऊ॒र्ध्वामा रो॑ह प॒ङ्क्तिस्त्वा॑वतु शाक्वररैव॒ते साम॑नी त्रिणवत्रयस्त्रिँशौ॒ स्तोमौ॑ हेमन्तशिशि॒रावृ॒तू वर्चो॒ द्रवि॑णम् । प्रत्य॑स्तं॒ नमु॑चेः॒ शिरः॑ ।।

text:
Brilliance of Soma art thou, may my brilliance grow like thine.
 Save me from death. Vigour art thou, victory, everlasting life.
meaning: सोम॑स्य॒ त्विषि॑रसि॒ तवे॑व मे॒ त्विषि॑र्भूयात् । मृ॒त्योः पा॑हि । ओजो॑ सि॒ सहो॑ स्य॒मृत॑मसि ।।

text:
With golden bodies, at the flush of morning, ye rise on
 high, two Sovran Lords, and Sûrya.
 Ascend your car, O Varuna and Mitra: thence view infinity
 and limitation.
 Thou art Mitra, thou art Varuna.
meaning: हिर॑ण्यरूपा उ॒षसो॑ विरो॒क उ॒भावि॑न्द्रा॒ उदि॑थः॒ सूर्य॑श्च । आ रो॑हतं वरुण मित्र॒ गर्तं॒ तत॑श्चक्षाथा॒मदि॑तिं॒ दितिं॑ च । मि॒त्रो॑ सि॒ वरु॑णो सि ।।

text:
Thee with the strength of Soma, Agni's lustre, with Sûrya's
 splendour, Indra's might I sprinkle.
 Be Lord of princes: safe past arrows guard him.
meaning: सोम॑स्य त्वा द्यु॒म्नेना॒भिषि॑ञ्चाम्य॒ग्नेर्भ्राज॑सा॒ सूर्य॑स्य॒ वर्च॒सेन्द्र॑स्येन्द्र�ण॑ । क्ष॒त्राणां॑ क्ष॒त्रप॑तिरे॒ध्यति॑ दि॒द्यून्पा॑हि ।।
इ॒मं दे॑वा असुप॒त्नँ सु॑वध्वं मह॒ते क्ष॒त्राय॑ मह॒ते ज्यै॑ष्ठ्याय मह॒ते जान॑राज्या॒येन्द्र॑य॑ । इ॒मम॒मुष्य॑ पु॒त्रम॒मुष्यै॑ पु॒त्रमस्यै वि॒श ए॒ष वो॑ मी॒ राजा॒ सोमो॒ स्माकं॑ ब्राह्म॒णानाँ॒ राजा॑ ।।

text:
Forth from the summit of the bull, the mountain, pouring
 spontaneously, the ships keep moving.
 They, lifted up, have turned them back and downward, still
 flowing onward, after Ahibudhnya.
 Thou art the stepping-forth of Vishnu: thou art Vishnu's
 outstep; Vishnu's step art thou.
meaning: प्र पर्व॑तस्य वृष॒भस्य॑ पृ॒ष्ठान्नाव॑श्चरन्ति स्व॒सिच॑ इया॒नाः । ता आव॑वृत्रन्नध॒रागुद॑क्ता॒ अहिं॑ बु॒ध्न्य॒मनु॑ रीयमाणाः । विष्णो॑र्वि॒कर्म॑णमसि । विष्णो॒र्विक्रा॑न्तमसि । विष्णोः॑ क्रा॒न्तम॑सि ।।

text:
Prajâpati, thou only comprehendest all these created forms,
 and none beside thee.
 Give us our heart's desire when we invoke thee. So-and-So's
 father is this man. Sire of this man is So-and-So.
 May we—All-hail!—be lords of rich possessions.
 What active highest name thou hast, O Rudra, therein thou
 art an offering, art an offering at home. All-hail!
meaning: प्रजा॑पते॒ न त्वदे॒तान्य॒न्यो विश्वा॑ रू॒पाणि॒ परि॒ ता ब॑भूव । यत्का॑मास्ते जुहु॒मस्तन्नो॑ अस्तु । अ॒यम॒मुष्य॑ पि॒तासाव॒स्य पि॒ता । व॒यँ स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाँ स्वाहा॑ । रुद्र॒ यत्ते॒ क्रिवि॒ परं॒ नाम॒ तस्मि॑न्हु॒तम॑स्यमे॒ष्टम॑सि॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Indra's bolt art thou. I by the direction of Mitra-Varuna,
 Directors, yoke thee.
 I, the uninjured Arjuna, mount thee for firmness, thee for food.
 By quickening of the Maruts be thou victor. May we obtain
 by mind: with power united.
meaning: इन्द्र॑स्य॒ वज्रो॑ सि । मि॒त्रावरु॑णयोस्त्वा प्रशा॒स्त्रोः प्र॒शिषा॑ युनज्मि । अव्य॑थायै त्वा स्व॒धायै॒ त्वारि॑ष्टो॒ अर्जु॑नः । म॒रुतां॑ प्रस॒वेन॑ जय । आपा॑म॒ मन॑सा । समि॑न्द्रि॒येण॑ ।।

text:
Let us not, Indra, conqueror of the mighty, unfit through
 lack of prayer fail to obtain thee.
 Ascend the car which thou whose hand bears thunder
 controllest, and the reins with noble horses.
meaning: मा त॑ इन्द्र ते व॒यं तु॑राषा॒डयु॑क्तासो अब्र॒ह्मता॒ विद॑साम । तिष्ठा॒ रथ॒मधि॒ यं व॑ज्रह॒स्ता र॒श्मीन्दे॑व युवसे॒ स्वश्वा॑न् ।।

text:
All hail to Agni, Master of the Household! All-hail to Soma,
 Sovran of the Forest!
 All-hail to the great vigour of the Maruts! All-hail to the
 effectual might of Indra!
 Injure me not, O Mother Earth, and may I never injure thee.
meaning: अ॒ग्नये॑ गृ॒हप॑तये॒ स्वाहा॑ । सोमा॑य॒ वन॒स्पत॑ये॒ स्वाहा॑ । म॒रुता॒मोज॑से॒ स्वाहा॑ । इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒याय॒ स्वाहा॑ । पृथि॑वि मात॒र्मा मा॑ हिँसी॒र्मो अ॒हं त्वाम् ।।

text:
The Hamsa throned in light, the Vasu in mid-air, the
 Priest beside the altar, Guest within the house,
 Dwelling in noblest place, mid men, in truth, in sky, born
 of flood, kine, truth, mountain, be is mighty Law.
meaning: हँ॒सः शु॑चि॒षद्वसु॑रन्तरिक्ष॒सद्धोता॑ वेदि॒षदति॑थिर्दुरोण॒सत् । नृ॒षद्व॑र॒सदृ॑त॒सद्व्यो॑म॒सद॒ब्जा गो॒जा ऋ॑त॒जा अ॑द्रि॒जा ऋ॒तं बृ॒हत् ।।

text:
So great art thou: life art thou; give me life,
 Mate art thou: thou art splendour; give me splendour.
 Strength art thou: give me strength. I draw you downward,
 two arms of Indra mighty in achievement.
meaning: इय॑द॒स्यायु॑र॒स्यायु॒र्मयि॑ धेहि॒ युङ्ङ॑सि॒ वर्चो॑ सि॒ वर्चो॒ मयि॑ धेहि । ऊर्ग॒स्यूर्जं॒ मयि॑ धेहि । इन्द्र॑स्य वां वीर्यकृ॒तो बा॒हू अ॑भ्यु॒पाव॑ हरामि ।।

text:
Fair art thou, good to sit on, womb of kingship.
 Sit on the fair one, sit on that which offers a pleasant seat:
 sit in the womb of kingship.
meaning: स्यो॒नासि॑ सु॒षदा॑सि । क्ष॒त्रस्य॒ योनि॑रसि । स्यो॒नामा सी॑द सु॒षदा॒मा सी॑द क्ष॒त्रस्य॒ योनि॒मा सी॑द ।।

text:
Varuna, Law's maintainer, hath sat down among his people, he
 Most wise, for universal sway.
meaning: नि ष॑साद घृ॒तव्र॑तो॒ वरु॑णः प॒स्त्या॒स्वा । साम्रा॑ज्याय सु॒क्रतुः॑ ।।

text:
Supreme Lord art thou. May these five regions of thine be
 prosperous. Brahman! Thou art Brahman, Savitar art
 thou, faithful in impulsion, Varuna art thou, he whose
 power is real. Indra art thou, whose strength is of the
 people. Rudra art thou, the very kind and gracious.

Doer of much, Improver, Wealth-increaser!
 Indra's holt art thou. Be therewith my vassal.
meaning: अ॑भि॒भूर॑स्ये॒तास्ते॒ पञ्च॒ दिशः॑ कल्पन्ताम् । ब्रह्मँ॒स्त्वं ब्रह्मा॑सि सवि॒तासि॑ स॒त्यप्र॑सवः । वरु॑णो सि सत्यौजाः । इन्द्रो॑ सि॒ विशौ॑जाः । रु॒द्रो सि॑ सु॒शेवः॑ । बहु॑कार॒ श्रेय॑स्कर॒ भूय॑स्कर । इन्द्र॑स्य॒ वज्रो सि॒ तेन॑ मे रध्य ।।

text:
May spacious Agni, Lord of Duty, gladly, vast Agni, Duty's
 Lord, accept the butter. All-hail!
 Hallowed by Svâhâ, with the beams of Sûrya, strive for his
 central place among the kinsmen.
meaning: अ॒ग्निः पृ॒थुर्धर्म॑ण॒स्पति॑र्जुषा॒णो अ॒ग्निः पृ॒थुर्धर्म॑ण॒स्पति॒राज्य॑स्य वेतु॒ स्वाहा॑ । स्वाहा॑कृताः॒ सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिबि॑र्यतध्वँ सजा॒तानां॑ मध्य॒मेष्ठ्या॑य ।।

text:
I creep forth urged onward by Savitar the Impeller; by
 Sarasvatî, Speech; by Tvashtar, created forms; by Pûshan,
 cattle; by this Indra; by Brihaspati, Devotion; by
 Varuna, Power; by Agni, Brilliance; by Soma, the King;
 by Vishnu the tenth Deity.
meaning: स॑वि॒त्रा प्र॑सवि॒त्रा सर॑स्वत्या वा॒चा त्वष्ट्रा॑ रूपैः पू॒ष्णा प॒शुभि॒रिन्द्रे॑णा॒स्मे बृह॒स्पति॑ना॒ ब्रह्म॑णा॒ वरु॑णेनौजसा॒ग्निना॒ तेज॑सा॒ सोमे॑न॒ राज्ञा॒ विष्णु॑ना दश॒म्या दे॒वत॑या॒ प्रसू॑तः॒ प्र स॑र्पामि ।।

text:
Get dressed for the Asvins. Get dressed for Sarasvatî:
 Get dressed for Indra the Good Deliverer:
 Soma the Wind, purified by the strainer, Indra's meet
 friend, hath gone o’erflowing backward.
meaning: अ॒श्विभ्यां॑ पच्यस्व । सर॑स्वत्यै पच्यस्व । इन्द्रा॑य सु॒त्राम्णे॑ पच्यस्व । वा॒युः पू॒तः प॒वित्रे॑ण प्र॒त्यङ्क्सोमो॒ अति॑स्रुतः । इन्द्र॑स्य॒ युज्यः॒ सखा॑ ।।

text:
What then? As men whose fields are full of barley reap
 the ripe corn, removing it in order,
 So bring the food of these men, bring it hither, who pay
 the Sacred Grass their spoken homage.
 Taken upon a base art thou. Thee for the Asvins.
 Thee for Sarasvatî, and thee for Indra, for the Excellent
 Protector.
meaning: कु॒विद॒ङ्ग यव॑मन्तो व॒यं चि॒द्यथा॒ दान्त्य॑नुपू॒र्वं वि॒यूय॑ । इ॒हेहै॑षां कृणुहि॒ भोज॑नानि॒ ये ब॒र्हिषो॒ नम॑उक्तिं॒ यज॑न्ति । उ॑पया॒मगृ॑हीतो स्य॒श्विभ्यां॑ त्वा॒ सर॑स्वत्यै॒ त्वेन्द्रा॑य त्वा सु॒त्राम्णे॑ ।।

text:
Ye Asvins, Lords of Splendour, drank full draughts of
 grateful Soma juice,
 And aided Indra in his deeds with Namuchi of Asura birth.
meaning: व॒यँ सु॒राम॑मश्विना॒ नमु॑चावासु॒रे सचा॑ । वि॑पिपा॒ना शु॑भस्पती॒ इन्द्रं॒ कर्म॑स्वावतम् ।।

text:
As parents aid a son, both Asvins aided thee, Indra, with
 their wondrous powers and wisdom.
 When thou with might hadst drunk the draught that
 gladdens, Sarasvatî, O Bounteous Lord, refreshed thee.
meaning: पु॒त्रमि॑व पि॒तरा॑व॒श्विनो॒भेन्द्रा॒वथुः॒ काव्यै॑र्दँ॒सना॑भिः । यत्सु॒रामं॒ व्यपि॑बः॒ शची॑भिः॒ सर॑स्वती त्वा मघवन्नभिष्णक् ।।

text:
HARNESSING, first of all, the mind, Savitar having stretched
 the thought
 With reverent look upon the light of Agni bore them up
 from earth.
meaning: यु॑ञ्जा॒नः प्र॑थ॒मं मन॑स्त॒त्वाय॑ सवि॒ता धिय॑म् । अ॒ग्नेर्ज्योति॑र्नि॒चाय्य॑ पृथि॒व्या अध्याभ॑रत् ।।

text:
By impulse of God Savitar we with our spirit harnessed strive
 With might to win the heavenly.
meaning: यु॒क्तेन॒ मन॑सा व॒यं दे॒वस्य॑ सवि॒तुः स॒वे । स्व॒र्ग्या॑य॒ शक्त्या॑ ।।

text:
Savitar, having harnessed Gods who go to light and heavenly
 thought,
 Who will create the lofty light—Savitar urge them on their
 way!
meaning: यु॒क्त्वाय॑ सवि॒ता दे॒वान्त्स्व॑र्य॒तो धि॒या दिव॑म् । बृ॒हज्ज्योतिः॑ करिष्य॒तः स॑वि॒ता प्र सु॑वाति॒ तान् ।।

text:
The priests of him the lofty priest well skilled in hymns,
 harness their spirit, yea, harness their holy thoughts.
 He only, skilled in rules, assigns their priestly tasks. Yea,
 lofty is the praise of Savitar the God.
meaning: यु॒ञ्जते॒ मन॑ उ॒त यु॑ञ्जते॒ धियो॒ विप्रा॒ विप्र॑स्य बृह॒तो वि॑प॒श्चितः॑ । वि होत्रा॑ दधे वयुना॒विदेक॒ इन्म॒ही दे॒वस्य॑ सवि॒तुः परि॑ष्टुतिः ।।

text:
I yoke with prayer your ancient inspiration: may the laud
 rise as on the prince's pathway.
 All Sons of the Immortal One shall hear it, who have resorted
 to celestial dwellings.
meaning: यु॒जे वां॒ ब्रह्म॑ पू॒र्व्यं नमो॑भि॒र्वि श्लोक॑ एतु प॒थ्ये॑व सू॒रेः । शृ॒ण्वन्तु॒ विश्वे॑ अ॒मृत॑स्य पु॒त्रा आ ये धामा॑नि दि॒व्यानि॑ त॒स्थुः ।।

text:
Even he, the God whose going forth and majesty the other
 Deities have followed with their might,
 He who hath measured the celestial regions out by his great
 power, he is the Courser Savitar.
meaning: यस्य॑ प्र॒याण॒मन्व॒न्य इद्य॒युर्दे॒वा दे॒वस्य॑ महि॒मान॒मोज॑सा । यः पार्थि॑वानि विम॒मे स एत॑शो॒ रजाँ॑सि दे॒वः स॑वि॒ता म॑हित्व॒ना ।।

text:
Our sacrifice, God Savitar! speed forward: speed to his share
 the sacrifice's patron.
 May the celestial Gandharva, Cleanser of thought and will,
 make clean our thoughts and wishes.
 The Lord of Speech sweeten the words we utter!
meaning: देव॑ सवितः॒ प्र सु॑व य॒ज्ञं प्र सु॑व य॒ज्ञप॑तिं॒ भगा॑य । दि॒व्यो ग॑न्ध॒र्वः के॑त॒पूः केतं॑ नः पुनातु वा॒चस्पति॒र्वाचं॑ नः स्वदतु ।।

text:
God Savitar, speed this God-loved sacrifice of ours,
 friend-finding, ever-conquering, winning wealth and heaven.
 Speed praise-song with the sacred verse, Rathantara with
 Gâyatra, Brihat that runs in Gâyatra. All-hail!
meaning: इ॒मं नो॑ देव सवितर्य॒ज्ञं प्र ण॑य देवा॒व्यँ॑ सखि॒विदँ॑ सत्रा॒जितं॑ धन॒जितँ॑ स्व॒र्जित॑म् । ऋ॒चा स्तोमँ॒ सम॑र्धय गाय॒त्रेण॑ रथन्त॒रं बृ॒हद्गा॑य॒त्रव॑र्तनि॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
By impulse of God Savitar I take thee, with arms of Asvins,
 with the hands of Pûshan, in Angiras’ manner, with
 Gâyatrî metre.
 From the earth's seat bring thou Purîshya Agni, as Angiras
 was wont, with Trishtup metre.
meaning: दे॒वस्य॑ त्वा सवि॒तुः प्र॑स॒वे॒ श्विनो॑र्बा॒हुभ्यां॑ पू॒ष्णो हस्ता॑भ्याम् । आ द॑दे गाय॒त्रेण॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत्पृ॑थि॒व्याः स॒धस्था॑द॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वदा भ॑र त्रैष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् ।।

text:
Spade art thou; woman art thou. Ours be power with thee
 to dig out Agni in his dwelling, as Angiras was wont, with
 Jagatî metre.
meaning: अभ्रि॑रसि॒ नार्य॑सि॒ त्वया॑ व॒यम॒ग्निँ श॑केम॒ खनि॑तुँ स॒धस्थ॒ आ जाग॑तेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् ।।

text:
Savitar, bearing in his hand the gold spade which he took
 therewith,
 Looking with reverence on the light of Agni, raised it from
 the earth,
 With the Anushtup metre and as Angiras was wont to do.
meaning: हस्त॑ आ॒धाय॑ सवि॒ता बिभ्र॒दभ्रिँ॑ हिर॒ण्ययी॑म् । अ॒ग्नेर्ज्योति॑र्नि॒चाय्य॑ पृथि॒व्या अध्या भ॑र । आनु॑ष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् ।।

text:
Run hither, urged to speed, O Horse, along the most extended
 space.

Thy loftiest birthplace is in heaven. thy navel is in air's
 mid-realm, the womb that bare thee is on earth.
meaning: प्रतू॑र्तं वाजि॒न्ना द्र॑व॒ वरि॑ष्ठा॒मनु॑ स॒म्वत॑म् । दि॒वि ते॒ जन्म॑ पर॒मम॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ तव॒ नाभिः॑ पृथि॒व्यामधि॒ योनि॒रित् ।।

text:
Upon this course, O lords of wealth, harness; ye twain, the
 Ass who bears
 Agni, and kindly favours us.
meaning: यु॒ञ्जाथाँ॒ रास॑भं यु॒वम॒स्मिन्यामे॑ वृषण्वसू । अ॒ग्निं भर॑न्तमस्म॒युम् ।।

text:
In every need, in every race we call, as friends, to succour us,
 Indra, the mightiest of all.
meaning: योगे॑योगे त॒वस्त॑रं॒ वाजे॑वाजे हवामहे । सखा॑य॒ इन्द्र॑मू॒तये॑ ।।

text:
Come speeding on and trampling imprecations; come
 gladdening to the chieftainship of Rudra.
 Speed through the wide air thou whose paths are pleasant,
 with Pûshan for thy mate, providing safety.
meaning: प्र॒तूर्व॒न्नेह्य॑व॒क्राम॒न्नश॑स्तो रु॒द्रस्य॒ गाण॑पत्यं मयो॒भूरेहि॑ । उ॒र्व॒न्तरि॑क्षं॒ वी॑हि । स्व॒स्तिग॑व्यूति॒रभ॑यानि कृ॒ण्वन्पू॒ष्णा स॒युजा॑ स॒ह ।।

text:
From the Earth's seat, like Anginas, bring thou Purîshya
 Agni forth.
 After the wont of Angiras we to Purîshya Agni go.
 Agni Purîshya we will bear after the went of Angiras.
meaning: पृ॑थि॒व्याः स॒धस्था॑द॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वदा भ॑र । अ॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वदच्छे॑मः । अ॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वद्भ॑रिष्यामः ।।

text:
Agni hath looked along the van of Mornings, looked on the
 days, the earliest Jâtavedas,
 And many a time along the beams of Sûrya: along the heaven
 and earth hast thou extended.
meaning: अन्व॒ग्निरु॒षसा॒मग्र॑मख्य॒दन्वहा॑नि प्रथ॒मो जा॒तवे॑दाः । अनु॒ सूर्य॑स्य पुरु॒त्रा च॑ र॒श्मीननु॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी आ त॑तन्थ ।।

text:
The Courser, started on his way, shakes from him all hostilities.
 He longs to look with reverent eye on Agni is the mighty.
 seat.
meaning: आ॒गत्य॑ वा॒ज्यध्वा॑नँ॒ सर्वा॒ मृधो॒ विधू॑नुते । अ॒ग्निँ स॒धस्थे॑ मह॒ति चक्षु॑षा॒ नि चि॑कीषते ।।

text:
O Courser, having come to earth, seek Agni with a longing
 wish.
 Tell us by trampling on the ground where we may dig him
 from the earth.
meaning: आ॒क्रम्य॑ वाजिन्पृथि॒वीम॒ग्निमि॑च्छ रु॒चा त्वम् । भूम्या॑ वृ॒क्त्वाय॑ नो ब्रूहि॒ यतः॒ खने॑म॒ तं व॒यम् ।।

text:
Heaven is thy back, the earth thy seat, the air thy soul,
 the sea thy womb.
 Looking around thee with thine eye trample the adversaries
 down.
meaning: द्यौ॑स्ते पृ॒ष्ठं पृ॑थि॒वी स॒धस्थ॑मा॒त्मान्त॑रिक्षँ समु॒द्रो योनिः॑ । वि॒ख्याय॒ चक्षु॑षा॒ त्वम॒भि ति॑ष्ठ पृतन्य॒तः ।।

text:
Wealth-giver, Courser, from this place step forth to great
 felicity.
 May we enjoy Earth's favour while we dig forth Agni from
 her
meaning: उत्क्रा॑म मह॒ते सौ॑भगाया॒स्मादा॒स्थाना॑द्द्रविणो॒दा वा॑जिन् । व॒यँ स्या॑म सुमतौ पृथि॒व्या अ॒ग्निं खन॑न्त उ॒पस्थे॑ अस्याः ।।

text:
Down hath he stepped, wealth-giver, racer, courser. Good
 and auspicious room on earth thou madest.
 Thence let us dig forth Agni, fair to look on, while to the
 loftiest vault we mount, to heaven.
meaning: उद॑क्रमीद्द्रविणो॒दा वा॒ज्य॒र्वाकः॒ सु लो॒कँ सुकृ॑तं पृथि॒व्याम् । ततः॑ खनेम सु॒प्रती॑कम॒ग्निँ स्वो॒ रुहा॑णा॒ अधि॒ नाक॑मुत्त॒मम् ।।

text:
I thoughtfully besprinkle thee with butter, thee dwelling
 near to all existing creatures.
 Broad, vast through vital power that moves transversely,
 conspicuous, strong with all the food that feeds thee.
meaning: आ त्वा॑ जिघर्मि॒ मन॑सा घृ॒तेन॑ प्रतिक्षि॒यन्तं॒ भुव॑नानि॒ विश्वा॑ । पृ॒थुं ति॑र॒श्चा वय॑सा बृ॒हन्तं॒ व्यचि॑ष्ठ॒मन्नै॑ रभ॒सं दृशा॑नम् ।।

text:
I sprinkle him who moves in all directions: may he accept
 it with a friendly spirit.
 Agni with bridegroom's face and lovely colour may not be
 touched when all his form is fury.
meaning: आ वि॒श्वतः॑ प्र॒त्यञ्चं॑ जिघर्म्यर॒क्षसा॒ मन॑सा॒ तज्जु॑षेत । मर्य॑श्री स्पृह॒यद्व॑र्णो अ॒ग्निर्नाभि॒मृशे॑ त॒न्वा॒ जर्भु॑राणः ।।

text:
Round the oblation bath he paced, Agni the wise, the Lord
 of Strength,
 Giving the offerer precious boons.
meaning: परि॒ वाज॑पतिः क॒विर॒ग्निर्ह॒व्यान्य॑क्रमीत् । दध॒द्रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑ ।।

text:
We set thee round us as a fort, victorious Agni, thee a Sage,
 Of hero lineage, day by day destroyer of our treacherous foes.
meaning: परि॑ त्वाग्ने॒ पुरं॑ व॒यं विप्रँ॑ सहस्य धीमहि । धृ॒षद्व॑र्णं दि॒वेदि॑वे ह॒न्तारं॑ भङ्गु॒राव॑ताम् ।।

text:
Thou, Agni, with the days, fain to shine hitherward, art
 brought to life from out the waters, from the stone,

From out the forest trees and herbs that grow on ground.
 thou, Sovran Lord of men, art generated pure.
meaning: त्वम॑ग्ने॒ द्युभि॒स्त्वमा॑शुशु॒क्षणि॒स्त्वम॒द्भ्यस्त्वमश्म॑न॒स्परि॑ । त्वं वने॑भ्य॒स्त्वमोष॑धीभ्य॒स्त्वं नृ॒णां नृ॑पते जायसे॒ शुचिः॑ ।।

text:
At Savitar's, the Shining One's, impulsion, with arms of
 Asvins and with hands of Pûshan,
 As Angiras was wont to do, I dig thee forth from the seat
 of Earth, Agni Purîshya.
 Thee, Agni, luminous and fair of aspect, resplendent with
 imperishable lustre, gracious to living creatures, never
 harming,
 As Angiras was wont to do, we dig thee forth from the seat
 of Earth, Agni Purîshya.
meaning: दे॒वस्य॑ त्वा सवि॒तुः प्र॑स॒वे॒ श्विनो॑र्बा॒हुभ्यां॑ पू॒ष्णो हस्ता॑भ्याम् । पृ॑थि॒व्याः स॒धस्था॑द॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वत्ख॑नामि । ज्योति॑ष्मन्तं त्वाग्ने सु॒प्रती॑क॒मज॑स्रेण भा॒नुना॒ दीद्य॑तम् । शि॒वं प्र॒जाभ्यो हिँ॑सन्तं पृथि॒व्या स॒धस्था॑द॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वत्ख॑नामः ।।

text:
Thou art the Waters’ back, the womb of Agni, around the
 ocean as it swells and surges.
 Waxing to greatness, resting on the lotus, spread thou in
 amplitude with heaven's own measure.
meaning: अ॒पां पृ॒ष्ठम॑सि॒ योनि॑र॒ग्नेः स॑मु॒द्रम॒भितः॒ पिन्व॑मानम् । वर्ध॑मानो म॒हाँ आ च॒ पुष्क॑रे दि॒वो मात्र॑या वरि॒म्णा प्र॑थस्व ।।

text:
Yea are a shelter and a shield, uninjured both, and widely
 spread.
 Do ye; expansive, cover him: bear ye Purîshya Agni up.
meaning: शर्म॑ च स्थो॒ वर्म॑ च॒ स्थो च्छि॑द्रे बहु॒ले उ॒भे । व्यच॑स्वती॒ सं व॑साथां भृ॒तम॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑म् ।।

text:
Cover him, finders of the light, united both with breast and
 self,
 Bearing between you Agni, the refulgent, everlasting One.
meaning: संव॑साथाँ स्व॒र्विदा॑ स॒मीची॒ उर॑सा॒ त्मना॑ । अ॒ग्निम॒न्तर्भ॑रि॒ष्यन्ती॒ ज्योति॑ष्मन्त॒मज॑स्र॒मित् ।।

text:
Thou art Purîshya, thou support of all. Atharvan was the
 first, Agni, who rubbed thee into life.
 Agni, Atharvan brought thee forth by rubbing from the
 lotus, from
 The head of Visva, of the Priest.
meaning: पु॑री॒ष्यो॑ सि वि॒श्वभ॑रा॒ अथ॑र्वा त्वा प्रथ॒मो निर॑मन्थदग्ने । त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ पुष्क॑रा॒दध्यथ॑र्वा॒ निर॑मन्थत । मू॒र्ध्नो विश्व॑स्य वा॒घतः॑ ।।

text:
Thee too as Vritra-slayer, thee breaker of forts, the Sage
 Dadhyach,
 Son of Atharvan, lighted up.
meaning: तमु॑ त्वा द॒ध्यङ्ङृषिः॑ पु॒त्र ई॑धे॒ अथ॑र्वणः । वृ॑त्र॒हणं॑ पुरंद॒रम् ।।

text:
Pâthya the Bull, too, kindled thee the Dasyus’ most
 destructive foe,
 Winner of spoil in every fight.
meaning: तमु॑ त्वा पा॒थ्यो वृषा॒ समी॑धे दस्यु॒हन्त॑मम् । ध॑नंज॒यँ रणे॑रणे ।।

text:
Sit, Hotar, in the Hotar's place, observant: lay down the
 sacrifice in the place of worship.
 Thou, dear to Go is, shalt serve them with oblation. Agni,
 give long life to the Sacrificer.
meaning: सीद॑ होतः॒ स्व उ॑ लो॒के चि॑कि॒त्वान्सा॒दया॑ य॒ज्ञँ सु॑कृ॒तस्य॒ योनौ॑ । दे॑वा॒वीर्दे॒वान्ह॒विषा॑ यजा॒स्यग्ने॑ बृ॒हद्यज॑माने॒ वयो॑ धाः ।।

text:
Accustomed to the Hotar's place, the Hotar hath seated him,
 bright, splendid, passing mighty,
 Whose foresight keeps the Law from violation, excellent,
 pure-tongued, bringing thousands, Agni.
meaning: नि होता॑ होतृ॒षद॑ने॒ विदा॑नस्त्वे॒षो दी॑दि॒वाँ अ॑सदत्सु॒दक्षः॑ । अद॑ब्धव्रतप्रमति॒र्वसि॑ष्ठः सहस्रम्भ॒रः शुचि॑जिह्वो अ॒ग्निः ।।

text:
Seat thee, for thou art mighty: shine, best entertainer of
 the Gods.
 Worthy of sacred food, praised Agni! loose the smoke, ruddy
 and beautiful to see.
meaning: सँ सी॑दस्व म॒हाँ अ॑सि॒ शोच॑स्व देव॒वीत॑मः । वि धू॒मम॑ग्ने अरु॒षं मि॑येध्य सृ॒ज प्र॑शस्त दर्श॒तम् ।।

text:
Pour heavenly Waters honey-sweet here for our health, for
 progeny.
 Forth from the place whereon they fall let plants with goodly
 berries spring.
meaning: अ॒पो दे॒वीरुप॑सृज॒ मधु॑मतीरय॒क्ष्माय॑ प्र॒जाभ्यः॑ । तासा॑मा॒स्थाना॒दुज्जि॑हता॒मोष॑धयः सुपिप्प॒लाः ।।

text:
May Vâyu Mâtarisvan heal and comfort thy broken heart as
 there supine thou liest.
 Thou unto whom the breath of Gods gives motion, to Ka,
 yea, unto thee, O God, be Vashat!
meaning: सं ते॑ वा॒युर्मा॑त॒रिश्वा॑ दधातूत्ता॒नाया॒ हृद॑यं॒ यद्विक॑स्तम् । यो दे॒वानां॒ चर॑सि प्रा॒णथे॑न॒ कस्मै॑ देव॒ वष॑डस्तु॒ तुभ्य॑म् ।।

text:
He, nobly born with lustre, shield and refuge, hath sat down
 in light.
 O Agni, Rich in Splendour, robe thyself in many-hued attire.
meaning: सुजा॑तो॒ ज्योति॑षा स॒ह शर्म॒ वरू॑थ॒मास॑द॒त्स्वः॑ । वासो॑ अग्ने वि॒श्वरू॑पँ॒ संव्य॑यस्व विभावसो ।।

text:
Lord of fair sacrifice; arise! With Godlike thought protect
 us well.

With great light splendid to behold come, Agni, through
 sweet hymns of praise.
meaning: उदु॑ तिष्ठ स्वध्व॒रावा॑ नो दे॒व्या धि॒या । दृ॒शे च॑ भा॒सा बृ॑ह॒ता शु॑शु॒क्वनि॒राग्ने॑ याहि सुश॒स्तिभिः॑ ।।
ऊ॒र्ध्व ऊ॒ षु ण॑ ऊ॒तये॒ तिष्ठा॑ दे॒वो न स॑वि॒ता । ऊ॒र्ध्वो वाज॑स्य॒ सनि॑ता॒ यद॒ञ्जिभि॑र्वा॒घद्भि॑र्वि॒ह्वया॑महे ।।

text:
Thou, being horn, art Child of Earth and Heaven, parted, fair
 Babe, among the plants, O Agni.
 The glooms of night thou, brilliant child, subduest, and art
 come forth, loud roaring, from the Mothers.
meaning: स जा॒तो गर्भो॑ असि॒ रोद॑स्योरग्ने॒ चारु॒र्विभृ॑त॒ ओष॑धीषु । चि॒त्रः शिशुः॒ परि॒ तमाँ॑स्य॒क्तून्प्र मा॒तृभ्यो॒ अधि॒ कनि॑क्रद॒द्गाः ।।

text:
Steady be thou, and firm of limb. Steed, be a racer fleet of
 foot.
 Broad be thou, pleasant as a seat, bearing the store which
 Agni needs.
meaning: स्थि॒रो भ॑व वी॒ड्व॒ङ्ग आ॒शुर्भ॑व वा॒ज्य॑र्वन् । पृ॒थुर्भ॑व सु॒षद॒स्त्वम॒ग्नेः पु॑रीष॒वाह॑णः ।।

text:
Be thou propitious, Angiras, to creatures of the human race.
 Set not on fire the heaven and earth, nor air's mid-region,
 nor the trees.
meaning: शि॒वो भ॑व प्र॒जाभ्यो॒ मानु॑षीभ्य॒स्त्वम॑ङ्गिरः । मा द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी अ॒भि शो॑ची॒र्मान्तरि॑क्षं॒ मा वन॒स्पती॑न् ।।

text:
Forth with loud neighing go the Steed, the Ass that shouteth
 as he runs.
 Bearing Purîshya Agni on, let him not perish ere his time,
 Male bearer of male Agni, Child of Waters, Offspring of the
 Sea. Agni, come hither to the feast.
meaning: प्रै॑तु वा॒जी कनि॑क्रद॒न्नान॑द॒द्रास॑भः॒ पत्वा॑ । भर॑न्न॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्यं॒ मा पा॒द्यायु॑षः पु॒रा । वृषा॒ग्निं वृष॑णं॒ भर॑न्न॒पां गर्भँ॑ समु॒द्रिय॑म् । अग्न॒ आया॑हि वी॒तये॑ ।।

text:
The Law the Truth, the Law the Truth. As Angiras was
 wont to do, we bear Purîshya Agni on.
 Ye Plants, with joyous welcome greet this Agni, auspicious
 One who cometh on to meet you.
 Removing all distresses and afflictions, here settle down and
 banish evil purpose.
meaning: ऋ॒तँ स॒त्यमृ॒तँ स॒त्यम् । अ॒ग्निं पु॑री॒ष्य॑मङ्गिर॒स्वद्भ॑रामः । ओष॑धयः॒ प्रति॑ मोदध्वम॒ग्निमे॒तँ शि॒वमा॒यन्त॑म॒भ्यत्र॑ यु॒ष्माः । व्यस्य॒न्विश्वा॒ अनि॑रा॒ अमी॑वा नि॒षीद॑न्नो॒ अप॑ दुर्म॒तिं ज॑हि ।।

text:
Welcome him joyfully, ye Plants, laden with bloom and
 goodly fruit.
 This seasonable Child of yours hath settled in his ancient
 seat.
meaning: ओष॑धयः॒ प्रति॑ गृभ्णीत॒ पुष्प॑वतीः सुपिप्प॒लाः । अ॒यं वो॒ गर्भ॑ ऋ॒त्वियः॑ प्र॒त्नँ स॒धस्थ॒मास॑दत् ।।

text:
Resplendent with thy wide-extending lustre dispel the terrors
 of the fiends who hate us.
 May lofty Agni be my guide and shelter, ready to hear our
 call, the good Protector.
meaning: वि पाज॑सा पृ॒थुना॒ शोशु॑चानो॒ बाध॑स्व द्वि॒षो र॒क्षसो॒ अमी॑वाः । सु॒शर्म॑णो बृह॒तः शर्म॑णि स्यामग्नेर॒हँ सु॒हव॑स्य॒ प्रणी॑तौ ।।

text:
Ye, Waters, are beneficent, so help ye us to energy
 That we may look on great delight.
meaning: आपो॒ हि ष्ठा म॑यो॒भुव॒स्ता न॑ ऊ॒र्जे द॑धातन । म॒हे रणा॑य॒ चक्ष॑से ।।

text:
Give us a portion of the sap, the most propitious that ye
 have.
 Like mothers in their longing love.
meaning: यो वः॑ शि॒वत॑मो॒ रस॒स्तस्य॑ भाजयते॒ह नः॑ । उ॑श॒तीरि॑व मा॒तरः॑ ।।

text:
To you we gladly come for him to whose abode ye lead us
 on:
 And, Waters, give us procreant strength.
meaning: तस्मा॒ अरं॑ गमाम वो॒ यस्य॒ क्षया॑य॒ जिन्व॑थ । आपो॑ ज॒नय॑था च नः ।।

text:
Mitra, having commingled earth and ground together with
 the light
 For health to creatures mix I thee Omniscient and nobly
 born.
meaning: मि॒त्रः सँ॒सृज्य॑ पृथि॒वीं भूमिं॑ च॒ ज्योति॑षा स॒ह । सुजा॑तं जा॒तवे॑दसमय॒क्ष्माय॑ त्वा॒ सँ सृ॑जामि प्र॒जाभ्यः॑ ।।

text:
The Rudras, having mixed the earth, set all aglow the lofty
 light.
 Bright and perpetual their light verily shines among the
 Gods.
meaning: रु॒द्राः सँ॒सृज्य॑ पृथि॒वीं बृ॒हज्ज्योतिः॒ समी॑धिरे । तेषां॑ भा॒नुरज॑स्र॒ इच्छु॒क्रो दे॒वेषु॑ रोचते ।।

text:
The lump of clay that hath been mixed by Vasus, Rudras,
 by the wise,
 May Sinîvâlî with her hands soften and fit it for the work.
meaning: सँसृ॑ष्टा॒ वसु॑भी रुद्रै॒र्धीरैः॑ कर्म॒ण्यां॒ मृद॑म् । हस्ता॑भ्यां मृ॒द्वीं कृ॒त्वा सि॑नीवा॒ली कृ॑णोतु॒ ताम् ।।

text:
May Sinîvâlî with fair braids, with beauteous crest, with
 lovely locks,
 May she, O mighty Aditi, bestow the Fire-pan in thy hands.
meaning: सि॑नीवा॒ली सु॑कप॒र्दा सु॑कुरी॒रा स्वौ॑प॒शा । सा तुभ्य॑मदिते म॒ह्योखां द॑धातु॒ हस्त॑योः ।।

text:
Aditi shape the Fire-pan with her power, her arms, her
 intellect,
 And in her womb bear Agni as a mother, in her lap, her
 son.
meaning: उ॒खां कृ॑णोतु॒ शक्त्या॑ बा॒हुभ्या॒मदि॑तिर्धि॒या । मा॒ता पु॒त्रं यथो॒पस्थे॒ साग्निं बि॑भर्तु॒ गर्भ॒ आ । म॒खस्य॒ शिरो॑ सि ।।

text:
With Gâyatrî, like Angiras the Vasus form and fashion thee!
 Stedfast art then, thou art the Earth. Establish in me progeny,
 command of cattle, growth of wealth, kinsmen for
 me the worshipper.
 With Trishtup may the Rudras, like Angiras, form and
 fashion thee.
 Stedfast art thou, thou art the Air. Establish in me, etc.,
 as above.
 With Jagatî, like Angiras, Âdityas form and fashion thee!
 Stedfast art thou, thou art the Sky. Establish in me, etc.
 Friends of all men, the All-Gods with Anushtup form thee
 Angiras-like.
 Stedfast art thou, thou art the Quarters. Establish in me,
 etc.
meaning: वस॑वस्त्वा कृण्वन्तु गाय॒त्रेण॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वासि॑ पृथि॒व्य॑सि । धा॒रया॒ मयि॑ प्र॒जाँ रा॒यस्पोषं॑ गौप॒त्यँ सु॒वीर्यँ॑ सजा॒तान्यज॑मानाय । रु॒द्रास्त्वा॑ कृण्वन्तु त्रैष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वास्य॒न्तरि॑क्षमसि । धा॒रया॒ मयि॑ प्र॒जाँ रा॒यस्पोषं॑ गौप॒त्यँ सु॒वीर्यँ॑ सजा॒तान्यज॑मानाय । आ॑दि॒त्यास्त्वा॑ कृण्वन्तु॒ जाग॑तेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वासि द्यौरसि । धा॒रया॒ मयि॑ प्र॒जाँ रा॒यस्पोषं॑ गौप॒त्यँ सु॒वीर्यँ॑ सजा॒तान्यज॑मानाय । विश्वे॑ त्वा दे॒वा वै॑श्वान॒राः कृ॑ण्व॒न्त्वानु॑ष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वासि॒ दिशो॑ सि । धा॒रया॒ मयि॑ प्र॒जाँ रा॒यस्पोषं॑ गौप॒त्यँ सु॒वीर्यँ॑ सजा॒तान्यज॑मानाय ।।

text:
The zone of Aditi art thou. Aditi seize thy hollow space.
 She, having made the great Fire-pan, a womb for Agni,
 formed of clay,
 Aditi, gave it to her Sons and, Let them bake it, were her
 words.
meaning: अदि॑त्यै॒ राम्ना॑सि । अदि॑तिष्टे॒ बिलं॑ गृभ्णातु । कृ॒त्वाय॒ सा म॒हीमु॒खां मृ॒न्मयीं॒ योनि॑म॒ग्नये॑ । पु॒त्रेभ्यः॒ प्राय॑च्छ॒ददि॑तिः श्र॒पया॒निति॑ ।।

text:
The Vasus make thee fragrant, as Angiras did, with Gâyatrî!
 The Rudras make thee fragrant with the Trishtup, as did
 Angiras!
 With Gâyatrî, like Angiras, may the Âdityas perfume thee.
 Dear to all men, may the All-Gods with the Anushtup
 sweeten thee, as Angiras was wont to do.
 May Indra make thee odorous. May Varuna make thee
 odorous. May Vishnu make thee odorous.
meaning: वस॑वस्त्वा धूपयन्तु गाय॒त्रेण॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । रु॒द्रास्त्वा॑ धूपयन्तु त्रैष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । आ॑दि॒त्यास्त्वा॑ धूपयन्तु॒ जाग॑तेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । विश्वे॑ त्वा दे॒वा वै॑श्वान॒रा धू॑पय॒न्त्वानु॑ष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । इन्द्र॑स्त्वा धूपयतु । वरु॑णस्त्वा धूपयतु । विष्णु॑ त्वा धूपयतु ।।

text:
Pit! Angiras-like may Aditi the Goddess, beloved by all
 Gods, dig thee in Earth's bosom.
 Pan! Angiras-like may the Gods’ heavenly Consorts, dear
 to all Gads, in the Earth's bosom place thee.
 Pan! Angiras-like may Dhishanâs, Divine Ones, dear to alt
 Gods, in the Earth's bosom light thee.
 Pan! Angiras-like may the divine Varûtrîs, dear to all Gods,
 in the earth's bosom heat thee,
 Pan! Angiras-like may the celestial Ladies, dear to all Gods,
 in the earth's bosom bake thee.
 Angiras-like may the celestial Matrons, beloved by all the
 Gods, with unclipped pinions, within the lap of Earth,
 O Fire pan, bake thee.
meaning: अदि॑तिष्ट्वा दे॒वी वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावती पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वत्ख॑नत्ववट । दे॒वाना॑म्त्वा॒ पत्नी॑र्दे॒वीर्वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावतीः पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वद्द॑धतूखे । धि॒षणा॑स्त्वा दे॒वीर्वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावतीः पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वद॒भी॑न्धतामुखे । वरू॑त्रीष्ट्वा दे॒वीर्वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावतीः पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वच्छ्र॑पयन्तूखे । ग्नास्त्वा॑ दे॒वीर्वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावतीः पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वत्प॑चन्तूखे । जन॑य॒स्त्वाच्छि॑न्नपत्रा दे॒वीर्वि॒श्वदे॑व्यावतीः पृथि॒व्याः स॒धस्थे॑ अङ्गिर॒स्वत्प॑चन्�खे ।।

text:
The gainful grace of Mitra, God, supporter of the race of
 man,
 Is glorious, of most wondrous fame.
meaning: मि॒त्रस्य॑ चर्षणी॒धृतो वो॑ दे॒वस्य॑ सान॒सि । द्यु॒म्नं चि॒त्रश्र॑वस्तमम् ।।

text:
With lovely arms, with lovely hands, with lovely fingers
 may the God Savitar make thee clean, yea, by the power
 be hath.
 Not trembling on the earth fill thou the regions, fill the
 Quarters full.
meaning: दे॒वस्त्वा॑ सवि॒तोद्व॑पतु सुपा॒णिः स्व॑ङ्गु॒रिः सु॑बा॒हुरु॒त श॑क्त्या । अव्य॑थमाना पृथि॒व्यामाशा॒ दिश॒ आ पृ॑ण ।।

text:
Having arisen wax thou great, yea, stand thou up
 immovable.
 To thee, O Mitra, I entrust this Fire-pan for security. May
 it remain without a break.
meaning: उ॒त्थाय॑ बृह॒ती भ॒वोदु॑ तिष्ठ ध्रु॒वा त्वम् । मित्रै॒तां त॑ उ॒खां परि॑ ददा॒म्यभि॑त्त्या ए॒षा मा भे॑दि ।।

text:
Thee may the Vasus, Angiras-like, fill with the metre
 Gâyatrî.
 Thee may the Rudras, Angiras-like, fill with the Trishtup
 metre full.

Thee may Âdityas, Angiras-like, fill with the metre Jagatî.
 With the Anushtup metre may the All-Gods, dear to all
 men, fill thee full, as Angiras was wont.
meaning: वस॑व॒स्त्वा छृ॑न्दन्तु गाय॒त्रेण॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । रु॒द्रास्त्वा छृ॑न्दन्तु त्रैष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । आ॑दि॒त्यास्त्वा छृ॑न्दन्तु॒ जाग॑तेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् । विश्वे॑ त्वा दे॒वा वै॑श्वान॒रा आ छृ॑न्द॒न्त्वानु॑ष्टुभेन॒ छन्द॑साङ्गिर॒स्वत् ।।

text:
Intention, Agni. Motive, Hail! Mind, Wisdom, Agni, Motive,
 Hail!
 Thought, Knowledge, Agni, Motive, Hail! Rule of Speech,
 Agni, Motive, Hail!
 To Manu Lord of creatures, Hail! To Agni dear to all men,
 Hail!
meaning: आकू॑तिम॒ग्निं प्र॒युजँ॒ स्वाहा॑ । मनो॑ मे॒धाम॒ग्निं प्र॒युजँ॒ स्वाहा॑ । चि॒त्तं विज्ञा॑तम॒ग्निं प्र॒युजँ॒ स्वाहा॑ । वा॒चो विधृ॑तिम॒ग्निं प्र॒युजँ॒ स्वाहा॑ । प्र॒जाप॑तये॒ मन॑वे॒ स्वाहा॑ । अ॒ग्नये॑ वैश्वान॒राय॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
May every mortal man elect the friendship of the guiding God.
 Each one solicits him for wealth: let him seek fame to
 prosper him. All-hail!
meaning: विश्वो॑ दे॒वस्य॑ ने॒तुर्मर्तो॑ वुरीत स॒ख्यम् । विश्वो॑ रा॒य इ॑षुध्यति द्यु॒म्नं वृ॑णीत पु॒ष्यसे॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।
मा सु भि॑त्था॒ मा सु रि॒षो म्ब॑ धृ॒ष्णु वी॒रय॑स्व॒ सु । अ॒ग्निश्चे॒दं क॑रिष्यथः ।।

text:
Be firm for weal, O Goddess Earth. Made in the wonted
 manner thou
 Art a celestial design.
 Acceptable to Gods he this oblation. Arise thou in this
 sacrifice uninjured.
meaning: दृँह॑स्व देवि पृथिवि स्व॒स्तय॑ आसु॒री मा॒या स्व॒धया॑ कृ॒तासि॑ । जुष्टं॑ दे॒वेभ्य॑ इ॒दम॑स्तु ह॒व्यमरि॑ष्टा॒ त्वमुदि॑हि य॒ज्ञे अ॒स्मिन् ।।

text:
Wood-fed, bedewed with sacred oil, ancient, Invoker,
 excellent,
 The Son of Strength, the Wonderful.
meaning: द्र्व॑न्न स॒र्पिरा॑सुतिः प्र॒त्नो होता॒ वरे॑ण्यः । सह॑सस्पु॒त्रो अद्भु॑तः ।।

text:
Abandoning the foeman's host, pass hither to this company:
 Assist the men with whom I stand.
meaning: पर॑स्या॒ अधि॑ सं॒वतो व॑राँ अ॒भ्यात॑र । यत्रा॒हम॑स्मि॒ ताँ अ॑व ।।

text:
From the remotest distance come, Lord of the Red Steeds,
 hitherward.
 Do thou Purîshya, Agni, loved of many, overcome our foes.
meaning: प॑र॒मस्याः॑ परा॒वतो॑ रो॒हिद॑श्व इ॒हा ग॑हि । पु॑री॒ष्यः॑ पुरुप्रि॒यो ग्ने॒ त्वं त॑रा॒ मृधः॑ ।।

text:
O Agni, whatsoever be the fuel that we lay on thee,
 May that he butter unto thee. Be pleased therewith, Most
 Youthful God.
meaning: यद॑ग्ने॒ कानि॒ कानि॑ चि॒दा ते॒ दारू॑णि द॒ध्मसि॑ । सर्वं॒ तद॑स्तु ते घृ॒तं तज्जु॑षस्व यविष्ठ्य ।।

text:
That which the termite eats away, that over which the
 emmet crawls—
 Butter be all of this to thee. Be pleased therewith, Most
 Youthful God.
meaning: यदत्त्यु॑प॒जिह्वि॑का॒ यद्व॒म्रो अ॑ति॒सर्प॑ति । सर्वं॒ तद॑स्तु ते घृ॒तं तज्जु॒षस्व॑ यविष्ठ्य ।।

text:
Bringing to him, with care unceasing, fodder day after day
 as to a stabled courser,
 Joying in food and in the growth of riches, may we thy
 neighbours, Agni, ne’er be injured.
meaning: अह॑र्ह॒रप्र॑यावं॒ भर॒न्तो श्वा॑येव॒ तिष्ठ॑ते घा॒सम॑स्मै । रा॒यस्पोषे॑ण॒ समि॒षा मद॒न्तो ग्ने॒ मा ते॒ प्रति॑वेशा रिषाम ।।

text:
While on earth's navel Agni is enkindled, we call, for
 ample increase of our riches,
 On Agni joying in the draught, much-lauded, worshipful;
 victor conquering in battle.
meaning: नाभा॑ पृथि॒व्याः स॑मिधा॒ने अग्नौ रा॒यस्पोषा॑य बृह॒ते ह॑वामहे । इ॑रंम॒दं बृ॒हदु॑क्थ्यं॒ यज॑त्रं॒ जेता॑रम॒ग्निं पृत॑नासु सास॒हिम् ।।

text:
Whatever hosts there are, fiercely assailant, charging in
 lengthened lines, drawn up in order,
 Whatever thieves there are, whatever robbers, all these I
 cast into thy mouth, O Agni.
meaning: याः सेना॑ अ॒भीत्व॑रीराव्या॒धिनी॒रुग॑णा उ॒त । ये स्ते॒ना ये च॒ तस्क॑रा॒स्ताँस्ते॑ अ॒ग्ने पि॑ दधाम्या॒स्ये॑ ।।

text:
Devour the burglars with both tusks, destroy the robbers
 with thy teeth.
 With both thy jaws, thou Holy One, eat up those thieves
 well champed and chewed.
meaning: दँष्ट्रा॑भ्यां म॒लिम्लू॒न्जम्भ्यै॒स्तस्क॑राँ उ॒त । हनु॑भ्याँ स्ते॒नान्भ॑गव॒स्ताँस्त्वं खा॑द॒ सुखा॑दितान् ।।

text:
The burglars living among men, the thieves and robbers in
 the wood,
 Criminals lurking in their lairs, these do I lay between thy
 jaws.
meaning: ये जने॑षु म॒लिम्ल॑व स्ते॒नास॒स्तस्क॑रा॒ वने॑ । ये कक्षे॑ष्वघा॒यव॒स्ताँस्ते॑ दधामि॒ जम्भ॑योः ।।

text:
Him who would seek to injure us, the man who looks oh
 us with hate
 Turn thou to ashes, and the man who slanders and would
 injure us.
meaning: यो अ॒स्मभ्य॑मराती॒याद्यश्च॑ नो॒ द्वेष॑ते॒ जनः॑ । निन्दा॒द्यो अ॒स्मान्धिप्सा॑च्च॒ सर्वं॒ तं भ॑स्म॒सा कु॑रु ।।

text:
Quickened is this my priestly rank, quickened is manly
 strength and force,
 Quickened is his victorious power of whom I am the Household
 priest.
meaning: सँशि॑तं मे॒ ब्रह्म॒ सँशि॑तं वी॒र्यं॒ बल॑म् । सँशि॑तं क्ष॒त्रं जि॒ष्णु यस्या॒हमस्मि॑ पु॒रोहि॑तः ।।

text:
The arms of these men have I raised, have raised their
 lustre and their strength
 With priestly power I ruin foes and lift my friends to high
 estate.
meaning: उदे॑षां बा॒हू अ॑तिर॒मुद्वर्चो॒ अथो॒ बल॑म् । क्षि॒णोमि॒ ब्रह्म॑णा॒मित्रा॒नुन्न॑यामि॒ स्वाँ अ॒हम् ।।

text:
A share of food, O Lord of Food, vouchsafe us, invigorating
 food that brings no sickness.
 Onward, still onward lead the giver. Grant us maintenance
 both for quadruped and biped.
meaning: अन्न॑प॒ते न्न॑स्य नो देह्यनमी॒वस्य॑ शु॒ष्मिणः॑ । प्रप्र॑ दा॒तारं॑ तारिष॒ ऊर्जं॑ नो धेहि द्वि॒पदे॒ चतु॑ष्पदे ।।

text:
FAR hath he shone abroad like gold to look on, beaming
 imperishable life for glory.
 Agni by vital powers became immortal when his prolific
 Father Dyaus begat him.
meaning: दृ॑शा॒नो रु॒क्म उ॒र्व्या व्य॑द्यौद्दु॒र्मर्ष॒मायुः॑ श्रि॒ये रु॑चा॒नः । अ॒ग्निर॒मृतो॑ अभव॒द्वयो॑भि॒र्यदे॑नं द्यौर्ज॒नय॑त्सु॒रेताः॑ ।।

text:
Night and Dawn, different in hue, accordant, meeting
 together, suckle one same infant.
 Golden between the heaven and earth he shineth. The
 wealth-possessing Gods supported Agni.
meaning: नक्तो॒षासा॒ सम॑नसा॒ विरू॑पे धा॒पये॑ते॒ शिशु॒मेकँ॑ समी॒ची । द्यावा॒क्षामा॑ रु॒क्मो अ॒न्तर्वि भा॑ति दे॒वा अ॒ग्निं धा॑रयन्द्रविणो॒दाः ।।

text:
The Sapient One arrays himself in every form: for quadruped
 and biped he hath brought forth good.
 Excellent Savitar hath looked on heaven's high vault: he
 shineth after the outgoings of the Dawn.
meaning: विश्वा॑ रू॒पाणि॒ प्रति॑ मुञ्चते क॒विः प्रासा॑वीद्भ॒द्रं द्वि॒पदे॒ चतु॑ष्पदे । वि नाक॑मख्यत्सवि॒ता वरे॒ण्यो नु॑ प्र॒याण॑मु॒षसो॒ वि रा॑जति ।।

text:
Thou art the goodly-pinioned Bird: thou hast the Trivrit for
 thy head.
 Gâyatra is thine eye, thy wings are Brihat and Rathantara.
 The hymn is self, the metres are his limbs, the formulas his
 name.
 The Vâmadevya Sâman is thy form, the Yajñâyajñiya thy
 tail, the fire-hearths are thy hooves.
 Thou art the goodly-pinioned Bird: go skyward, soar to
 heavenly light.
meaning: सु॑प॒र्णो॑ सि ग॒रुत्माँ॑स्त्रि॒वृत्ते॒ शिरो॑ गाय॒त्रं चक्षु॑र्बृहद्रथन्त॒रे पक्षौ । स्तोम॑ आ॒त्मा छन्दाँ॒स्यङ्गा॑नि॒ यजूँ॑षि॒ नाम॑ । साम॑ ते त॒नूर्वा॑मदे॒व्यं य॑ज्ञाय॒ज्ञियं॒ पुच्छं॒ धिष्ण्याः॑ श॒पाः । सु॑प॒र्णो॑ सि ग॒रुत्मा॒न्दिवं॑ गच्छ॒ स्वः॑ पत ।।

text:
Thou art the riyal-slaying stride of Vishnu. Mount the
 Gâyatra metre: stride along the earth.
 Thou art the foe-destroying stride of Vishnu. Mount the
 Trishtup metre: stride along mid-air.
 Thou art the traitor-slaying stride of Vishnu. Mount the
 Jagatî metre: stride along the sky.
 Thou art the foeman-slaying stride of Vishnu. Mount
 Anushtup metre: stride along the Quarters.
meaning: विष्णोः॒ क्रमो॑ सि सपत्न॒हा गा॑य॒त्रं छन्द॒ आ रो॑ह पृथि॒वीमनु॒ वि क्र॑मस्व । विष्णोः॒ क्रमो॑ स्यभिमाति॒हा त्रै॑ष्टुभं॒ छन्द॒ आ रो॑हा॒न्तरि॑क्ष॒मनु॒ वि क्र॑मस्व । विष्णोः॒ क्रमो॑ स्यरातीय॒तो ह॒न्ता जाग॑तं॒ छन्द॒ आ रो॑ह॒ दिव॒मनु॒ वि क्र॑मस्व । विष्णोः॒ क्रमो॑ सि शत्रूय॒तो ह॒न्तानु॑ष्टुभं॒ छन्द॒ आ रो॑ह॒ दिशो नु॒ वि क्र॑मस्व ।।

text:
Agni roared out like Dyaus what time he thunders: licking
 full oft the earth round plants he flickered.
 At once, when born, he looked about, enkindled: he shineth
 forth between the earth and heaven.
meaning: अक्र॑न्दद॒ग्नि स्त॒नय॑न्निव द्यौः॒ क्षामा॒ रेरि॑हद्वी॒रुधः॑ सम॒ञ्जन् । स॒द्यो ज॑ज्ञा॒नो वि हीमि॒द्धो अख्य॒दा रोद॑सी भा॒नुना॑ भात्य॒न्तः ।।

text:
Return to me, thou still-returning Agni, with life, with
 lustre, progeny, and treasure,
 With profit, wisdom, riches, and abundance.
meaning: अग्ने॑ भ्यावर्तिन्न॒भि मा॒ नि व॑र्त॒स्वायु॑षा॒ वर्च॑सा प्र॒जया॒ धने॑न । स॒न्या मे॒धया॑ र॒य्या पोषे॑ण ।।

text:
A hundred, Agni Angiras! be thy ways, a thousand thy
 returns.
 With increment of increase bring thou back to us what we
 have lost. Again bring hitherward our wealth.
meaning: अग्ने॑ अङ्गिरः श॒तं ते॑ सन्त्वा॒वृतः॑ स॒हस्रं॑ त उपा॒वृतः॑ । अधा॒ पोष॑स्य॒ पोषे॑ण॒ पुन॑र्नो न॒ष्टमा कृ॑धि॒ पुन॑र्नो र॒यिमा कृ॑धि ।।

text:
Return again with nourishment; Agni, again with food and
 life. Again preserve us from distress.
meaning: पुन॑रू॒र्जा नि व॑र्तस्व॒ पुन॑रग्न इ॒षायु॑षा । पुन॑र्नः पा॒ह्यँह॑सः ।।

text:
Agni, return with store of wealth. Swell with thine overflowing
 stream that feedeth all on every side.
meaning: स॒ह र॒य्या नि व॑र्त॒स्वाग्ने॒ पिन्व॑स्व॒ धार॑या । वि॒श्वप्स्न्या॑ वि॒श्वत॒स्परि॑ ।।

text:
I brought thee: thou hast entered in. Stand stedfast and
 immovable.
 Lot all the people long for thee. Let not thy kingship fall
 away.
meaning: आ त्वा॑हार्षम॒न्तर॑भूर्ध्रु॒वस्ति॒ष्ठावि॑चाचलिः । विश॑स्त्वा॒ सर्वा॑ वाञ्छन्तु॒ मा त्वद्रा॒ष्ट्रमधि॑ भ्रशत् ।।

text:
Varuna, from the upmost bond release us, let down the
 lowest and remove the midmost.
 So in thy holy law may we made sinless belong to Aditi, O
 thou Âditya.
meaning: उदु॑त्त॒मं व॑रुण॒ पाश॑म॒स्मदवा॑ध॒मं वि म॑ध्य॒मँ श्र॑थाय । अथा॑ व॒यमा॑दित्य व्र॒ते तवाना॑गसो॒ अदि॑तये स्याम ।।

text:
High hath the Mighty risen before the Mornings, and come
 to us with light from out the darkness.
 Fair-shapen Agni with white-shining splendour hath filled
 at birth all human habitations.
meaning: अग्रे॑ बृ॒हन्नु॒षसा॑मू॒र्ध्वो अ॑स्थान्निर्जग॒न्वान्तम॑सो॒ ज्योति॒षागा॑त् । अ॒ग्निर्भा॒नुना॒ रुश॑ता॒ स्वङ्ग॒ आ जा॒तो विश्वा॒ सद्मा॑न्यप्राः ।।

text:
The Hamsa homed in light, the Vasu in mid-air, the Priest
 beside the altar, Guest within the house,
 Dweller in noblest place, mid men, in truth, in sky, born
 of flood, kine, truth, mountain, he is holy Law. The Great.
meaning: हँ॒सः शु॑चि॒षद्वसु॑रन्तरिक्ष॒सद्धोता॑ वेदि॒षदति॑थिर्दूरोण॒सत् । नृ॒षद्व॑र॒सदृ॑त॒सद्व्यो॑म॒सद॒ब्जा गो॒जा ऋ॑त॒जा अ॑द्रि॒जा ऋ॒तम् । बृ॒हत् ।।

text:
Knowing all holy ordinances, Agni, be seated in the lap of
 this thy mother.
 Do not with heat or glowing flame consume her: shine thou
 within her with refulgent lustre.
meaning: सीद॒ त्वं मा॒तुर॒स्या उ॒पस्थे॒ विश्वा॑न्यग्ने व॒युना॑नि वि॒द्वान् । मै॑नां॒ तप॑सा॒ मार्चिषा॒भिशो॑चीर॒न्तर॑स्याँ शु॒क्रज्यो॑ति॒र्वि भा॑हि ।।

text:
Within this Fire-pan with thy light, O Agni, in thy proper seat,
 Glowing with warmth, be gracious thou, O Jâtavedas, unto her.
meaning: अ॒न्तर॑ग्ने रु॒चा त्वमु॒खायाः॒ सद॑ने॒ स्वे । तस्या॒स्त्वँ हर॑सा॒ तप॒न्जात॑वेदः शि॒वो भ॑व ।।

text:
Being propitious unto me, O Agni, sit propitiously.
 Having made all the regions blest, in thine own dwelling
 seat thyself.
meaning: शि॒वो भू॒त्वा मह्य॑मग्ने॒ अथो॑ सीद शि॒वस्त्वम् । शि॒वः कृ॒त्वा दिशः॒ सर्वाः॒ स्वं योनि॑मि॒हास॑दः ।।

text:
First Agni sprang to life from out of heaven, the second
 time from us came Jâtavedas.
 Thirdly the Manly-souled was in the waters. The pious
 lauds and kindles him Eternal.
meaning: दि॒वस्परि॑ प्रथ॒मं ज॑ज्ञे अ॒ग्निर॒स्माद्द्वि॒तीयं॒ परि॑ जा॒तवे॑दाः । तृ॒तीय॑म॒प्सु नृ॒मणा॒ अज॑स्र॒मिन्धा॑न एनं जरते स्वा॒धीः ।।

text:
Agni, we know thy three powers in three stations, we know
 thy forms in many a place divided.
 We know what name supreme thou hast in secret: we know
 the source from which thou hast proceeded.
meaning: वि॒द्मा ते॑ अग्ने त्रे॒धा त्र॒याणि॑ वि॒द्मा ते॒ धाम॒ विभृ॑ता पुरु॒त्रा । वि॒द्मा ते॒ नाम॑ पर॒मं गुहा॒ यद्वि॒द्मा तमुत्सं॒ यत॑ आज॒गन्थ॑ ।।

text:
The Manly-souled lit thee in sea and waters, Man's Viewer
 lit thee in the breast of heaven.
 There as thou stoodest in the third high region the Bulls
 increased thee in the waters’ bosom.
meaning: स॑मु॒द्रे त्वा॑ नृ॒मणा॑ अ॒प्स्व॒न्तर्नृ॒चक्षा॑ ईधे दि॒वो अ॑ग्न॒ ऊध॑न् । तृ॒तीये॑ त्वा॒ रज॑सि तस्थि॒वाँस॑म॒पामु॒पस्थे॑ महि॒षा अ॑वर्धन् ।।

text: Agni roared out, etc. (verse 6 repeated).
meaning: अक्र॑न्दद॒ग्नि स्त॒नय॑न्निव द्यौः॒ क्षामा॒ रेरि॑हद्वी॒रुधः॑ सम॒ञ्जन् । स॒द्यो ज॑ज्ञा॒नो वि हीमि॒द्धो अख्य॒दा रोद॑सी भा॒नुना॑ भात्य॒न्तः ।।

text:
The spring of glories and support of riches, rouser of
 thoughts and guardian of the Soma,
 Good Son of Strength, a King amid the waters, in forefront
 of the Dawns he shines enkindled.
meaning: श्री॒णामु॑दा॒रो ध॒रुणो॑ रयी॒णां म॑नी॒षाणां॒ प्रार्प॑णः॒ सोम॑गोपाः । वसुः॑ सू॒नुः सह॑सो अ॒प्सु राजा॒ वि भा॒त्यग्र॑ उ॒षसा॑मिधा॒नः ।।

text:
Germ of the world, ensign of all creation, he sprang to life
 and filled the earth and heaven.
 Even the firm rock he cleft when passing over, when the
 Five Tribes brought sacrifice to Agni.
meaning: विश्व॑स्य के॒तुर्भुव॑नस्य॒ गर्भ॒ आ रोद॑सी अपृणा॒ज्जाय॑मानः । वी॒डुं चि॒दद्रि॑मभिनत्परा॒यञ्जना॒ यद॒ग्निमय॑जन्त॒ पञ्च॑ ।।

text:
So among mortals was immortal Agni stablished as cleansing,
 wise, and eager envoy.
 He waves the red smoke that he lifts above him, striving
 to reach the heaven with radiant lustre.
meaning: उ॒शिक्पा॑व॒को अ॑र॒तिः सु॑मे॒धा मर्त्ये॑ष्व॒ग्निर॒मृतो॒ नि धा॑यि । इय॑र्ति धू॒मम॑रु॒षं भरि॑भ्र॒दुच्छु॒क्रेण॑ शो॒चिषा॒ द्यामिन॑क्षन् ।।

text: Far hath he shone, etc. (verse 1 repeated).
meaning: दृ॑शा॒नो रु॒क्म उ॒र्व्या व्य॑द्यौद्दु॒र्मर्ष॒मायुः॑ श्रि॒ये रु॑चा॒नः । अ॒ग्निर॒मृतो॑ अभव॒द्वयो॑भि॒र्यदे॑नं द्यौर्ज॒नय॑त्सु॒रेताः॑ ।।

text:
Whoso this day, O God whose flames are lovely, makes thee
 a cake, O Agni, mixed with butter,
 Lead thou and further him to higher fortune, to bliss bestowed
 by Gods, O thou Most Youthful.
meaning: यस्ते॑ अ॒द्य कृ॒णव॑द्भद्रशोचे पू॒पं दे॑व घृ॒तव॑न्तमग्ने । प्र तं न॑य प्रत॒रं वस्यो॒ अच्छा॒भि सु॒म्नं दे॒वभ॑क्तं यविष्ठ ।।

text:
Endow him, Agni, with a share of glory, at every, song of
 praise sung forth enrich him.
 Dear let him be to Sûrya, dear to Agni, preëminent with son
 and children's children.
meaning: आ तं भ॑ज सौश्रव॒सेष्व॑ग्न उ॒क्थौ॑क्थ॒ आ भ॑ज श॒स्यमा॑ने । प्रि॒यः सूर्ये॑ प्रि॒यो अ॒ग्ना भ॑वा॒त्युज्जा॒तेन॑ भि॒नद॒दुज्जनि॑त्वैः ।।

text:
While, Agni, day by day men pay thee worship they win
 themselves all treasures worth the wishing.
 Allied with thee, eager and craving riches, they have disclosed
 the stable filled with cattle.
meaning: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ यज॑माना॒ अनु॒ द्यून्विश्वा॒ वसु॑ दधिरे॒ वार्या॑णि । त्वया॑ स॒ह द्रवि॑णमि॒च्छमा॑ना व्र॒जं गोम॑न्तमु॒शिजो॒ वि व॑व्रुः ।।

text:
Agni, man's gracious Friend, the Soma's keeper, Vaisvânara,
 hath been lauded by the Rishis.
 We will invoke benignant Earth and Heaven: ye Deities,
 give us wealth with hero children.
meaning: अस्ता॑व्य॒ग्निर्न॒राँ सु॒शेवो॑ वैश्वान॒र ऋषि॑भिः॒ सोम॑गोपाः । अ॑द्वे॒षे द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी हु॑वेम॒ देवा॑ ध॒त्त र॒यिम॒स्मे सु॒वीर॑म् ।।

text:
Pay service unto Agni with your fuel, rouse your Guest
 with oil:
 In him present your offerings.
meaning: स॒मिधा॒ग्निं दु॑वस्यत घृतैर्बोधय॒ताति॑थिम् । आस्मि॑न्ह॒व्या जु॑होतन ।।

text:
May all the Gods, O Agni, bear thee upward with their earnest
 thoughts:
 Not to be looked on, rich in light, be thou propitious unto us,
meaning: उदु॑ त्वा॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अग्ने॒ भर॑न्तु॒ चित्ति॑भिः । स नो॑ भव शि॒वस्त्वँ सु॒प्रती॑को वि॒भाव॑सुः ।।

text:
Agni, go forth resplendent, thou with thine auspicious flames
 of fire.
 Shining with mighty beams of light harm not my people
 with thy form.
meaning: प्रेद॑ग्ने॒ ज्योति॑ष्मान्याहि शि॒वेभि॑र॒र्चिभि॒ष्ट्वम् । बृ॒हद्भि॑र्भा॒नुभि॒र्भास॒न्मा हिँ॑सीस्त॒न्वा॑ प्र॒जाः ।।

text: Agni roared out, etc. (verse 21 repeated.)
meaning: अक्र॑न्दद॒ग्नि स्त॒नय॑न्निव द्यौः॒ क्षामा॒ रेरि॑हद्वी॒रुधः॑ सम॒ञ्जन् । स॒द्यो ज॑ज्ञा॒नो वि हीमि॒द्धो अख्य॒दा रोद॑सी भा॒नुना॑ भात्य॒न्तः ।।

text:
Far famed is this the Bharata's own Agni: he shineth like
 the Sun with lofty splendour.
 He who hath vanquished Pûru in the battle, the heavenly
 Guest hath shone for us benignly.
meaning: प्रप्रा॒यम॒ग्निर्भ॑र॒तस्य॑ शृण्वे॒ वि यत्सूर्यो॒ न रोच॑ते बृ॒हद्भाः । अ॒भि यः पू॒रुं पृत॑नासु तस्थौ दी॒दाय दैव्यो॒ अति॑थिः शि॒वो नः॑ ।।

text:
Receive these ashes, ye celestial Waters, and lay them in a
 fair place full of fragrance.
 To him bow down the nobly-wedded Matrons! Bear this on
 waters as her son a mother.
meaning: आपो॑ देवीः॒ प्रति॑ गृभ्णीत॒ भस्मै॒तत्स्यो॒ने कृ॑णुध्वँ सुर॒भा लो॒के । तस्मै॑ नमन्तां॒ जन॑यः सु॒पत्नी॑र्मा॒तेव॑ पु॒त्रं बि॑भृता॒प्स्वे॑नत् ।।

text:
Agni, thy home is in the floods: into the plants thou forcest
 way,
 And as their child art born anew.
meaning: अ॒प्स्व॑ग्ने॒ सधि॒ष्टव सौषधी॒रनु॑ रुध्यसे । गर्भे॒ सन्जा॑यसे॒ पुनः॑ ।।

text:
Thou art the offspring of the plants, thou art the offspring
 of the trees:
 The offspring thou of all that is, thou, Agni, art the Waters’
 Child,
meaning: गर्भो॑ अ॒स्योष॑धीनां॒ गर्भो॒ वन॒स्पती॑नाम् । गर्भो॒ विश्व॑स्य भू॒तस्याग्ने॒ गर्भो॑ अ॒पाम॑सि ।।

text:
With ashes having reached the womb, the waters, Agni
 and the earth,
 United with the mothers, thou blazing hast seated thee again.
meaning: प्र॒सद्य॒ भस्म॑ना॒ योनि॑म॒पश्च॑ पृथि॒वीम॑ग्ने । सँ॒सृज्य॑ मा॒तृभि॒ष्ट्वं ज्योति॑ष्मा॒न्पुन॒रास॑दः ।।

text:
Seated again upon thy seat, the waters, Agni! and the earth,
 In her, thou, most auspicious One, liest as in a mother's lap

40, 41 Return again, etc. Agni, return, etc. (verses 9 and 10
 repeated).
meaning: पुन॑रा॒सद्य॒ सद॑नम॒पश्च॑ पृथि॒वीम॑ग्ने । शेषे॑ मा॒तुर्यथो॒पस्थे॒ न्तर॑स्याँ शि॒वत॑मः ।।

text:
Mark this my speech, Divine One, thou Most Youthful,
 offered to thee by him who gives most freely:
 One hates thee, and another sings thy praises. I thine
 adorer laud thy form, O Agni.
meaning: पुन॑रू॒र्जा निव॑र्तस्व॒ पुन॑रग्न इ॒षायु॑षा । पुन॑र्नः पा॒ह्यँह॑सः ।।

text:
Be thou for us a liberal Prince, Giver and Lord of precious
 things.
 Drive those who hate us far away.
 To the Omnific One All-hail!
meaning: स॒ह र॒य्या नि व॑र्त॒स्वाग्ने॒ पिन्व॑स्व॒ धार॑या । वि॒श्वप्स्न्या॑ वि॒श्वत॒स्परि॑ ।।

text:
Again let the Âdityas, Rudras, Yams, and Brahmans with
 their rites light thee, Wealth-bringer!
 Increase thy body with presented butter: effectual be the
 Sacrificer's wishes.
meaning: बोधा॑ मे अ॒स्य वच॑सो यविष्ठ॒ मँहि॑ष्ठस्य॒ प्रभृ॑तस्य स्वधावः । पीय॑ति त्वो॒ अनु॑ त्वो गृणाति व॒न्दारु॑ष्टे त॒न्वं॑ वन्दे अग्ने ।।

text:
Go hence, depart, creep off in all directions, both ancient
 visitors and recent comers:
 Yama hath given a place on earth to rest in. This place
 for him the Fathers have provided.
meaning: स बो॑धि सू॒रिर्म॒घवा॒ वसु॑पते॒ वसु॑दावन् । यु॑यो॒ध्य॒स्मद्द्वेषाँ॑सि । वि॒श्वक॑र्मणे॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Knowledge art thou: accomplishment of wishes. In me be
 the fulfilment of thy wishes.
 Thou art the ashes, thou the mould of Agni. Rankers are
 ye, rankers around. Rankers right upward, be ye fixed.
meaning: पुन॑स्त्वादि॒त्या रु॒द्रा वस॑वः॒ समि॑न्धतां॒ पुन॑र्ब्र॒ह्माणो॑ वसुनीथ यज्ञैः । घृ॒तेन॒ त्वं त॒न्वं॑ वर्धयस्व स॒त्याः स॑न्तु॒ यज॑मानस्य॒ कामाः॑ ।।

text:
This is that Agni where the longing Indra took the pressed
 Soma deep within his body.
 Winner of spoils in thousands like a courser, with prayer art
 thou exalted, Jâtavedas.
meaning: अपे॑त॒ वी॑त॒ वि च॑ सर्प॒तातो॒ ये त्र॒ स्थ पु॑रा॒णा ये च॒ नूत॑नाः । अदा॑द्य॒मो॑ व॒सानं॑ पृथि॒व्या अक्र॑न्नि॒मं पि॒तरो॑ लो॒कम॑स्मै ।।

text:
The splendour which is thine in heaven, O Agni, in earth, O
 Holy One, in plants, in waters,
 Wherewith thou hast o’erspread mid-air's broad region, that
 light is brilliant, billowy, man-surveying.
meaning: सं॒ज्ञान॑मसि । का॑म॒धर॑णम् । मयि॑ ते काम॒धर॑णं भूयात् । अ॒ग्नेर्भस्मा॑स्य॒ग्नेः पुरी॑षमसि । चित॑ स्थ परि॒चित॑ ऊर्ध्व॒चितः॑ श्नयध्वम् ।।

text:
O Agni, to the flood of heaven thou mountest, thou tallest
 hither Gods, the thought-inspirers.
 The waters, those beyond the light of Sûrya, and those
 that are beneath it here, approach thee.
meaning: अ॒यँ सो अ॒ग्निर्यस्मि॒न्त्सोम॒मिन्द्रः॑ सु॒तं द॒धे ज॒ठरे॑ वावशा॒नः । स॑ह॒स्रिणं॒ वाज॒मत्यं॒ न सप्तिँ॑ सस॒वान्त्सन्त्स्तू॑यसे जातवेदः ।।

text:
May the Purîshya Agnis in accord with those that spring
 from floods,
 May they, benevolent, accept the sacrifice, full, wholesome
 draughts.
meaning: अग्ने॒ यत्ते॑ दि॒वि वर्चः॑ पृथि॒व्यां यदोष॑धीष्व॒प्स्वा य॑जत्र । येना॒न्तरि॑क्षमु॒र्वा॑त॒तन्थ॑ त्वे॒षः स भा॒नुर॑र्ण॒वो नृ॒चक्षाः॑ ।।

text:
As holy food, Agni, to thine invoker give wealth in cattle,
 lasting, rich in marvels.
 To us be born a son and spreading offspring. Agni, be this
 thy gracious will to us-ward.
meaning: अग्ने॑ दि॒वो अर्ण॒मच्छा॑ जिगा॒स्यच्छा॑ दे॒वाँ ऊ॑चिषे॒ धिष्ण्या॒ ये । या रो॑च॒ने प॒रस्ता॒त्सूर्य॑स्य॒ याश्चा॒वस्ता॑दुप॒तिष्ठ॑न्त॒ आपः॑ ।।

text:
This is thine ordered place of birth whence, sprung to life,
 thou shonest forth.
 Knowing this, Agni, mount on high and cause our riches to
 increase.
meaning: पु॑री॒ष्या॑सो अ॒ग्नयः॑ प्राव॒णेभिः॑ स॒जोष॑सः । जु॒षन्तां॑ य॒ज्ञम॒द्रुहो॑ नमी॒वा इषो॑ म॒हीः ।।

text:
Ranker art thou: Angiras-like sit steady with that Deity.
 Ranker-round art thou: Angiras-like sit steady with that
 Deity.
meaning: इडा॑मग्ने पुरु॒दँसँ॑ स॒निं गोः श॑श्वत्त॒मँ हव॑मानाय साध । स्यान्नः॑ सू॒नुस्तन॑यो वि॒जावाग्ने॒ सा ते॑ सुम॒तिर्भू॑त्व॒स्मे ।।

text:
Fill up the room, supply the void, then settle steady in thy
 place.
 Indr-Âgni and Brihaspati have set thee down in this abode.
meaning: अ॒यं ते॒ योनि॑रृ॒त्वियो॒ यतो॑ जा॒तो अरो॑चथाः । तं जा॒नन्न॑ग्न॒ आ रो॒हाथा॑ नो वर्धया र॒यिम् ।।

text:
The dappled kine who stream with milk prepare his draught
 of Soma juice—
 Clans in the birthplace of the Gods, in the three luminous
 realms of heaven.
meaning: चिद॑सि॒ तया॑ दे॒वत॑याङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वा सी॑द । प॑रि॒चिद॑सि॒ तया॑ दे॒वत॑याङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वा सी॑द ।।

text:
All sacred songs have magnified Indra expansive as the sea,
 The best of warriors borne on cars, the Lord, the very Lord
 of Strength.
meaning: लो॒कं पृ॑ण छि॒द्रं पृ॒णाथो॑ सीद ध्रु॒वा त्वम् । इ॑न्द्रा॒ग्नी त्वा॒ बृह॒स्पति॑र॒स्मिन्योना॑वसीषदन् ।।

text:
Combine ye two and harmonize together, dear to each other,
 brilliant, friendly-minded,
 Abiding in one place for food and vigour.
meaning: ता अ॑स्य॒ सूद॑दोहसः॒ सोमँ॑ श्रीणन्ति॒ पृश्न॑यः । जन्म॑न्दे॒वानां॒ विश॑स्त्रि॒ष्वा रो॑च॒ने दि॒वः ।।

text:
Together have I brought your minds, your ordinances, and
 your thoughts.
 Be thou our Sovran Lord, Agni Purîshya; give food and
 vigour to the Sacrificer.
meaning: इन्द्रं॒ विश्वा॑ अवीवृधन्त्समु॒द्रव्य॑चसं॒ गिरः॑ । र॒थीत॑मँ र॒थीनां॒ वाजा॑नाँ॒ सत्प॑तिं॒ पति॑म् ।।

text:
Thou art Purîshya Agni, thou art wealthy, thou art prosperous.
 Having made all the regions blest, here seat thee in thine
 own abode.
meaning: समि॑तँ॒ सं क॑ल्पेथाँ॒ सम्प्रि॑यौ रोचि॒ष्णू सु॑मन॒स्यमा॑नौ । इष॒मूर्ज॑म॒भि सं॒वसा॑नौ ।।

text:
Be ye one-minded unto us, both of one thought, free from
 deceit.
 Harm not the sacrifice, harm not the Patron of the sacrifice.
 Be gracious unto us to-day, ye knowers of all things that be.
meaning: सं वां॒ मनाँ॑सि॒ सं व्र॒ता समु॑ चि॒त्तान्याक॑रम् । अग्ने॑ पुरीष्याधि॒पा भ॑व॒ त्वं न॒ इष॒मूर्जं॒ यज॑मानाय धेहि ।।

text:
Even as a mother bears her son, Earth, Ukhâ hath borne
 within her womb Purîshya Agni.
 Maker of all, accordant with the All-Gods and Seasons, may
 Prajâpati release her.
meaning: अग्ने॒ त्वं पु॑री॒ष्यो॑ रयि॒मान्पु॑ष्टि॒माँ अ॑सि । शि॒वाः कृ॒त्वा दिशः॒ सर्वाः॒ योनि॑मि॒हास॑दः ।।

text:
Seek him who pours not, offers not oblation; follow the
 going of the thief and robber.

This is thy way; leave us and seek some other. To thee,
 O Goddess Nirriti, be homage.
meaning: भव॑तं नः॒ सम॑नसौ॒ सचे॑तसावरे॒पसौ॑ । मा य॒ज्ञँ हिँ॑सिष्टं॒ मा य॒ज्ञप॑तिं जातवेदसौ शिवौ भवतम॒द्य नः॑ ।।

text:
To thee, sharp-pointed Nirriti, full homage! Loose and
 detach this iron bond that binds him.
 Unanimous with Yama and with Yamî to the sublimest
 vault of heaven uplift him.
meaning: मा॒तेव॑ पु॒त्रं पृ॑थि॒वी पु॑री॒ष्य॑म॒ग्निँ स्वे योना॑वभारु॒खा । तां विश्वै॑र्देवैरृ॒तुभिः॑ संविदा॒नः प्र॒जाप॑तिर्वि॒श्वक॑र्मा॒ वि मु॑ञ्चतु ।।

text:
Thou, Awful One, thou in whose mouth I offer for the unloosing
 of these binding fetters,
 Whom people hail as Earth with their glad voices, as Nirriti
 in every place I know thee.
meaning: असु॑न्वन्त॒मय॑जमानमिच्छ स्ते॒नस्ये॒त्यामन्वि॑हि॒ तस्क॑रस्य । अ॒न्यम॒स्मदि॑च्छ॒ सा त॑ इ॒त्या नमो॑ देवि निरृते॒ तुभ्य॑मस्तु ।।

text:
The binding noose which Nirriti the Goddess hath fastened
 on thy neck that none may loose it,
 I loose for thee as from the midst of Âyus. Sped forward
 now, eat thou the food we offer:
 To Fortune, her who hath done this, be homage.
meaning: नमः॒ सु ते॑ निरृते तिग्मतेजो य॒स्मयं॒ वि चृ॑ता ब॒न्धमे॒तम् । य॒मेन॒ त्वं य॒म्या सं॑विदा॒नोत्त॒मे ना॒के अधि॑ रोहयैनम् ।।

text:
Establisher, the gatherer of treasures, he looks with might
 on every form and figure.
 Like Savitar the God whose laws are constant, like Indra,
 he hath stood where meet the pathways.
meaning: यस्या॑स्ते घोर आ॒सन्जु॒होम्ये॒षां ब॒न्धाना॑मव॒सर्ज॑नाय । यां त्वा॒ जनो॒ भूमि॒रिति॑ प्र॒मन्द॑ते॒ निरृ॑तिं त्वा॒हं परि॑ वेद वि॒श्वतः॑ ।।

text:
Wise, through desire of bliss with Gods, the skilful bind the
 traces fast, and lay the yokes on either side.
meaning: यं ते॑ दे॒वी निरृ॑तिराब॒बन्ध॒ पाशं॑ ग्री॒वास्व॑विचृ॒त्यम् । तं ते॒ वि ष्या॒म्यायु॑षो॒ न मध्या॒दथै॒तं पि॒तुम॑द्धि॒ प्रसू॑तः । नमो॒ भूत्यै॒ येदं च॒कार॑ ।।

text:
Lay on the yokes and fasten well the traces; formed is the
 furrow sow the seed within it.
 Through song may we find hearing fraught with plenty:
 near to the ripened grain approach the sickle.
meaning: नि॒वेश॑नः सं॒गम॑नो॒ वसु॑नां॒ विश्वा॑ रू॒पाभि च॑ष्टे॒ शची॑भिः । दे॒व इ॑व सवि॒ता स॒त्यध॒र्मेन्द्रो॒ न त॑स्थौ सम॒रे प॑थी॒नाम् ।।

text:
Happily let the shares turn up the ploughland, happily go
 the ploughers with the oxen!
 Suna and Sîra, pleased with our oblation, cause ye our
 plants to bear abundant fruitage.
meaning: सीरा॑ युञ्जन्ति क॒वयो॑ यु॒गा वि त॑न्वते॒ पृथ॑क् । धीरा॑ दे॒वेषु॑ सूम्न॒या ।।

text:
Approved by Visvedevas and by Maruts, balmed be the
 furrow with sweet-flavoured fatness.
 Succulent, teeming with thy milky treasure, turn hitherward
 to us with milk, O Furrow.
meaning: यु॒नक्त॒ सीरा॒ वि यु॒गा त॑नुध्वं कृ॒ते योनौ॑ वपते॒ह बीज॑म् । गि॒रा च॑ श्रु॒ष्टिः सभ॑रा॒ अस॑न्नो॒ नेदी॑य॒ इत्सृ॒ण्यः॑ प॒क्वमेया॑त् ।।

text:
The keen-shared plough that bringeth bliss, good for the
 Soma-drinker's need,
 Shear out for me a cow, a sheep, a rapid drawer of the car,
 a blooming woman, plump and strong!
meaning: शु॒नँ सु पाला॒ वि कृ॑षन्तु॒ भूमिँ॑ शु॒नं की॒नाशा॑ अ॒भि य॑न्तु वाहैः । शुना॑सीरा ह॒विषा॒ तोश॑माना सुपिप्प॒ला ओष॑धीः कर्तना॒स्मे ।।

text:
Milk out their wish, O Wishing-Cow, to Mitra and to Varuna,
 To Indra, to the Asvins, to Pûshan, to people and to plants.
meaning: घृ॒तेन॒ सीता॒ मधु॑ना॒ सम॑ज्यतां॒ विश्वै॑र्देवै॒रनु॑मता म॒रुद्भिः॑ । ऊर्ज॑स्वती॒ पय॑सा॒ पिन्व॑माना॒स्मान्त्सी॑ते॒ पय॑सा॒भ्या व॑वृत्स्व ।।

text:
Be loosed, inviolable, Godward-farers! We have attained
 the limit of this darkness: we have won the light.
meaning: लाङ्ग॑लं॒ पवी॑रवत्सु॒शेवँ॑ सोम॒पित्स॑रु । तदुद्व॑पति॒ गामविं॑ प्रप॒र्व्यं॑ च॒ पीव॑रीं प्र॒स्थाव॑द्रथ॒वाह॑नम् ।।

text:
The year together with the darksome fortnights; Dawn with
 the ruddy-coloured cows about her; the Asvins with
 their wonderful achievements; the Sun together with his
 dappled Courser; Vaisvânara with Idâ and with butter.
 Svâhâ!
meaning: कामं॑ कामदुघे धुक्ष्व मि॒त्राय॒ वरु॑णाय च । इन्द्रा॑या॒श्विभ्यां॑ पू॒ष्णे प्र॒जाभ्य॒ ओष॑धीभ्यः ।।

text:
Herbs that sprang up in time of old, three ages earlier than
 the Gods,—
 Of these, whose hue is brown, will I declare the hundred
 powers and seven.
meaning: वि मु॑च्यध्वमघ्न्या देवयाना॒ अग॑न्म॒ तम॑सस्पा॒रम॒स्य ज्योति॑रापाम ।।

text:
Ye, Mothers, have a hundred homes, yea, and a thousand are
 your growths.
 Do ye who have a thousand powers free this my patient from
 disease.
meaning: स॒जूरब्दो॒ अय॑वोभिः स॒जूरु॒षा अरु॑णीभिः स॒जोष॑साव॒श्विना॒ दँसो॑भिः स॒जूः सूर॒ एत॑शेन स॒जूर्वै॑श्वान॒र इड॑या घृ॒तेन॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Be glad and joyful in the Plants, both blossoming and bearing
 fruit,
 Plants that will lead us to success like mares who conquer in
 the race.
meaning: या ओष॑धीः॒ पूर्वा॑ जा॒ता दे॒वेभ्य॑स्त्रियु॒गं पु॒रा । मनै॒ नु ब॒भ्रूणा॑म॒हँ श॒तं धामा॑नि स॒प्त च॑ ।।

text:
Plants, by this name I speak to you, Mothers, to you the
 Goddesses:
 Steed, cow, and garment may I win, win back thy very self,
 O man.
meaning: श॒तं वो॑ अम्ब॒ धामा॑नि स॒हस्र॑मु॒त वो॒ रुहः॑ । अधा॑ शतक्रत्वो यू॒यमि॒मं मे॑ अग॒दं कृ॑त ।।

text:
The Holy Fig tree is your home, your mansion is the Parna
 tree:
 Winners of cattle shall ye be if ye regain for me this man.
meaning: ओष॑धीः॒ प्रति॑ मोदध्वं॒ पुष्प॑वतीः प्र॒सूव॑रीः । अश्वा॑ इव स॒जित्व॑रीर्वी॒रुधः॑ पारयि॒ष्ण्वः॑ ।।

text:
He who hath store of Herbs at hand like Kings amid a crowd
 of men,—
 Physician is that sage's name, fiend-slayer, chaser of disease.
meaning: ओष॑धी॒रिति॑ मातर॒स्तद्वो॑ देवी॒रुप॑ ब्रुवे । स॒नेय॒मश्वं॒ गां वास॑ आ॒त्मानं॒ तव॑ पूरुष ।।

text:
Herbs rich in Soma, rich in steeds, in nourishment in strengthening
 power,
 All these have I provided here, that this man may be whole
 again.
meaning: अ॑श्व॒त्थे वो॑ नि॒षद॑नं प॒र्णे वो॑ वस॒तिष्कृ॒ता । गो॒भाज॒ इत्किला॑सथ॒ यत्स॒नव॑थ॒ पूरु॑षम् ।।

text:
The healing virtues of the Plants stream forth like cattle
 from the stall,—
 Plants that shall win me store of wealth, and save thy vital
 breath, O man.
meaning: यत्रौ॑षधीः स॒मग्म॑त॒ राजा॑नः॒ समि॑ताविव । विप्रः॒ स उ॑च्यते भि॒षग्र॑क्षो॒हामी॑व॒चात॑नः ।।

text:
Reliever is your mother's name, and hence Restorers are ye
 called.
 Rivers are ye with wings that fly: keep far whatever brings
 disease.
meaning: अ॑श्वाव॒तीँ सो॑माव॒तीमू॒र्जय॑न्ती॒मुदो॑जसम् । आवि॑त्सि॒ सर्वा॒ ओष॑धीर॒स्मा अ॑रि॒ष्टता॑तये ।।

text:
Over all fences have they passed, as steals a thief into the fold.
 The Plants have driven from the frame whatever malady was
 there.
meaning: उच्छुष्मा॒ ओष॑धीनां॒ गावो॑ गो॒ष्ठादि॑वेरते । धनँ॑ सनि॒ष्यन्ती॑नामा॒त्मानं॒ तव॑ पूरुष ।।

text:
When, bringing back the vanished strength, I hold these herbs
 within my hand,
 The spirit of disease departs ere he can seize upon the life.
meaning: इष्कृ॑ति॒र्नाम॑ वो मा॒ताथो॑ यू॒यँ स्थ॒ निष्कृ॑तीः । सी॒राः प॑त॒त्रिणी॑ स्थन॒ यदा॒मय॑ति॒ निष्कृ॑थ ।।

text:
He through whose frame, O Plants, ye creep member by
 member, joint by joint,
 From him ye drive away disease like some strong arbiter of
 strife.
meaning: अति॒ विश्वाः॑ परि॒ष्ठा स्ते॒न इ॑व व्र॒जम॑क्रमुः । ओष॑धीः॒ प्राचु॑च्यवु॒र्यत्किं च॑ त॒न्वो॒ रपः॑ ।।

text:
Fly, Spirit of Disease, begone, with the blue jay and kingfisher.
 Fly, with the wind's impetuous speed, vanish together with
 the storm.
meaning: यदि॒मा वा॒जय॑न्न॒हमोष॑धी॒र्हस्त॑ आद॒धे । आ॒त्मा यक्ष्म॑स्य नश्यति पु॒रा जी॑व॒गृभो॑ यथा ।।

text:
Help every one the other, lend assistance each of you to
 each,
 All of you be accordant, give furtherance to this speech of
 mine.
meaning: यस्यौ॑षधीः प्र॒सर्प॒थाङ्ग॑म्ङ्गं॒ परु॑ष्परुः । ततो॒ यक्ष्मं॒ वि बा॑धध्व उ॒ग्रो म॑ध्यम॒शीरि॑व ।।

text:
Let fruitful Plants, and fruitless, those that blossom, and
 the blossomless,
 Urged onward by Brihaspati, release us from our pain and
 grief;
meaning: सा॒कं य॑क्ष्म॒ प्रप॑त॒ चाषे॑ण किकिदी॒विना॑ । सा॒कं वात॑स्य॒ ध्राज्या॑ सा॒कं न॑श्य नि॒हाक॑या ।।

text:
Release
 me from the curse's plague and woe that comes from
 Varuna;
 Free me from Yama's fetter, from sin and offence against the
 Gods.
meaning: अ॒न्या वो॑ अ॒न्याम॑वत्व॒न्यान्यस्या॒ उपा॑वत । ताः सर्वाः॑ संविदा॒ना इ॒दं मे॒ प्राव॑ता॒ वचः॑ ।।

text:
What time, descending from the sky, the Plants flew earthward,
 thus they spake:
 No evil shall befall the man whom while he liveth we
 pervade.
meaning: याः प॒लिनी॒र्या अ॑प॒ला अ॑पु॒ष्पा याश्च॑ पु॒ष्पिणीः॑ । बृह॒स्पति॑प्रसूता॒स्ता नो॑ मुञ्च॒न्त्वँह॑सः ।।

text:
Of all the many Plants whose King is Soma, Plants of hundred
 forms,
 Thou art the Plant most excellent, prompt to the wish, sweet
 to the heart.
meaning: मु॒ञ्चन्तु॑ मा शप॒थ्या॒दथो॑ वरु॒ण्या॑दु॒त । अथो॑ य॒मस्य॒ पड्वी॑शा॒त्सर्व॑स्माद्देवकिल्वि॒षात् ।।

text:
O all ye various Herbs whose King is Soma, that o’erspread
 the earth,
 Urged onward by Brihaspati, combine your virtue in this
 Plant.
meaning: अ॑व॒पत॑न्तीरवदन्दि॒व ओष॑धय॒स्परि॑ । यं जी॒वम॒श्नवा॑महै॒ न स रि॑ष्याति॒ पूरु॑षः ।।

text:
All Plants that hear this speech, and those that have
 departed far away,
 Come all assembled and confer your healing power upon
 this Herb.
meaning: या ओष॑धीः॒ सोम॑राज्ञीर्ब॒ह्वीः श॒तवि॑चक्षणाः । तासा॑मसि॒ त्वमु॑त्त॒मारं॒ कामा॑य॒ शँ हृ॒दे ।।

text:
Unharmed be he who digs you up, unharmed the man for
 whom I dig:
 And let no malady attack biped or quadruped of ours.
meaning: या ओष॑धीः॒ सोम॑राज्ञी॒र्विष्ठि॑ताः पृथि॒वीमनु॑ । बृह॒स्पति॑प्रसूता अस्यै॒ सं द॑त्त वी॒र्य॑म् ।।

text:
With Soma as their Sovran Lord the Plants hold colloquy
 and say:
 O King, we save from death the man whose cure a Brâhman
 undertakes.
meaning: याश्चे॒दमु॑पशृ॒ण्वन्ति॒ याश्च॑ दू॒रं परा॑गताः । सर्वाः॑ सं॒गत्य॑ वीरुधो स्यै॒ सं द॑त्त वी॒र्य॑म् ।।

text:
Most excellent of all art thou, O Plant: thy vassals are the
 trees.
 Let him be subject to our power, the man who seeks to
 injure us.
meaning: मा वो॑ रिषत्खनि॒ता यस्मै॑ चा॒हं खना॑मि वः । द्वि॒पाच्चतु॑ष्पाद॒स्माकँ॒ सर्व॑मस्त्वनातु॒रम् ।।
ओष॑धयः॒ सम॑वदन्त॒ सोमे॑न स॒ह राज्ञा॑ । यस्मै॑ कृ॒णोति॑ ब्राह्म॒णस्तँ रा॑जन्पारयामसि ।।

text:
Thee did Gandharvas dig from earth, thee Indra and
 Brihaspati.
 King Soma, knowing thee, O Plant, from his Consumption
 was made free.
meaning: ना॑शयि॒त्री ब॒लास॒स्यार्श॑स उप॒चिता॑मसि । अथो॑ श॒तस्य॒ यक्ष्मा॑णां पाका॒रोर॑सि॒ नाश॑नी ।।

text:
Conquer mine enemies, the men who challenge me do thou
 subdue.
 Conquer thou all unhappiness: victorious art thou, O Plant.
meaning: त्वां ग॑न्ध॒र्वा अ॑खनँ॒स्त्वामिन्द्र॒स्त्वां बृह॒स्पतिः॑ । त्वामो॑षधे॒ सोमो॒ राजा॑ वि॒द्वान्यक्ष्मा॑दमुच्यत ।।

text:
Long-lived be he who digs thee, Plant, and he for whom I
 dig thee up.
 So mayst thou also, grown long-lived, rise upward with a
 hundred shoots.
meaning: सह॑स्व मे॒ अरा॑तीः॒ सह॑स्व पृतनाय॒तः । सह॑स्व॒ सर्वं॑ पा॒प्मानँ॒ सह॑मानास्योषधे ।।

text:
Most excellent of all art thou, O Plant; thy vassals are the
 trees.
 Let him be subject to our power, the man who seeks to
 injure us.
meaning: दी॒र्घायु॑स्त ओषधे खनि॒ता यस्मै॑ च त्वा॒ खना॑म्य॒हम् । अथो॒ त्वं दी॒र्घायु॑र्भू॒त्वा श॒तव॑ल्शा॒ वि रो॑हतात् ।।

text:
May he not harm me who is earth's begetter, nor he whose
 laws are faithful, sky's pervades;
 Nor he who first begot the lucid waters. To Ka the God
 let us present oblation.
meaning: त्वमु॑त्त॒मास्यो॑षधे॒ तव॑ वृ॒क्षा उप॑स्तयः । उप॑स्तिरस्तु॒ सो॒ स्माकं॒ यो अ॒स्माँ अ॑भि॒दास॑ति ।।

text:
Turn thyself hitherward, O Earth, to us with sacrifice and
 milk.
 Thy covering skin Agni, urged forth, hath mounted.
meaning: मा मा॑ हिँसीज्जनि॒ता यः पृ॑थि॒व्या यो वा॒ दिवँ॑ स॒त्यध॑र्मा॒ व्यान॑ट् । यश्चा॒पश्च॒न्द्राः प्र॑थ॒मो ज॒जान॒ कस्मै॑ दे॒वाय॑ ह॒विषा॑ विधेम ।।
अ॒भ्या व॑र्तस्व पृथिवि य॒ज्ञेन॒ पय॑सा स॒ह । व॒पां ते॑ अ॒ग्निरि॑षि॒तो अ॑रोहत् ।।

text:
I from this place have fed on strength and vigour, the
 womb of holy Law, stream of the mighty.
 In cows let it possess me and in bodies. I quit decline and
 lack of food, and sickness.
meaning: अग्ने॒ यत्ते॑ शु॒क्रं यच्च॒न्द्रं यत्पू॒तं यच्च॑ य॒ज्ञिय॑म् । तद्दे॒वेभ्यो॑ भरामसि ।।

text:
Agni, life-power and fame are thine: thy fires blaze mightily,
 thou rich in wealth of beams!
 Sage, passing bright, thou givest to the worshipper, with
 strength, the food that merits laud.
meaning: इष॒मूर्ज॑म॒हमि॒त आद॑मृ॒तस्य॒ योनिं॑ महि॒षस्य॒ धारा॑म् । आ मा॒ गोषु॑ विश॒त्वा त॒नूषु॒ जहा॑मि से॒दिमनि॑रा॒ममी॑वाम् ।।

text:
With brilliant, purifying sheen, with perfect sheen thou
 liftest up thyself in light.
 Thou, visiting both thy Mothers, aidest them as Son: thou
 joinest close the earth and heaven.
meaning: अग्ने॒ तव॒ श्रवो॒ वयो॒ महि॑ भ्राजन्ते अ॒र्चयो॑ विभावसो । बृह॑द्भानो॒ शव॑सा॒ वाज॑मु॒क्थ्यं॒ दधा॑सि दा॒शुषे॑ कवे ।।

text:
O Jâtavedas, Son of Strength, rejoice thyself, gracious, in
 our fair hymns and songs.
 In thee are treasured various forms of strengthening food,
 born nobly and of wondrous help.
meaning: पा॑व॒कव॑र्चाः शु॒क्रव॑र्चा॒ अनू॑नवर्चा॒ उदि॑यर्षि भा॒नुना॑ । पु॒त्रो मा॒तरा॑ वि॒चर॒न्नुपा॑वसि पृ॒णक्षि॒ रोद॑सी उ॒भे ।।

text:
Agni, spread forth, as Ruler, over living things: give wealth
 to us, Immortal God.
 Thou shinest out from beauty fair to look upon: thou
 leadest us to conquering power.
meaning: ऊर्जो॑ नपाज्जातवेदः सुश॒स्तिभि॒र्मन्द॑स्व धी॒तिभि॑र्हि॒तः । त्वे इषः॒ सं द॑धु॒र्भूरि॑वर्पसश्चि॒त्रोत॑यो वा॒मजा॑ताः ।।

text:
To him, the wise, who orders sacrifice, who hath great riches
 under his control,
 Thou givest blest award of good, and plenteous food, givest
 him wealth that conquers all.
meaning: इ॑र॒ज्यन्न॑ग्ने प्रथयस्व ज॒न्तुभि॑र॒स्मे रायो॑ अमर्त्य । स द॑र्श॒तस्य॒ वपु॑षो॒ वि रा॑जसि पृ॒णक्षि॑ सान॒सिं क्रतु॑म् ।।

text:
The men have set before them for their welfare Agni, strong,
 visible to all, the Holy.
 Thee, Godlike One, with ears to hear, most famous, men's
 generations magnify with praise-songs.
meaning: इ॑ष्क॒र्तार॑मध्व॒रस्य॒ प्रचे॑तसं॒ क्षय॑न्तँ॒ राध॑सो म॒हः । रा॒तिं वा॒मस्य॑ सु॒भगां॑ म॒हीमिषं॒ दधा॑सि सान॒सिँ र॒यिम् ।।

text:
Soma, wax great. From every side may vigorous powers
 unite in thee.
 Be in the gathering-place of strength.
meaning: ऋ॒तावा॑नं महि॒षं वि॒श्वद॑र्शतम॒ग्निँ सु॒म्नाय॑ दधिरे पु॒रो जनाः॑ । श्रुत्क॑र्णँ स॒प्रथ॑स्तमं त्वा गि॒रा दै॑व्यं॒ मानु॑षा यु॒गा ।।

text:
In thee be juicy nutriments united, and power and mighty
 foe-subduing vigour.
 Waxing to immortality, O Soma, win highest glory for
 thyself in heaven.
meaning: आ प्या॑यस्व॒ समे॑तु ते वि॒श्वतः॑ सोम॒ वृष्ण्य॑म् । भवा॒ वाज॑स्य संग॒थे ।।

text:
Wax, O most gladdening Soma, great through all thy
 filaments, and be
 A friend of most illustrious fame to prosper us.
meaning: सं ते॒ पयाँ॑सि॒ समु॑ यन्तु॒ वाजाः॒ सं वृष्ण्या॑न्यभिमाति॒षाहः॑ । आ॒प्याय॑मानो अ॒मृता॑य सोम दि॒वि श्रवाँ॑स्युत्त॒मानि॑ धिष्व ।।

text:
May Vatsa draw thy mind away, even from thy loftiest
 dwelling-place,
 Agni, with song that yearns for thee.
meaning: आ प्या॑यस्व मदिन्तम॒ सोम॒ विश्वे॑भिरँ॒शुभिः॑ । भवा॑ नः सु॒श्रव॑स्तमः॒ सखा॑ वृ॒धे ।।

text:
Agni, best Angiras, to thee all people who have pleasant
 homes
 Apart have turned to gain their wish.
meaning: आ ते॑ व॒त्सो मनो॑ यमत्पर॒माच्चि॑त्स॒धस्था॑त् । अग्ने॒ त्वांका॑मया गि॒रा ।।

text:
In dear homes, Agni, the desire of all that is and is to be,
 Shines forth the One Imperial Lord.
meaning: तुभ्यं॒ ता अ॑ङ्गिरस्तम॒ विश्वाः॑ सुक्षि॒तयः॒ पृथ॑क् । अग्ने॒ कामा॑य येमिरे ।।

text:
I TAKE within me Agni first, for increase of my wealth,
 good offspring, manly strength:
 So may the Deities wait on me.
meaning: मयि॑ गृह्णा॒म्यग्रे॑ अ॒ग्निँ रा॒यस्पोषा॑य सुप्रजा॒स्त्वाय॑ सु॒वीर्या॑य । मामु॑ दे॒वताः॑ सचन्ताम् ।।

text:
Thou art the waters’ back, the womb of Agni, around the
 ocean as it swells and surges.
 Waxing to greatness, resting on the lotus, spread forth in
 amplitude with heaven's own measure.
meaning: अ॒पां पृ॒ष्ठम॑सि॒ योनि॑र॒ग्नेः स॑मु॒द्रम॒भितः॒ पिन्व॑मानम् । वर्ध॑मानो म॒हाँ आ च॒ पुष्क॑रे दि॒वो मात्र॑या वरि॒म्णा प्र॑थस्व ।।

text:
Eastward at first was Brahma generated. Vena o’erspread
 the bright Ones from the summit,
 Disclosed his deepest nearest revelations, womb of existent
 and of non-existent.
meaning: ब्रह्म॑ जज्ञा॒नं प्र॑थ॒मं पु॒रस्ता॒द्वि सी॑म॒तः सु॒रुचो॑ वे॒न आ॑वः । स बु॒ध्न्या॑ उप॒मा अ॑स्य वि॒ष्ठाः स॒तश्च॒ योनि॒मस॑तश्च॒ वि वः॑ ।।

text:
In the beginning rose Hiranyagarbha, born Only Lord of all
 created being.
 He fixed and holdeth up this earth and heaven. Worship
 we Ka the God with our oblation.
meaning: हि॑रण्यग॒र्भः सम॑वर्त॒ताग्रे॑ भू॒तस्य॑ जा॒तः पति॒रेक॑ आसीत् । स दा॑धार पृथि॒वीं द्यामु॒तेमां कस्मै॑ दे॒वाय॑ ह॒विषा॑ विधेम ।।

text:
The Drop leaped onward through the earth and heaven,
 along this place and that which was before it.

I offer up, throughout the seven oblations, the Drop still
 moving to the common dwelling.
meaning: द्र॒प्सश्च॑स्कन्द पृथि॒वीमनु॒ द्यामि॒मं च॒ योनि॒मनु॒ यश्च॒ पूर्वः॑ । स॑मा॒नं योनि॒मनु॑ सं॒चर॑न्तं द्र॒प्सं जु॑हो॒म्यनु॑ स॒प्त होत्राः॑ ।।

text:
Homage be paid to Serpents unto all of them that are on
 earth,
 To those that dwell in air, to those that dwell in sky be
 homage paid.
meaning: नमो॑ स्तु स॒र्पेभ्यो॒ ये के च॑ पृथि॒वीमनु॑ । ये अ॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ ये दि॒वि तेभ्यः॑ स॒र्पेभ्यो॒ नमः॑ ।।

text:
To those that are the demons’ darts, to those that live upon
 the trees,
 To all the Serpents that lie low in holes be adoration paid.
meaning: या इष॑वो यातु॒धाना॑नां॒ ये वा॒ वन॒स्पतीँ॒स्तु । ये वा॑व॒टेषु॒ शेर॑ते॒ तेभ्यः॑ स॒र्पेभ्यो॒ नमः॑ ।।

text:
Or those that are in heaven's bright sphere, or those that
 dwell in the Sun's beams:
 Serpents, whose home has been prepared in waters, homage
 unto them!
meaning: ये वा॒मी रो॑च॒ने दि॒वो ये वा॒ सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिषु॑ । येषा॑म॒प्सु सद॑स्कृ॒तं तेभ्यः॑ स॒र्पेभ्यो॒ नमः॑ ।।

text:
Put forth like a wide-spreading net thy vigour: go like a
 mighty King with his attendants.
 Thou, following thy swift net, shootest arrows: transfix the
 fiends with darts that burn most fiercely.
meaning: कृ॑णु॒ष्व पाजः॒ प्रसि॑तिं॒ न पृ॒थ्वीं या॒हि राजे॒वाम॑वाँ॒ इभे॑न । तृ॒ष्वीमनु॒ प्रसि॑तिं द्रूणा॒नो स्ता॑सि॒ विध्य॑ र॒क्षस॒स्तपि॑ष्ठैः ।।

text:
Forth go in rapid flight thy whirling weapons: follow them
 closely glowing in thy fury.
 Spread with thy tongue the wingèd flames, O Agni: unfettered
 cast thy firebrands all around thee.
meaning: तव॑ भ्र॒मास॑ आशु॒या प॑त॒न्त्यनु॑ स्पृश धृष॒ता शोशु॑चानः । तपूँ॑ष्यग्ने जु॒ह्वा॑ पत॒ङ्गानसं॑दितो॒ वि सृ॑ज॒ विष्व॑गु॒ल्काः ।।

text:
Send thy spies forward, fleetest in thy motion: be, ne’er
 deceived, the guardian of this people
 From him who, near or far, is bent on evil, and let no
 trouble sent from thee o’ercome us.
meaning: प्रति॒ स्पशो॒ वि सृ॑ज॒ तूर्णि॑तमो॒ भवा॑ पा॒युर्वि॒शो अ॒स्या अद॑ब्धः । यो नो॑ दू॒रे अ॒घशँ॑सो॒ यो अन्त्यग्ने॒ माकि॑ष्टे॒ व्यथि॒रा द॑धर्षीत् ।।

text:
Rise up, O Agni, spread thee out before us, burn down our
 foes, thou who hast sharpened arrows.
 Him, blazing Agni! who hath worked us mischief, consume
 thou utterly like dried-up stubble.
meaning: उद॑ग्ने तिष्ठ॒ प्रत्या त॑नुष्व॒ न्य॒मित्राँ॑ ओषतात्तिग्महेते । यो नो॒ अरा॑तिँ समिधान च॒क्रे नी॒चा तं ध॑क्ष्यत॒सं न शुष्क॑म् ।।

text:
Rise, Agni, drive off those who fight against us: make
 manifest thine own celestial vigour.
 Slacken the strong bows of the demon-driven: destroy our
 foemen whether kin or stranger.
 I settle thee with Agni's fiery ardour.
meaning: ऊ॒र्ध्वो भ॑व॒ प्रति॑ वि॒ध्याध्य॒स्मदा॒विष्कृ॑णुष्व दैव्यान्यग्ने । अव॑ स्थि॒रा त॑नुहि यातु॒जूनां॑ जा॒मिमजा॑मिं॒ प्र मृ॑णीहि॒ शत्रू॑न् । अ॒ग्नेष्ट्वा॒ तेज॑सा सादयामि ।।

text:
Agni is head and height of heaven, the Master of the earth
 is he:
 He quickeneth the waters’ seed.
 I settle thee with the great strength of Indra.
meaning: अ॒ग्निर्मू॒र्धा दि॒वः क॒कुत्पतिः॑ पृथि॒व्या अ॒यम् । अ॒पाँ रेताँ॑सि जिन्वति । इन्द्र॑स्य त्वौजसा सादयामि ।।

text:
Thou art the leader of the rite and region to which with
 thine auspicious teams thou tendest.
 Thy light-bestowing head to heaven thou liftest, making
 thy tongue the oblation-bearer, Agni!
meaning: भुवो॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॒ रज॑सश्च ने॒ता यत्रा॑ नि॒युद्भिः॒ सच॑से शि॒वाभिः॑ । दि॒वि मू॒र्धानं॑ दधिषे स्व॒र्षां जि॒ह्वाम॑ग्ने चक्रिषे हव्य॒वाह॑म् ।।

text:
Steady art thou, sustainer, laid by Visvakarman in thy
 place.
 Let not the ocean nor the bird harm thee: unshaking, steady
 earth.
meaning: ध्रु॒वासि॑ ध॒रुणास्तृ॑ता वि॒श्वक॑र्मणा । मा त्वा॑ समु॒द्र उद्ब॑धी॒न्मा सु॑प॒र्णो व्य॑थमाना पृथि॒वीं दृँ॑ह ।।

text:
Thee let Prajâpati settle on the waters’ back, in Ocean's
 course,
 Thee the capacious, widely spread. Thou art the Wide
 One: spread thee wide
meaning: प्र॒जाप॑तिष्ट्वा सादयत्व॒पा पृ॒ष्ठे स॑मु॒द्रस्येम॑न् । व्यच॑स्वतीं॒ प्रथ॑स्वतीं॒ प्रथ॑स्व पृथि॒व्य॑सि ।।

text:
Thou art the earth, the ground, thou art the all-sustaining
 Aditi, she who supporteth all the world.
 Control the earth, steady the earth, do thou the earth no
 injury.
meaning: भूर॑सि॒ भूमि॑र॒स्यदि॑तिरसि वि॒श्वधा॑या॒ विश्व॑स्य॒ भुव॑नस्य ध॒र्त्री । पृ॑थि॒वीं य॑च्छ पृथि॒वीं दृँ॑ह पृथि॒वीं मा हिँ॑सीः ।।

text:
For all breath, out-breath; through-breath, upward-breathing,
 for high position, for prescribed observance,
 May Agni keep thee safe with great well-being, with the
 securest shelter. As aforetime with Angiras, with that
 Deity lie steady.
meaning: विश्व॑स्मै प्रा॒णाया॑पा॒नाय॑ व्या॒नायो॑दा॒नाय॑ प्रति॒ष्ठायै॑ च॒रित्रा॑य । अ॒ग्निष्ट्वा॒भि पा॑तु म॒ह्या स्व॒स्त्या छ॒र्दिषा॒ शंत॑मेन॒ तया॑ दे॒वत॑याङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वा सी॑द ।।

text:
Upspringing from thine every joint, upspringing from each
 knot of thine,

Thus with a thousand, Dûrvâ! with a hundred do thou
 stretch us out.
meaning: काण्डा॑त्काण्डात्प्र॒रोह॑न्ती॒ परु॑षःपरुष॒स्परि॑ । ए॒वा नो॒ दूर्वे॒ प्र त॑नु स॒हस्रे॑ण श॒तेन॑ च ।।

text:
Thou spreading with a hundred, thou that branched with
 a thousand shoots,
 Thee, such, with our oblation will we worship, O celestial
 Brick.
meaning: या श॒तेन॑ प्रत॒नोषि॑ स॒हस्रे॑ण वि॒रोह॑सि । तस्या॑स्ते देवीष्टके वि॒धेम॑ ह॒विषा॑ व॒यम् ।।

text:
Thy lights, O Agni, in the Sun that with their beams
 o’erspread the sky,—
 With all of those assist thou us to-day to light and progeny.
 23. Lights of yours in the Sun, O Gods, or lights that are in
 kine and steeds,
 O Indra-Agni, with all those vouchsafe us light, Brihaspati!
meaning: यास्ते॑ अग्ने॒ सूर्ये॒ रुचो॒ दिव॑मात॒न्वन्ति॑ र॒श्मिभिः॑ । ताभि॑र्नो अ॒द्य सर्वा॑भी रु॒चे जना॑य नस्कृधि ।।

text:
The Far.-Refulgent held the light. The Self-Refulgent held
 the light.
 Thee, luminous, may Prajâpati settle upon the back of Earth.
 Give, to all breathing, all the light, to out-breath, to diffusive
 breath.
 Thy Sovran Lord is Agni. With that Deity, as with Angiras,
 lie firmly settled in thy place.
meaning: या वो॑ दे॒वाः सूर्ये॒ रुचो॒ गोष्वश्वे॑षु॒ या रुचः॑ । इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ ताभिः॒ सर्वा॑भी॒ रुचं॑ नो धत्त बृहस्पते ।।

text:
Madhu and Mâdhava, the two Spring seasons—thou art
 the innermost cement of Agni.
 May Heaven and Earth, may Waters, Plants and Agnis
 help, separate, accordant, my precedence.
 May all the Fires ’twixt heaven and earth, one-minded,
 well-fitted, gather round these two Spring seasons,
 As the Gods gathering encompass Indra: firm with that
 Deity, Angiras-like, be seated.
meaning: वि॒राड्ज्योति॑रधारयत् । स्व॒राड्ज्योति॑रधारयत् । प्र॒जाप॑तिष्ट्वा सादयतु पृ॒ष्ठे पृ॑थि॒व्या ज्योति॑ष्मतीम् । विश्व॑स्मै प्रा॒णाया॑पा॒नाय॑ व्या॒नाय॒ विश्वं॒ ज्योति॑र्यच्छ । अ॒ग्निष्टे धि॑पति॒स्तया॑ दे॒वत॑याङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वा सी॑द ।।

text:
Thou art Ashâdhâ, Conquering One. Conquer our foemen,
 conquer thou the men who fain would-fight with us.
 A thousand manly powers hast thou: so do thou aid and
 quicken me.
meaning: मधु॑श्च॒ माध॑वश्च॒ वास॑न्तिकावृ॒तू अ॒ग्नेर॑न्तःश्ले॒षो॑ सि॒ कल्पे॑तां॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी कल्प॑न्ता॒माप॒ ओष॑धयः॒ कल्प॑न्ताम॒ग्नयः॒ पृथ॒ङ्नम ज्यैष्ठ्याय॒ सव्र॑ताः । ये अ॒ग्नयः॒ सम॑नसो न्त॒रा द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी इ॒मे वास॑न्तिकावृ॒तू अ॑भि॒कल्प॑माना॒ इन्द्र॑मिव दे॒वा अ॑भि॒सं वि॑शन्तु॒ तया॑ दे॒वत॑याङ्गिर॒स्वद्ध्रु॒वे सी॑दतम् ।।

text:
The winds waft sweets, the rivers pour sweets for the man
 who keeps the Law:
 So may the plants be sweet for us.
meaning: अषा॑ढासि॒ सह॑माना॒ सह॒स्वारा॑तीः॒ सह॑स्व पृतनाय॒तः । स॒हस्र॑वीर्यासि॒ सा मा॑ जिन्व ।।

text:
Sweet be the night and sweet the dawns, sweet the terrestrial
 atmosphere:
 Sweet be our Father Heaven to us.
meaning: मधु॒ वाता॑ ऋताय॒ते मधु॑ क्षरन्ति॒ सिन्ध॑वः । माध्वी॑र्नः स॒न्त्वोष॑धीः ।।

text:
May the tall tree be full of sweets for us and, and full of
 sweets the Sun:
 May our milch-kine be sweet for us.
meaning: मधु॒ नक्त॑मु॒तोषसो॒ मधु॑म॒त्पार्थि॑वँ॒ रजः॑ । मधु द्यौरस्तु नः पि॒ता ।।

text:
Seat thyself in the deepness of the waters, lest Sûrya, lest
 Vaisvânara Agni scorch thee.
 With wing unclipped, survey created beings: may rain
 that cometh down from heaven attend thee.
meaning: मधु॑मान्नो॒ वन॒स्पति॒र्मधु॑माँ अस्तु॒ सूर्यः॑ । माध्वी॒र्गावो॑ भवन्तु नः ।।

text:
He crept across the three heaven-reaching oceans, the Bull
 of Bricks, the Master of the Waters.
 Clad in the world with his, the Well-Made's, vesture, go
 whither those before thee have departed.
meaning: अ॒पां गम्भ॑न्त्सीद॒ मा त्वा॒ सूर्यो॒ भि ता॑प्सी॒न्माग्निर्वै॑श्वान॒रः । अच्छि॑न्नपत्राः प्र॒जा अ॑नु॒वीक्ष॒स्वानु॑ त्वा दि॒व्या वृष्टिः॑ सचताम् ।।

text:
May Heaven and Earth, the Mighty Pair, besprinkle this our
 sacrifice,
 And feed us full with nourishments.
meaning: त्रीन्त्स॑मु॒द्रान्त्सम॑सृपत्स्व॒र्गान॒पां पति॑र्वृष॒भ इष्ट॑कानाम् । पुरी॑षं॒ वसा॑नः सुकृ॒तस्य॑ लो॒के तत्र॑ गच्छ॒ यत्र॒ पूर्वे॒ परे॑ताः ।।

text:
