 He, seeking with his wish a great possession, came among
 men on earth as archetypal.
meaning: य इ॒मा विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि॒ जुह्व॒दृषि॒र्होता॒ न्यसी॑दत्पि॒ता नः॑ । स आ॒शिषा॒ द्रवि॑णमि॒च्छमा॑नः प्रथम॒च्छदव॑राँ॒ आ वि॑वेश ।।

text:
What was the place whereon he took his station? What was
 it that upheld him? What the manner,
 Whence Visvakarman, seeing all, producing the earth, with
 mighty power disclosed the heavens?
meaning: किँ स्वि॑दासीदधि॒ष्ठान॑मा॒रम्भ॑णं कत॒मत्स्वि॑त्क॒थासी॑त् । यतो॒ भूमिं॑ ज॒नय॑न्वि॒श्वक॑र्मा॒ वि द्याऔ॑र्णोन्महि॒ना वि॒श्वच॑क्षाः ।।

text:
He who hath eyes on all sides round about him, a mouth on
 all sides, arms and feet on all sides,
 He the sole God, producing earth and heaven, weldeth them
 with his arms as wings together.
meaning: वि॒श्वत॑श्चक्षुरु॒त वि॒श्वतो॑मुखो वि॒श्वतो॑बाहुरु॒त वि॒श्वत॑स्पात् । सं बा॒हुभ्यां॒ धम॑ति॒ सं पत॑त्रै॒र्द्यावा॒भूमी॑ ज॒नय॑न्दे॒व एकः॑ ।।

text:
What was the tree, what wood in sooth produced it, from
 which they fashioned out the earth and heaven?
 Ye thoughtful men, inquire within your spirit whereon he
 stood when he established all things.
meaning: किँ स्वि॒द्वनं॒ क उ॒ स वृ॒क्ष आ॑स॒ यतो॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी नि॑ष्टत॒क्षुः । मनी॑षिणो॒ मन॑सा पृ॒च्छतेदु॒ तद्यद॒ध्यति॑ष्ठ॒द्भुव॑नानि धा॒रय॑न् ।।

text:
Thine highest, lowest sacrificial natures, and these thy
 midmost here, O Visvakarman,
 Teach thou thy friends at sacrifice, O Blessèd, and come thy-
 self, exalted, to our worship.
meaning: या ते॒ धामा॑नि पर॒माणि॒ याव॒मा या म॑ध्य॒मा वि॑श्वकर्मन्नु॒तेमा । शिक्षा॒ सखि॑भ्यो ह॒विषि॑ स्वधावः स्व॒यं य॑जस्व त॒न्वं॑ वृधा॒नः ।।

text:
Bring those, thyself exalted with oblation, O Visvakarman,
 Earth and Heaven to worship.
 Let enemies around us live in folly: here let us have a rich
 and liberal patron.
 23, 24. = VIII. 45, 46.
meaning: विश्व॑कर्मन्ह॒विषा॑ वावृधा॒नः स्व॒यं य॑जस्व पृथि॒वीमु॒त द्याम् । मुह्य॑न्त्व॒न्ये अ॒भितो॑ स॒पत्ना॑ इ॒हास्माकं॑ म॒घवा॑ सू॒रिर॑स्तु ।।

text:
The Father of the eye, the Wise in spirit, created both these
 worlds submerged in fatness.
 Then when the eastern ends were firmly fastened, the heavens
 and the earth were far extended.
meaning: वा॒चस्पतिं॑ वि॒श्वक॑र्माणमू॒तये॑ मनो॒जुवं॒ वाजे॑ अ॒द्या हु॑वेम । स नो॒ विश्वा॑नि॒ हव॑नानि जोषद्वि॒श्वश॑म्भू॒रव॑से सा॒धुक॑र्मा ।।

text:
Mighty in mind and power is Visvakarman, Maker, Disposer,
 and most lofty Presence.

Their offerings joy in rich juice where they value One, only
 One beyond the Seven Rishis.
meaning: विश्व॑कर्मन्ह॒विषा॒ वर्ध॑नेन त्रा॒तार॒मिन्द्र॑मकृणोरव॒ध्यम् । तस्मै॒ विशः॒ सम॑नमन्त पू॒र्वीर॒यमु॒ग्रो वि॒हव्यो॒ यथास॑त् ।।

text:
Father who made us, he who, as Disposer, knoweth all races
 and all things existing,
 Even he alone, the Deities’ name-giver,—him other beings
 seek for information.
meaning: चक्षु॑षः पि॒ता मन॑सा॒ हि धीरो॑ घृ॒तमे॑ने अजन॒न्नम्न॑माने । य॒देदन्ता॒ अद॑दृहन्त॒ पूर्व॒ आदिद्द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी अ॑प्रथेताम् ।।

text:
To him in sacrifice they offered treasures,—Rishis of old, in
 numerous troops, as singers,
 Who, in the distant, near, and lower region, made ready all
 these things that have existence.
meaning: वि॒श्वक॑र्मा॒ विम॑ना॒ आद्विहा॑या धा॒ता वि॑धा॒ता प॑र॒मोत सं॒दृक् । तेषा॑मि॒ष्टानि॒ समि॒षा म॑दन्ति॒ यत्रा॑ सप्तऋ॒षीन्प॒र एक॑मा॒हुः ।।

text:
That which is earlier than this earth and heaven, before the
 Asuras and Gods had being,
 What was the germ primeval which the waters received where
 the first Gods beheld each other?
meaning: यो नः॑ पि॒ता ज॑नि॒ता यो वि॑धा॒ता धामा॑नि॒ वेद॒ भुव॑नानि॒ विश्वा॑ । यो दे॒वानां॑ नाम॒धा एक॑ ए॒व तँ सं॑प्र॒श्नं भुव॑ना यन्त्य॒न्या ।।

text:
The waters, they received that germ primeval wherein the
 Gods were gathered all together.
 It rested set upon the Unborn's navel, that One wherein abide
 all things existing.
meaning: त आय॑जन्त॒ द्रवि॑णँ॒ सम॑स्मा॒ ऋष॑यः॒ पूर्वे॑ जरि॒तारो॒ न भू॒ना । अ॒सूर्ते॒ सूर्ते॒ रज॑सि निष॒त्ते ये भू॒तानि॑ स॒मकृ॑ण्वन्नि॒मानि॑ ।।

text:
Ye will not find him who produced these creatures: another
 thing hath risen up among you.
 Enwrapt in misty cloud, with lips that stammer, hymn-chanters
 wander and are discontented.
meaning: प॒रो दि॒वा प॒र ए॒ना पृ॑थि॒व्या प॒रो दे॒वेभि॒रसु॑रै॒र्यदस्ति॑ । कँ स्वि॒द्गर्भं॑ प्रथ॒मं द॑ध्र॒ आपो॒ यत्र॑ दे॒वाः स॒मप॑श्यन्त॒ पूर्वे॑ ।।

text:
First was the God engendered, Visvakarman: then the
 Gandharva sprang to life as second.
 Third in succession was the plants’ begetter: he laid the
 waters’ germ in many places.
meaning: तमिद्गर्भं॑ प्रथ॒मं द॑ध्र॒ आपो॒ यत्र॑ दे॒वाः स॒मग॑च्छन्त॒ विश्वे॑ । अ॒जस्य॒ नाभा॒वध्येक॒मर्पि॑तं॒ यस्मि॒न्विश्वा॑नि॒ भुव॑नानि त॒स्थुः ।।

text:
Swift, rapidly striking, like a bull who sharpens his horns,
 terrific, stirring up the people,
 With eyes that close not, bellowing, Sole Hero, Indra subdued
 at once a hundred armies.
meaning: न तं वि॑दाथ॒ य इ॒मा ज॒जाना॒न्यद्यु॒ष्माक॒मन्त॑रं बभूव । नी॑हा॒रेण॒ प्रावृ॑ता॒ जल्प्या॑ चासु॒तृप॑ उक्थ॒शास॑श्चरन्ति ।।

text:
With him loud-roaring, ever watchful, Victor, bold, hard to
 overthrow, Rouser of battle,
 Indra the Strong, whose hand bears arrows, conquer, ye
 warriors, now, now vanquish in the combat.
meaning: वि॒श्वक॑र्मा॒ ह्यज॑निष्ट दे॒व आदिद्ग॑न्ध॒र्वो अ॑भवद्द्वि॒तीयः॑ । तृ॒तीयः॑ पि॒ता ज॑नितौषधीनाम॒पां गर्भं॒ व्य॑दधात्पुरु॒त्रा ।।

text:
He rules with those who carry shafts and quivers, Indra who
 with his band brings hosts together,
 Foe-conquering, strong of arm, the Soma-drinker, with mighty
 bow, shooting with well-laid arrows.
meaning: आ॒शुः शिशा॑नो वृष॒भो न भी॒मो घ॑नाघ॒नः क्षोभ॑णश्चर्षणी॒नाम् । सं॒क्रन्द॑नो निमि॒ष ए॑कवी॒रः श॒तँ सेना॑ अजयत्सा॒कमिन्द्रः॑ ।।

text:
Brihaspati, fly with thy chariot hither, slayer of demons,
 driving off our foemen.
 Be thou protector of our cars, destroyer, victor in battle,
 breaker-up of armies.
meaning: सं॒क्रन्द॑नेनानिमि॒षेण॑ जि॒ष्णुना॑ युत्का॒रेण॑ दुश्च्यव॒नेन॑ धृ॒ष्णुना॑ । तदिन्द्रे॑ण जयत॒ तत्स॑हध्वं॒ युधो॑ नर॒ इषु॑हस्तेन॒ वृष्णा॑ ।।

text:
Conspicuous by thy strength, firm, foremost fighter, mighty
 and fierce, victorious, all-subduing,
 The Son of Conquest, passing men and heroes, kine-winner,
 mount thy conquering car, O Indra.
meaning: स इषु॑हस्तैः॒ स नि॑ष॒ङ्गिभि॑र्व॒शी सँस्र॑ष्टा॒ स युध॒ इन्द्रो॑ ग॒णेन॑ । सँ॑सृष्ट॒जित्सो॑म॒पा बा॑हुश॒र्ध्यु॒ग्रध॑न्वा॒ प्रति॑हिताभि॒रस्ता॑ ।।

text:
Cleaver of stalls, kine-winner, armed with thunder, who quells
 an army and with might destroys it,
 Follow him, brothers! quit yourselves like heroes, and like
 this Indra show your zeal and courage.
meaning: बृह॑स्पते॒ परि॑ दीया॒ रथे॑न रक्षो॒हामित्रा॑नप॒बाध॑मानः । प्र॑भ॒ञ्जन्त्सेनाः॑ प्रमृ॒णो यु॒धा जय॑न्न॒स्माक॑मेध्यवि॒ता रथा॑नाम् ।।

text:
Piercing the cow-stalls with surpassing vigour, Indra, the
 pitiless Hero, wild with anger,
 Victor in fight, unshaken and resistless,—may he protect our
 armies in our battles.
meaning: ब॑लविज्ञा॒य स्थवि॑रः॒ प्रवी॑रः॒ सह॑स्वान्वा॒जी सह॑मान उ॒ग्रः । अ॒भिवी॑रो अ॒भिस॑त्वा सहो॒जा जै॑त्रमिन्द्र॒ रथ॒मा ति॑ष्ठ गो॒वित् ।।

text:
Indra guide these: Brihaspati precede them, the guerdon,
 and the sacrifice, and Soma;
 And let the banded Maruts march in forefront of heavenly
 hosts that conquer and demolish.
meaning: गो॑त्र॒भिदं॑ गो॒विदं॒ वज्र॑बाहुं॒ जय॑न्त॒मज्म॑ प्रमृ॒णन्त॒मोज॑सा । इ॒मँ स॑जाता॒ अनु॑ वीरयध्व॒मिन्द्रँ॑ सखायो॒ अनु॒ सँ र॑भध्वम् ।।

text:
Ours be the potent host of mighty Indra, King Varuna, and
 Maruts, and Âdityas.
 Uplifted is the shout of Gods who conquer, high-minded Gods
 who cause the worlds to tremble.
meaning: अ॒भि गो॒त्राणि॒ सह॑सा॒ गाह॑मानो द॒यो वी॒रः श॒तम॑न्यु॒रिन्द्रः॑ । दु॑श्च्यव॒नः पृ॑तना॒षाड॑यु॒ध्यो॒ स्माकँ॒ सेना॑ अवतु॒ प्र यु॒त्सु ।।

text:
Bristle thou up, O Bounteous Lord, our weapons: excite the
 spirits of my warring heroes.
 Urge on the strong steeds’ might, O Vritra-slayer, and let the
 din of conquering cars go upward.
meaning: इन्द्र॑ आसां ने॒ता बृह॒स्पति॒र्दक्षि॑णा य॒ज्ञः पु॒र ए॑तु॒ सोमः॑ । दे॑वसे॒नाना॑मभिभञ्जती॒नां जय॑न्तीनां म॒रुतो॑ य॒न्त्वग्र॑म् ।।

text:
May Indra aid us when our flags are gathered: victorious be
 the arrows of our army.
 May our brave men of war prevail in battle. Ye Gods protect
 us in the shout of onset.
meaning: इन्द्र॑स्य॒ वृष्णो॒ वरु॑णस्य॒ राज्ञ॑ आदि॒त्यानां॑ म॒रुताँ॒ शर्ध॑ उ॒ग्रम् । म॒हाम॑नसां भुवनच्य॒वानां॒ घोषो॑ दे॒वानां॒ जय॑ता॒मुद॑स्थात् ।।

text:
Bewildering the senses of our foemen, seize thou their bodies
 and depart, O Apvâ.
 Attack them, set their hearts on fire and burn them: so let
 our foes abide in utter darkness.
meaning: उद्ध॑र्षय मघव॒न्नायु॑धा॒न्युत्सत्व॑नां माम॒कानां॒ मनाँ॑सि । उद्वृ॑त्रहन्वा॒जिनां॒ वाजि॑ना॒न्युद्रथा॑नां॒ जय॑तां यन्तु॒ घोषाः॑ ।।

text:
Loosed from the bowstring fly awry, O Arrow, sharpened by
 our prayer.
 Go to the foemen, strike them home, and let not one of
 them escape.
meaning: अ॒स्माक॒मिन्द्रः॒ समृ॑तेषु ध्व॒जेष्व॒स्माकं॒ या इष॑व॒स्ता ज॑यन्तु । अ॒स्माकं॑ वी॒रा उत्त॑रे भवन्त्व॒स्माँ उ॑ देवा अवता॒ हवे॑षु ।।

text:
Advance, O heroes, win the day. May Indra be your sure
 defence.
 Exceeding mighty be your arms, that none may wound or
 injure you.
meaning: अ॒मीषां॑ चि॒त्तं प्र॑तिलो॒भय॑न्ती गृहा॒णाङ्गा॑न्यप्वे॒ परे॑हि । अ॒भि प्रेहि॒ निर्द॑ह हृ॒त्सु शोकै॑र॒न्धेना॒मित्रा॒स्तम॑सा सचन्ताम् ।।

text:
That army of our enemies, O Maruts, that comes against
 us with its might,
contending
,
 Meet ye and wrap it in unwelcome darkness so that not one
 of them may know another.
meaning: अव॑सृष्टा॒ परा॑ पत॒ शर॑व्ये॒ ब्रह्म॑सँशिते । गच्छा॒मित्रा॒न्प्र प॑द्यस्व॒ मामीषां॒ कं च॒नोच्छि॑षः ।।

text:
There where the flights of arrows fall like boys whose locks
 are yet unshorn,
 May Indra, may Brihaspati, may Aditi protect us well, protect
 us well through all our days.
meaning: प्रेता॒ जय॑ता नर॒ इन्द्रो॑ वः॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतु । उ॒ग्रा वः॑ सन्तु बा॒हवो॑ नाधृ॒ष्या यथास॑थ ।।

text:
Thy vital parts I cover with thine armour: with immortality
 King Soma clothe thee.
 Varuna give thee what is more than ample, and in thy
 triumph may the Gods be joyful.
meaning: असौ॒ या सेना॑ मरुतः॒ परे॑षामभ्यैति न॒ ओज॑सा॒ स्पर्ध॑माना । तां गू॑हत॒ तम॒साप॑व्रतेन॒ यथा॒मी अ॒न्यो अ॒न्यं न जा॒नन् ।।

text:
Worshipped with butter, Agni, lead this man to high
 preeminence.
 Vouchsafe him growth of riches and multiply him with

progeny
.
meaning: यत्र॑ वाणाः स॒म्पत॑न्ति कुमा॒रा वि॑शि॒खा इ॑व । तत्र॒ इन्द्रो॒ बृह॒स्पति॒रदि॑तिः॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतु वि॒श्वाहा॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतु ।।

text:
Indra, lead him to eminence: controller of his foes be he.
 Vouchsafe him lustre: let him give their sacred portions to
 the Gods.
meaning: मर्मा॑णि ते॒ वर्म॑णा छादयामि॒ सोम॑स्त्वा॒ राजा॒मृते॒नानु॑ वस्ताम् । उ॒रोर्वरी॑यो॒ वरु॑णस्ते कृणोतु॒ जय॑न्तं॒ त्वानु॑ दे॒वा म॑दन्तु ।।

text:
The man within whose house we pay oblation, Indra, prosper
 him.
 May the Gods bless and comfort him, they and this
 Brahmanaspati.
meaning: उदे॑नमुत्त॒रां न॒याग्ने॑ घृतेनाहुत । रा॒यस्पोषे॑ण॒ रँ सृ॑ज प्र॒जया॑ च ब॒हुं कृ॑धि ।।

text:
May the All-Gods, O Agni, bear and lift thee upward with
 their thoughts.
 Fair to be looked on, rich in light, he thou propitious unto
 us.
meaning: इन्द्रे॒मं प्र॑त॒रां न॑य सजा॒ताना॑मसद्व॒शी । समे॑नं॒ वर्च॑सा सृज दे॒वानां॑ भाग॒दा अ॑सत् ।।

text:
May the Five Regions guard, divine, our worship, Goddesses
 chasing lack of thought and hatred,
 Giving the Sacrificer growth of riches. Let sacrifice be based
 on growth of riches.
meaning: यस॑य कु॒र्मो गृ॒हे ह॒विस्तम॑ग्ने वर्धया॒ त्वम् । तस्मै॑ दे॒वा अधि॑ ब्रवन्न॒यं च॒ ब्रह्म॑ण॒स्पतिः॑ ।।

text:
Inspirited above enkindled Agni, adorable, winged with
 hymns, was it accepted,
 When the Gods offered sacrifice with viands, circling the
 heated caldron, paving worship.
meaning: उदु॑ त्वा॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अग्ने॑ भरन्तु॒ चित्ति॑भिः । स नो॑ बह्व शि॒वस्त्वँ सु॒प्रती॑को वि॒भाव॑सुः ।।

text:
Lord of a hundred draughts. benign, God-serving—to him
 divine, establisher, protector,
 The Gods approached the sacrifice, encircling. Gods for the
 Gods stood fain for sacred service.
meaning: पञ्च॒ दिशो दैवीर्य॒ज्ञम॑वन्तु दे॒वीरपाम॑तिं॒ दुर्म॑तिं॒ बाध॑मानाः । रा॒यस्पोषे॑ य॒ज्ञप॑तिमा॒भज॑न्ती रा॒यस्पोषे॒ अधि॑ य॒ज्ञो अ॑स्थात् ।।

text:
When the fourth sacrifice reaches the oblation, accepted offering
 which hath been made ready, fit for the Inmolator's
 sacrificing,
 Thence bless us prayers and holy recitations!
meaning: समि॑द्धे अ॒ग्नावधि॑ मामहा॒न उ॒क्थप॑त्र॒ ईड्यो॑ गृभी॒तः । त॒प्तं घ॒र्मं प॑रि॒गृह्या॑यजन्तो॒र्जा यद्य॒ज्ञमय॑जन्त दे॒वाः ।।

text:
Savitar, golden-hued, hath lifted eastward, bright with the
 sunbeams, his eternal lustre,
 He at whose furtherance wise Pûshan marches surveying all
 existence like a herdsman.
meaning: दै॑व्याय ध॒र्त्रे जोष्ट्रे॑ देव॒श्रीः श्रीम॑नाः श॒तप॑याः । प॑रि॒गृह्य॑ दे॒वा य॒ज्ञमा॑यन्दे॒वा दे॒वेभ्यो॑ अध्व॒र्यन्तो॑ अस्थुः ।।

text:
He sits, the measurer, in the midst of heaven, filling the two
 world-halves and air's mid-region.
 He looks upon the rich far-spreading pastures between the
 eastern and the western limit.
meaning: वी॒तँ ह॒विः श॑मि॒तँ श॑मि॒ता य॒जध्यै॑ तु॒रीयो॑ य॒ज्ञो यत्र॑ ह॒व्यमेति॑ । ततो॑ वा॒का आ॒शिषो॑ नो जुषन्ताम् ।।

text:
Steer, Sea, Red Bird with strong wings, he hath entered the
 dwelling-place of the Primeval Father.
 A gay-hued Stone set in the midst of heaven, he hath gone
 forth and guards the air's two limits.
meaning: सूर्य॑रश्मि॒र्हरि॑केशः पु॒रस्ता॑त्सवि॒ता ज्योति॒रुद॑याँ॒ अज॑स्रम् । तस्य॑ पू॒षा प्र॑स॒वे या॑ति वि॒द्वान्त्स॒म्पश्य॒न्विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि गो॒पाः ।।

text:
All sacred songs have glorified Indra expansive as the sea,
 The best of warriors borne on cars, the Lord, the Very Lord
 of strength.
meaning: वि॒मान॑ ए॒ष दि॒वो मध्य॑ आस्त आपप्रि॒वान्रोद॑सी अ॒न्तरि॑क्षम् । स वि॒श्वाची॑र॒भि च॑ष्टे घृ॒ताची॑रन्त॒रा पूर्व॒मप॑रं च के॒तुम् ।।

text:
May God-invoking sacrifice bring the Gods hitherward to us.
 May bless-invoking sacrifice bring the Gods hitherward to us.
 May Agni, God, make offering and hither bring the Gods to
 us.
meaning: उ॒क्षा स॑मु॒द्रो अ॑रु॒णः सु॑प॒र्णः पूर्व॑स्य॒ योनिं॑ पि॒तुरा वि॑वेश । मध्ये॑ दि॒वो निहि॑तः॒ पृश्नि॒रश्मा॒ वि च॑क्रमे॒ रज॑सस्पा॒त्यन्तौ॑ ।।

text:
May the abundant growth of wealth with elevation lift me
 up,
 And with his subjugating power may Indra keep my foemen
 down.
meaning: इन्द्रं॒ विश्वा॑ अवीवृधन्त्समु॒द्रव्य॑चसं॒ गिरः॑ । र॒थीत॑मँ र॒थीनां॒ वाजा॑नाँ॒ सत्प॑तिं॒ पति॑म् ।।

text:
Upraising and depression and devotion may the Gods increase.
 May Indra, too, and Agni drive my foes away to every side.
meaning: दे॑व॒हूर्य॒ज्ञ आ च॑ वक्षत्सुम्न॒हूर्य॒ज्ञ आ च॑ वक्षत् । यक्ष॑द॒ग्निर्दे॒वो दे॒वाँ आ च॑ वक्षत् ।।

text:
Go ye by Agni to the sky bearing the Ukhya in your hands.
 Reaching the heights of sky and heaven stay intermingled
 with the Gods.
meaning: वज॑स्य मा प्रस॒वे उ॑द्ग्रा॒भेणोद॑ग्रभीत् । अध॑ स॒पत्ना॒निन्द्रो॑ मे निग्रा॒भेणाध॑राँ अकः ।।

text:
Agni, go forward to the eastern region, well-skilled, be here
 the fire in front of Agni.
 Illuming all the quarters, shine with splendour: supply with
 food our quadrupeds and bipeds.
meaning: उ॑द्ग्रा॒भं च॑ निग्रा॒भं च॒ ब्रह्म॑ दे॒वा अ॑वीवृधन् । अधा॑ स॒पत्ना॑निन्द्रा॒ग्नी मे॑ विषू॒चीना॒न्व्य॑स्यताम् ।।

text:
From earth to air's mid-region have I mounted, and from
 mid-air ascended up to heaven.
 From the high pitch of heaven's cope I came into the world
 of light.
meaning: क्रम॑ध्वम॒ग्निना॒ नाक॒मुख्यँ॒ हस्ते॑षु॒ बिभ्र॑तः । दि॒वस्पृ॒ष्ठँ स्व॑र्ग॒त्वा मि॒श्रा दे॒वेभि॑राध्वम् ।।

text:
Mounting the sky they look not round: they rise to heaven
 through both the worlds—
 Sages who span the sacrifice that pours its stream on every side.
meaning: प्राची॒मनु॑ प्र॒दिशं॒ प्रेहि॑ वि॒द्वान॒ग्नेर॑ग्ने पुरोअग्निर्भवे॒ह । विश्वा॒ आशा॒ दीद्या॑नो॒ वि भा॒ह्यूर्जं॑ नो धेहि द्वि॒पदे॒ चतु॑ष्पदे ।।

text:
Foremost of those who seek the Gods come forward, thou
 who art eye of Gods and men, O Agni.
 Accordant with the Bhrigus, fain to worship, to heaven in
 safety go the Sacrificers.
meaning: पृ॑थि॒व्या अ॒हमुद॒न्तरि॑क्ष॒मारु॑हम॒न्तरि॑क्षा॒द्दिव॒मारु॑हम् । दि॒वो नाक॑स्य पृ॒ष्ठात्स्व॒र्ज्योति॑रगाम॒हम् ।।

text: Night and Dawn, different in hue, accordant, etc., as in XII. 2.
meaning: स्व॒र्यन्तो॒ नापे॑क्षन्त॒ आ द्याँ रो॑हन्ति॒ रोद॑सी । य॒ज्ञं ये वि॒श्वतो॑धारँ॒ सुवि॑द्वाँसो वितेनि॒रे ।।

text:
O Agni, thousand-eyed and hundred-headed, thy breaths are
 hundred, thy through-breaths a thousand.
 Thou art the Lord of thousandfold possessions. To thee;
 for strength, may we present oblation.
meaning: अग्ने॒ प्रेहि॑ प्रथ॒मो दे॑वय॒तां चक्षु॑र्दे॒वाना॑मु॒त मर्त्या॑नाम् । इय॑क्षमाणा॒ भृगु॑भिः स॒जोषाः॒ स्व॑र्यन्तु॒ यज॑मानाः स्व॒स्ति ।।

text:
Thou art the Bird of goodly wing: be seated on the ridge
 of earth.
 Fill air's mid-region with thy glow, supporting with thy
 light the sky, confirm the quarters with thy sheen.
meaning: नक्तो॒षासा॒ सम॑नसा॒ विरू॑पे धा॒पये॑ते॒ शिशु॒मेकँ॑ समी॒ची । द्यावा॒क्षामा॑ रु॒क्मो अ॒न्तर्वि भा॑ति दे॒वा अ॒ग्निं धा॑रयन्द्रविणो॒दाः ।।

text:
Receiving offerings, fair of aspect, eastward be duly seated
 in thy place, O Agni.
 In this the more exalted habitation be seated All-Gods and
 the Sacrificer.
meaning: अग्ने॑ सहस्राक्ष शतमूर्धञ्छ॒तं ते॑ प्रा॒णाः स॒हस्रं॑ व्या॒नाः । त्वँ सा॑ह॒स्रस्य॑ रा॒य ई॑शिषे॒ तस्मै॑ ते विधेम॒ वाजा॑य॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
That wondrous all-mankind-embracing favour of Savitar,
 choice-worthy, I solicit,
 Even his which Kanva wont to milk, the mighty, the teeming
 Cow who yields a thousand milk-streams.
meaning: सु॑प॒र्णो॑ सि ग॒रुन्मा॑न्पृ॒ष्ठे पृ॑थि॒व्याः सी॑द । भा॒सान्तरि॑क्ष॒मा पृ॑ण॒ ज्योति॑षा॒ दिव॒मुत्त॑भान॒ तेज॑सा॒ दिश॒ उद्दृँ॑ह ।।

text:
May we adore thee in thy loftiest birth place, Agni! with
 praise-songs in thy lower station.
 The place whence those hast issued forth I worship. In thee,
 well kindled, have they paid oblations
meaning: आ॒जुह्वा॑नः सु॒प्रती॑कः पु॒रस्ता॒दग्ने॒ योनि॒मा सी॑द साधु॒या । अ॒स्मिन्त्स॒स्हस्थे॒ अध्युत्त॑रस्मि॒न्विश्वे॑ देवा॒ यज॑मानश्च सीदत ।।

text:
Shine thou before us, Agni, well enkindled, with flame, most
 youthful God, that never fadeth.
 Unceasing unto thee come sacred viands.
meaning: तँ स॑वि॒तुर्वरे॑ण्यस्य चि॒त्रामाहं वृ॑णे सुम॒तिं वि॒श्वज॑न्याम् । याम॑स्य॒ कण्वो॒ अदु॑ह॒त्प्रपी॑नाँ स॒हस्र॑धारां॒ पय॑सा म॒हीं गाम् ।।

text: Agni, this day with lands, etc., as in XV. 44.
meaning: वि॒धेम॑ ते पर॒मे जन्म॑न्नग्ने वि॒धेम॒ स्तोमै॒रव॑रे स॒धस्थे॑ । यस्मा॒द्योने॑रु॒दारि॑था॒ यजे॒ तं प्र त्वे ह॒वीँषि॑ जुहुरे॒ समि॑द्धे ।।

text:
I dedicate the thought with mind and butter so that the
 Gods may come who love oblation, strengthing Law,
 To Visvakarman, Lord of all the earth, I offer up day after
 day the inviolable sacrifice.
meaning: प्रेद्धो॑ अग्ने दीदिहि पु॒रो नो ज॑स्रया सू॒र्म्या॑ यविष्ठ । त्वाँ शश्व॑न्त॒ उप॑ यन्ति॒ वाजाः॑ ।।

text:
Seven fuel logs hast thou, seven tongues, O Agni, seven Rishis
 hast thou, seven belovèd mansions.
 Seven-priests in sevenfold manner pay thee worship. Fill
 full—All-hail to thee!—seven wombs with butter.
meaning: अग्ने॒ तम॒द्याश्वं॒ न स्तोमैः॒ क्रतुं॒ न भ॒द्रँ हृ॑दि॒स्पृश॑म् । ऋ॒ध्यामा॑ त॒ ओहैः॑ ।।
चित्तिं॑ जुहोमि॒ मन॑सा घृ॒तेन॒ यथा॑ दे॒वा इ॒हागम॑न्वी॒तिहो॑त्रा ऋता॒वृधः॑ । पत्ये॒ विश्व॑स्य॒ भूम॑नो जु॒होमि॑ वि॒श्वक॑र्मणे वि॒श्वाहादा॑भ्यँ ह॒वि ।।

text:
Such, Other-Looking, Equal, Similar, Measured, Commensurate,
 Jointly-Bearing-up.
meaning: स॒प्त ते॑ अग्ने स॒मिधः॑ स॒प्त जि॒ह्वाः स॒प्त ऋष॑यः स॒प्त धाम॑ प्रि॒याणि॑ । स॒प्त होत्राः॑ सप्त॒धा त्वा॑ यजन्ति स॒प्त योनी॒रा पृ॑णस्व घृ॒तेन॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Right, Real, Firm, Strong-to-Support, Bearer, Disposer,
 Manager.
meaning: शु॒क्रज्यो॑तिश्च चि॒त्रज्यो॑तिश्च स॒त्यज्यो॑तिश्च॒ ज्योति॑ष्माँश्च । शु॒क्रश्च॑ ऋत॒पाश्चात्यँ॑हाः ।।

text:
Winner-of-Right, Winner-of-Truth, Host-Conquering,
 Lord-of-Goodly-Host,
 Whose-Friends-are-Near-at-Hand, Whose-Banded-Enemies-are-Far-Away:
meaning: ई॒दृङ्चा॑न्य॒दृङ्च॑ स॒दृङ्च॒ प्रति॑सदृङ्च । मि॒तश्च॒ संमि॑तश्च॒ सभ॑राः ।।

text:
To day in this our sacrifice be present, Such, Looking-Thus,
 Same, Similar-in-appearance,
 Measured, Commensurate, Joint-Bearers, Maruts!
meaning: ऋ॒तश्च॑ स॒त्यश्च॑ ध्रु॒वश्च॑ ध॒रुण॑श्च । ध॒र्ता च॑ विध॒र्ता च॑ विधार॒यः ।।

text:
Self-Powerful, Voracious-One, Kin-to-the-Sun, The
 House-holder,
 Play-Lover, Mighty, Conqueror.
 Fierce, Terrible, The Resonant, The Roaring. Victorious,
 Assailant, and Dispeller, All-Hail!
meaning: ऋ॑त॒जिच्च॑ सत्य॒जिच्च॑ सेन॒जिच्च॑ सु॒षेण॑श्च । अन्ति॑मित्रश्च दूरेअमित्रश्च ग॒णः ।।

text:
The Maruts, clans divine, became the followers of Indra; as
 The Maruts, clans divine, became the followers of Indra, so
 May clans divine and human he the Sacrificer's followers.
meaning: ई॒दृक्षा॑स एता॒दृक्षा॑स ऊ॒ षु णः॑ स॒दृक्षा॑सः॒ प्रति॑सदृक्षास॒ एत॑न । मि॒तास॑श्च॒ संमि॑तासो नो अ॒द्य सभ॑रसो मरुतो य॒ज्ञे अ॒स्मिन् ।।

text:
Drink in the middle of the flood, O Agni, this breast stored
 full of sap, teeming with water.
 Welcome this fountain redolent of sweetness. O Courser,
 enter those thy watery dwelling.
meaning: स्वत॑वाँश्च प्रघा॒सी च॑ सांतप॒नश्च॑ गृहमे॒धी च॑ । क्री॒डी च॑ शा॒की चो॑ज्जे॒षी ।।

text:
Oil hath been mixed: oil is his habitation. In oil he rests:
 oil is his proper province.
 Come as thy wont is. O thou Steer, rejoice thee. Bear off
 the oblation duly consecrated.
meaning: उ॒ग्रश्च॑ भी॒मश्च॒ ध्वा॑न्तश्च॒ धुनि॑श्च । सा॑स॒ह्वाँश्चा॑भियु॒ग्वा च॑ वि॒क्षिपः॒ स्वाहा॑ । इन्द्रं दैवी॒र्विशो॑ म॒रुतो नु॑वर्त्मानो भव॒न्यथेन्द्रं दैवी॒र्विशो॑ म॒रुतो नु॑वर्त्मा॒नो भ॑वन् । ए॒वमि॒मं यज॑मानं दैवीश्च॒ विशो॑ मानु॒षीश्चानु॑वर्त्मानो भवन्तु ।।

text:
Forth from the ocean sprang the wave of sweetness: together
 with the stalk it turned to Amrit,
 That which is holy oil's mysterious title: but the Gods’
 tongue is truly Amities centre.
meaning: इ॒मँ स्तन॒मूर्ज॑स्वन्तं धया॒पां प्रपी॑नमग्ने सरि॒रस्य॒ मध्ये॑ । उत्सं॑ जुषस्व॒ मधु॑मन्तमर्वन्त्समु॒द्रियँ॒ सद॑न॒मा वि॑शस्व ।।

text:
Let us Declare aloud the name of Ghrita, and at this sacrifice
 held it up with homage.
 So let the Brahman hear the praise we utter. This hath the
 four-horned Buffalo emitted.
meaning: घृ॒तं मि॑मिक्षे घृ॒तम॑स्य॒ योनि॑र्घृ॒ते श्रि॒तो घृ॒तम्व॑स्य॒ धाम॑ । अ॑नुष्व॒धमा व॑ह मा॒दय॑स्व॒ स्वाहा॑कृतं वृषभ वक्षि ह॒व्यम् ।।

text:
Four are his horns, three are the feet that bear him: his
 heads are two, his hands are seven in number.
 Bound with a triple bond the Bull roars loudly: the mighty
 God hath entered into mortals.
meaning: स॑मु॒द्रादू॒र्मिर्मधु॑माँ॒ उदा॑र॒दुपाँ॒शुना॒ सम॑मृत॒त्वमा॑नट् । घृ॒तस्य॒ नाम॒ गुह्यं॒ यदस्ति॑ जि॒ह्वा दे॒वाना॑म॒मृत॑स्य॒ नाभिः॑ ।।

text:
That oil in triple shape the Gods discovered laid down with-
 in the Cow, concealed by Panis.
 Indra produced one shape, Sûrya another: by their own
 power they formed the third from Vena.
meaning: व॒यं नाम॒ प्र ब्र॑वामा घृ॒तस्या॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञे धा॑रयामा॒ नमो॑भिः । उप॑ ब्र॒ह्मा शृ॑णवच्छ॒स्यमा॑नं॒ चतुः॑शृङ्गो वमीद्गौ॒र ए॒तत् ।।

text:
From inmost reservoir in countless channels flow down these
 rivers which the foe beholds not.
 I look upon the streams of oil descending, and lo! the
 Golden Reed is there among them.
meaning: च॒त्वारि॒ शृङ्गा॒ त्रयो॑ अस्य॒ पादा॒ द्वे शी॒र्षे स॒प्त हस्ता॑सो अस्य । त्रिधा॑ ब॒द्धो वृ॑ष॒भो रो॑रवीति म॒हो दे॒वो मर्त्याँ॒ आ वि॑वेश ।।

text:
Like rivers our libations flow together, cleansing themselves
 in inmost heart and spirit.
 The streams of holy oil pour swiftly downward like the wild
 beasts that fly before the bowman.
meaning: त्रिधा॑ हि॒तं प॒णिभि॑र्गु॒ह्यमा॑नं॒ गवि॑ दे॒वासो॑ घृ॒तमन्व॑विन्दन् । इन्द्र॒ एकँ॒ सूर्य॒ एकं॑ जजान वे॒नादेकँ॑ स्व॒धया॒ निष्ट॑तक्षुः ।।

text:
As rushing down the rapids of a river, flow swifter than the
 wind the vigorous currents,
 The streams of oil in swelling fluctuation like a red courser
 bursting through the fences.
meaning: ए॒ता अ॑र्षन्ति॒ हृद्या॑त्समु॒द्राच्छ॒तव्र॑जा रि॒पुणा॒ नाव॒चक्षे॑ । घृ॒तस्य॒ धारा॑ अ॒भि चा॑कशीमि हिर॒ण्ययो॑ वेत॒सो मध्य॑ आसाम् ।।

text:
Like women at a gathering fair to look on and gently smiling,
 they incline to Agni.
 The streams of holy oil attain the fuel, and Jâtavedas joyfully
 receives them.
meaning: स॒म्यक्स्र॑वन्ति स॒रितो॒ न धेना॑ अ॒न्तर्हृ॒दा मन॑सा पू॒यमा॑नाः । ए॒ते अ॑र्षन्त्यू॒र्मयो॑ घृ॒तस्य॑ मृ॒गा इ॑व क्षिप॒णोरीष॑माणाः ।।

text:
As maidens deck themselves with gay adornment to join the
 bridal feast, I now behold them.
 Where Soma flows and sacrifice is ready, thither the streams
 of holy oil are running.
meaning: सिन्धो॑रिव प्राध्व॒ने शू॑घ॒नासो॒ वात॑प्रमियः पतयन्ति य॒ह्वाः । घृ॒तस्य॒ धारा॑ अरु॒षो न वा॒जी काष्ठा॑ भि॒न्दन्नू॒र्मिभिः॒ पिन्व॑मानः ।।

text:
Send to our eulogy a herd of cattle: bestow upon us excellent
 possessions.
 Bear to the Gods the sacrifice we offers the streams of oil flow
 pure and full of sweetness.
meaning: अ॒भि प्र॑वन्त॒ सम॑नेव॒ योषाः॑ कल्या॒ण्यः॒ स्मय॑मानासो अ॒ग्निम् । घृ॒तस्य॒ धाराः॑ स॒मिधो॑ नसन्त॒ ता जु॑षा॒णो ह॑र्यति जा॒तवे॑दाः ।।

text:
The universe depends upon thy power and might within the
 sea, within the heart, within all life.
 May we attain that sweetly-flavoured wave of thine, brought,
 at this gathering, o’er the surface of the floods.
meaning: क॒न्या॑ इव वह॒तुमेत॒वा उ॑ अ॒ञ्ज्य॑ञ्जा॒ना अ॒भि चा॑कशीमि । यत्र॒ सोमः॑ सू॒यते॒ यत्र॑ य॒ज्ञो घृ॒तस्य॒ धारा॑ अ॒भि तत्प॑वन्ते ।।

text:
MAY my strength and my gain, and my inclination and my
 influence, and my thought and my mental power, and
 my praise and my fame, and my renown and my light,
 and my heaven prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: वज॑श्च मे प्रस॒वश्च॑ मे॒ प्रय॑तिश्च मे॒ प्रसि॑तिश्च मे धी॒तिश्च॑ मे॒ क्रतु॑श्च मे॒ स्वर॑श्च मे॒ श्लोक॑श्च मे श्र॒वश्च॑ मे॒ श्रुति॑श्च मे॒ ज्योति॑श्च मे॒ स्व॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my breathing and my out-breathing, and my
 through-breathing and my vital spirit, and my thought and my
 reflection, and my voice and my mind, and my eye and
 my ear, and my ability and my strength prosper by
 sacrifice.
meaning: प्रा॒णश्च॑ मे पा॒नश्च॑ मे व्या॒नश्च॒ मे सु॑श्च मे चि॒त्तं च॑ म॒ आधी॑तं च मे॒ वाक्च॑ मे॒ मन॑श्च मे॒ चक्षु॑श्च मे॒ श्रोत्रं॑ च मे॒ दक्ष॑श्च मे॒ बलं॑ च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my energy and my force, and my self and my body,
 and my shelter and my shield, and my limbs and my
 bones, and my joints and my members, and my life and
 my old age prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: ओज॑स्च मे॒ सह॑श्च म आ॒त्मा च॑ मे त॒नूश्च॑ मे॒ शर्म॑ च मे॒ वर्म॑ च॒ मे ङ्गा॑नि च॒ मे स्था॑नि च मे॒ परूँ॑षि च मे॒ शरी॑राणि च म॒ आयु॑श्च मे ज॒रा च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my preëminence and my overlordship, and my wrath
 and my angry passion, and my violence and my impetuosity,
 and my victorious power and my greatness, and my
 breadth and my width, and my height and my length,
 and my increase and my improvement prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: ज्यै॑ष्ठ्यं च मे॒ आधि॑पत्यं च मे म॒न्युश्च॑ मे॒ भाम॑श्च॒ मे म॑श्च॒ मे म्भ॑श्च मे महि॒मा च॑ मे वरि॒मा च॑ मे प्रथि॒मा च॑ मे वर्षि॒मा च॑ मे द्राघि॒मा च॑ मे वृ॒द्धं च॑ मे॒ वृद्धि॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my truth and my faith, and my cattle and my wealth,
 and my goods and my pleasure, and my play and my
 enjoyment, and my children and my future children, and
 my hymn and my pious act prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: स॒त्यं च॑ मे श्र॒द्धा च॑ मे॒ जग॑च्च मे॒ धनं॑ च मे॒ विश्वं॑ च मे॒ मह॑श्च मे क्री॒डा च॑ मे॒ मोद॑श्च मे जा॒तं च॑ मे जनि॒ष्यमा॑णं च मे सू॒क्तं च॑ मे सुकृ॒तं च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my religious rite and my immortality, and my freedom
 from consumption and my freedom from disease, and my
 life and my longevity, and my freedom from enemies
 and my freedom from danger, and my happiness and my
 lying down, and my fair dawn and my fair day prosper
 by sacrifice.
meaning: ऋ॒तं च॒ मे मृतं॑ च॒ मे य॒क्ष्मं च॒ मे ना॑मयच्च मे जी॒वातु॑श्च मे दीर्घायु॒त्वं च॑ मे नमि॒त्रं च॒ मे भ॑यं च मे सु॒खं च॑ मे॒ शय॑नं च मे सु॒षाश्च॑ मे सु॒दिनं॑ च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my controller and my supporter, and my security and
 my firmness, and my goods and my pleasure, and my
 knowledge and my understanding, and my begetting and
 my propagation, and my plough and my harrow prosper
 by sacrifice.
meaning: य॒न्ता च॑ मे ध॒र्ता च॑ मे॒ क्षेम॑श्च मे॒ धृति॑श्च मे॒ विश्वं॑ च मे॒ मह॑श्च मे सं॒विच्च॑ मे॒ ज्ञात्रं॑ च मे॒ सूश्च॑ मे प्र॒सूश्च॑ मे॒ सीरं॑ च मे॒ लय॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my welfare and my comfort, and what I hold dear and
 what I desire, and my love and my gratification, and my
 enjoyment and my substance, and my happiness and my
 felicity, and my higher bliss and my fame prosper by
 sacrifice.
meaning: शं च॑ मे॒ मय॑श्च मे प्रि॒यं च॑ मे नुका॒मश्च॑ मे॒ काम॑श्च मे सौमन॒सश्च॑ मे॒ भग॑श्च मे॒ द्रवि॑णं च मे भ॒द्रं च॑ मे॒ श्रेय॑श्च मे॒ वसी॑यश्च मे॒ यश॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my vigour and my pleasantness, and my milk and my
 sap, and my butter and my honey, and my meal in company
 and my drinking in company, and my ploughing
 and my husbandry, and my superiority and my preëminence
 prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: ऊर्क्च॑ मे सू॒नृता॑ च मे॒ पय॑श्च मे॒ रस॑श्च मे घृ॒तं च॑ मे॒ मधु॑ च मे॒ सग्धि॑श्च मे॒ सपी॑तिश्च मे कृ॒षिश्च॑ मे॒ वृष्टि॑श्च मे जैत्रं च म औद्भिद्यं च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my wealth and my property, and my prosperity and
 my growth, and my pervading power and my lordship,
 and my abundance and my greater abundance, and my
 bad harvest and my unwasted crop, and my food and
 my satiety prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: र॒यिश्च॑ मे॒ राय॑श्च मे पु॒ष्टं च॑ मे॒ पुष्टि॑श्च मे वि॒भु च॑ मे प्र॒भु च॑ मे पू॒र्णं च॑ मे पू॒र्णत॑रं च मे॒ कुय॑वं च॒ मे क्षि॑तं च॒ मे न्नं॑ च॒ मे क्षु॑च्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my gain and my future gain, and what I have and
 what I shall have, and my good road and my good path,
 and my success and my succeeding, and my achievement
 and my contrivance, and my thought and my good counsel
 prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: वि॒त्तं च॑ मे॒ वेद्यं॑ च मे भू॒तं च॑ मे भवि॒ष्यच्च॑ मे सु॒गं च॑ मे सुप॒थ्यं॑ च म ऋ॒द्धं च॑ म॒ ऋद्धि॑श्च मे॒ क्ळ्प्तं च॑ मे क्े६प्ति॑श्च मे म॒तिश्च॑ मे सुम॒तिश्च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my rice-plants and my barley, and my beans and my
 sesamum, and my kidney-beans and my vetches, and my
 millet and my Panicum Milliaceum, and my Panicum
 Frumentaceum and my wild rice, and my wheat and my
 lentils prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: व्री॒हय॑श्च मे॒ यवा॑श्च मे॒ माषा॑श्च मे॒ तिला॑श्च मे मु॒द्राश्च॑ मे॒ खल्वा॑श्च मे प्रि॒यङ्ग॑वश्च॒ मे ण॑वश्च मे श्या॒माका॑श्च मे नी॒वारा॑श्च मे गो॒धूमा॑श्च मे म॒सूरा॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my stone and my clay, and my hills and my mountains,
 and my pebbles and my trees, and my gold and my bronze,
 and my copper and my iron, and my lead and my tin
 prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: अश्मा॑ च मे॒ मृत्ति॑का च मे गि॒रय॑श्च मे॒ पर्व॑ताश्च मे॒ सिक॑ताश्च मे॒ वन॒स्पत॑यश्च मे॒ हिर॑ण्यं च॒ मे य॑श्च मे श्या॒मं च॑ मे लो॒हं च॑ मे॒ सीसं॑ च मे॒ त्रपु॑ च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my fire and my water, and my creepers and my plants,
 and lily plants with culture-ripened fruit and my plants
 with fruit ripened without culture, and my domestic
 animals and my wild animals, and my substance and my
 future substance, and my belongings and my power be
 produced by sacrifice.
meaning: अ॒ग्निश्च॑ म॒ आप॑श्च मे वी॒रुध॑श्च म॒ ओष॑धयश्च मे कृष्टप॒च्याश्च॑ मे कृष्टप॒च्याश्च॑ मे ग्रा॒म्याश्च॑ मे प॒शव॑ आर॒ण्याश्च॑ मे वि॒त्तं च॑ मे॒ वित्ति॑श्च मे भू॒तं च॑ मे॒ भूति॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my treasure and my dwelling, and my religious service
 and my ability to perform it, and my object and my
 course, and my way and my going prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: वसु॑ च मे वस॒तिश्च॑ मे॒ कर्म॑ च मे॒ शक्ति॑श्च॒ मे र्थ॑श्च म॒ एम॑श्च म इ॒त्या च॑ मे॒ गति॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Agni and my Indra, and my Soma and my Indra,
 and my Savitar and my Indra, and my Sarasvatî and my
 Indra, and my Pûshan and my Indra prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: अ॒ग्निश्च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ सोम॑श्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे सवि॒ता च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ सर॑स्वती च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे पू॒षा च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ बृह॒स्पति॑श्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Mitra and my Indra, and my Varuna and my Indra,
 and my Dhâtar and my Indra, and my Maruts and my
 Indra, and my All-Gods and my Indra prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: मि॒त्रश्च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ वरु॑णश्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे धा॒ता च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ त्वष्टा॑ च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे म॒रुत॑श्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ विश्वे॑ च मे दे॒वा इन्द्र॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my earth and my Indra, and my Air and my Indra,
 and my Sky and my Indra, and my Half-months and my
 Indra, and my Lunar Mansions and my Indra, and my
 Sky-regions and my Indra prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: पृ॑थि॒वी च॑ म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च॒ मे न्तरि॑क्षं च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे द्यौश्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ समा॑श्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ नक्ष॑त्राणि च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे॒ दिश॑श्च म॒ इन्द्र॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Amsu and my Rasmi, and my Adhipati and my
 Upâmsu, and my Antaryâma and my Aindra-Vâyava, and
 my Maitrâ-Varuna, and my Âsvina and my Pratiprasthâna,
 and my Sukra and my Manthin proper by sacrifice.
meaning: अँ॒शुश्च॑ मे र॒श्मिश्च॒ मे दा॑भ्यश्च॒ मे धि॑पतिश्च म उपाँ॒शुश्च॑ मे न्तर्या॒मश्च॑ म ऐन्द्रवायश्च॑ मे मैत्रावरु॒णश्च॑ म आश्वि॒नश्च॑ मे प्रतिप्र॒स्थान॑श्च मे शु॒क्रश्च॑ मे म॒न्थी च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Âgrayana and my Vaisvadeva, and my
Dhruvâ
 and
 my Vaisvânara, and my Aindrâgna and my Mahâvaisvadeva,
 and my Marutvatîya and my Nishkevalya, and my Sâvitra
 and my Sârasvata, and my Pâtnîvata and my Hâriyojana
 prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: आ॑ग्रया॒णश्च॑ मे वैश्वदे॒वश्च॑ मे ध्रु॒वश्च॑ मे वैश्वान॒रश्च॑ म ऐन्द्रा॒ग्नश्च॑ मे म॒हावै॑श�श्च मे मरुत्व॒तीया॑श्च मे॒ निष्के॑वल्यश्च मे सावि॒त्रश्च॑ मे सारस्व॒तश्च॑ मे पत्नीव॒तश्च॑ मे हारियओज॒नश्च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my ladles and my cups, and my Vâyu, vessels and my
 Soma reservoirs, and my pressing-stones and my two press-boards,
 and my Pûtabhrit and my Âdhavanîya, and my
 altar and altar-grass, and my Avabhritha and my cries of
 Good-speed prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: स्रुच॑श्च मे चम॒साश्च॑ मे वाय॒व्या॑नि च मे द्रोणकल॒शश्च॑ मे॒ ग्रावा॑णश्च मे धि॒षव॑णे च मे पूत॒भृच्च॑ म आधव॒नीय॑श्च मे॒ वेदि॑श्च मे ब॒र्हिश्च॑ मे वभृ॒तश्च॑ मे स्वगाका॒रश्च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Agni and my charms, and my Arka and my Sûrya,
 and my Prâna and my Asvamedha, and my Prithivî and
 my Aditi, and my Diti and my Sky, and my fingers, powers,
 and sky-regions prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: अ॒ग्निश्च॑ मे घ॒र्मश्च॑ मे॒ र्कश्च॑ मे॒ सूर्य॑श्च मे प्रा॒णश्च॑ मे स्वमे॒धश्च॑ मे पृथि॒वी च॒ मे दि॑तिश्च मे॒ दिति॑श्च मे द्यौश्च मे॒ ङ्गुल॑यः॒ शक्व॑रयो॒ दिश॑श्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my vow and my seasons, and my austere devotion, and
 my day and night, thighs and knees, and two Great
 Rathantaras prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: व्र॒तं च॑ म ऋ॒तव॑श्च मे॒ तप॑श्च मे संवत्स॒रश्च॑ मे होरा॒त्रे ऊ॑र्वष्ठी॒वे बृ॑हद्रथन्त॒रे च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May me One and my Three, and my Three and my Five,
 and my Five and my Seven (and similarly up to thirty-three)
 prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: एका॑ च मे ति॒स्रश्च॑ मे ति॒स्रश्च॑ मे॒ पञ्च॑ च मे॒ पञ्च॑ च मे स॒प्त च॑ मे स॒प्त च॑ मे॒ नव॑ च मे॒ नव॑ च म॒ एका॑दश च म॒ एका॑दश च मे॒ त्रयो॑दश च मे॒ त्रयो॑दश च मे॒ पञ्च॑दश च मे॒ पञ्च॑दश च मे स॒प्तद॑श च मे श॒प्तद॑श च मे॒ नव॑दश च मे॒ नव॑दश च म॒ एक॑विँशतिश्च म॒ एक॑विँशतिश्च मे॒ त्रयो॑विँशतिश्च मे॒ त्रयो॑विँशतिश्च मे॒ पञ्च॑विँशतिश्च मे॒ पञ्च॑विँशतिश्च मे स॒प्तविँ॑�श्च मे स॒प्तविँ॑शतिश्च मे॒ नव॑विँशतिश्च मे॒ नव॑विँशतिश्च म॒ एक॑त्रिँशच्च म॒ एक॑त्रिँशच्च मे॒ त्रय॑स्त्रिँशच्च मे॒ त्रय॑स्त्रिँशच्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my Four and my Eight and my Twelve (and similarly
 up to forty-eight) prosper by sacrifice
meaning: चत॑स्रश्च मे ष्टौ च मे ष्टौ च मे॒ द्वाद॑श च मे॒ द्वाद॑श च मे॒ षोड॑श च मे॒ षोड॑श च मे विँश॒तिश्च॑ मे विँशतिश्च मे॒ चतु॑र्विँशतिश्च मे॒ चतु॑र्विँश॒तिश्च॑ मे॒ ष्टाविँ॑शतिश्च मे॒ ष्टाविँ॑�श्च मे॒ द्वात्रिँ॑शच्च मे॒ द्वात्रिँ॑शच्च मे॒ षट्त्रिँ॑शच्च मे॒ षट्त्रिँ॑शच्च मे चत्वारिँ॒शच्च॑ मे चत्वारिँ॒शच्च॑ मे॒ चतु॑श्चत्वारिँशच्च मे॒ चतु॑श्चत्वारिँशच्च मे॒ ष्टाच॑त्वारिँशच्च मे॒ ष्टाच॑त्वारिँशच्च मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my eighteen-months steer and my eighteen-months
 heifer, and my two-year bull and cow (and similarly up
 to four-year) prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: त्र्यवि॑श्च मे त्र्य॒वी च॑ मे दित्य॒वाट्च॑ मे दित्यौ॒ही च॑ मे पञ्चा॒विश्च॑ मे पञ्चा॒वी च॑ मे त्रिव॒त्सश्च॑ मे त्रिव॒त्सा च॑ मे तुर्य॒वाट्च॑ मे तुर्यौ॒ही च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
May my six-year bull and my six-year cow, and my bull and
 my barren cow, and my young bull and my calf-slipping
 cow, and my ox and my milch-cow prosper by sacrifice.
meaning: प॑ष्ठ॒वाट्च॑ मे पष्ठौ॒ही च॑ म उ॒क्षा च॑ मे व॒शा च॑ म ऋष॒भश्च॑ मे वे॒हच्च॑ मे न॒ड्वाँश्च॑ मे धे॒नुश्च॑ मे य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पन्ताम् ।।

text:
To strength, Hail! To Gain, Hail! To After-born, Hail! To
 Power, Hail! To Vasu, Hail! To the Lord of Days, Hail!
 To the Failing Day, Hail! To the Failing Sprung from
 the Transitory, Hail! To the Transitory sprung from the
 Final, Hail! To the Final Mundane, Hail! To the Lord
 of the World, Hail! To the Sovran Lord, Hail! To Prajâpati,
 Hail! This is thy kingdom. Thou art a guiding controller
 for the friend. Thee for vigour, thee for rain,
 thee for the sovran lordship of creatures.
meaning: वाजा॑य॒ स्वाहा॑ प्रस॒वाय॒ स्वाहा॑पि॒जाय॒ स्वाहा॒ क्रत॑वे॒ स्वाहा॒ वस॑वे॒ स्वाहा॑ह॒र्पत॑ये॒ स्वाहाह्ने॒ स्वाहा॑ मु॒ग्धाय॒ स्वाहा॑ मु॒ग्धाय॑ वैनँशि॒नाय॒ स्वाहा॑विनँ॒शिन॑ आन्त्याय॒नाय॒ स्वाहान्त्या॑य भौव॒नाय॒ स्वाहा॒ भुव॑नस्य॒ पत॑ये॒ स्वाहाधि॑पतये॒ स्वाहा॑ प्र॒जाप॑तये॒ स्वाहा॑ । इ॒यं ते॒ राण्मि॒त्राय॑ य॒न्तासि॒ यम॑न ऊ॒र्जे त्वा॒ वृष्ट्यै॑ त्वा प्र॒जानां॒ त्वाधि॑पत्याय ।।

text:
May life succeed through sacrifice. May life-breath thrive
 by sacrifice. May the eye thrive by sacrifice. May the
 ear thrive by sacrifice. May the voice thrive by sacrifice.
 May the mind thrive by sacrifice. May the self thrive by
 sacrifice. May Brahma thrive by sacrifice. May light
 succeed by sacrifice. May heaven succeed by sacrifice.
 May the hymn thrive by sacrifice. May sacrifice thrive
 by sacrifice; And laud and sacrificial text, and verse of
 praise and Sâma chant, The Brihat and Rathantara.

Gods, we have gone to light. We have become the children
 of Prajâpati. We have become immortal.
meaning: आयु॑र्य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां प्रा॒णो य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां॒ चक्षु॑र्य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पताँ॒ श्रोत्रं॑ य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां॒ वाग्य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां॒ मनो॑ य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतामा॒त्मा य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां ब्र॒ह्मा य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां॒ ज्योति॑र्य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पताँ॒ स्व॑र्य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां पृ॒ष्ठं य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पतां य॒ज्ञो य॒ज्ञेन॑ कल्पताम् । स्तोम॑श्च य्श्च॒ ऋक्च॒ साम॑ च बृ॒हच्च॑ रथन्त॒रं च॑ । स्व॑र्देवा अगन्मा॒मृता॑ अभूम प्र॒जाप॑तेः प्र॒जा अ॑भूम॒ वेट्स्वाहा॑ ।।

text: In gain of wealth we celebrate, etc: = IX. 5.
meaning: वाज॑स्य॒ नु प्र॑स॒वे मा॒तरं॑ म॒हीमदि॑तिं॒ नाम॒ वच॑सा करामहे । यस्या॑मि॒दं विश्वं॒ भुव॑नमावि॒वेश॒ तस्यां॑ नो दे॒वः स॑वि॒ता धर्म॑ साविषत् ।।

text:
This day come all the Maruts, all to aid us! Let all the fires
 be thoroughly enkindled.
 May the All-Gods come hither with protection. May we
 possess all property and riches.
meaning: विश्वे॑ अ॒द्य म॒रुतो॒ विश्व॑ ऊ॒ती विश्वे॑ भवन्त्व॒ग्नयः॒ समि॑द्धाः । विश्वे॑ नो दे॒वा अव॒सा ग॑मन्तु॒ विश्व॑मस्तु॒ द्रवि॑णं॒ वाजो॑ अ॒स्मे ।।

text:
May our strength fill the regions seven, fill the four distant
 places full.
 Here may our riches guard us with the All-Gods in the gain
 of wealth.
meaning: वाजो॑ नः स॒प्त प्र॒दिश॒श्चत॑स्रो वा परा॒वतः॑ । वाजो॑ नो॒ विश्वै॑र्देवै॒र्धन॑सातावि॒हाव॑तु ।।

text:
May strength to-day procure for us donations strength
 range the Gods together with the Seasons.
 Yea, strength hath made me rich in store of heroes. As
 lord of strength may I gain all the regions.
meaning: वाजो॑ नो अ॒द्य प्र सु॑वाति॒ दानं॒ वाजो॑ दे॒वाँ ऋ॒तुभिः॑ कल्पयाति । वाजो॒ हि मा॒ सर्व॑वीरं ज॒जान॒ विश्वा॒ आशा॒ वाज॑पतिर्जयेयम् ।।

text:
Strength be before us, in the midst among us. May strength
 exalt the Gods with our oblation.
 Yea, strength hath made me rich in store of heroes. As
 lord of strength may I gain all the regions.
meaning: वजः॑ पु॒रस्ता॑दु॒त म॑ध्य॒तो नो॒ वाजो॑ दे॒वान्ह॒विषा॑ वर्धयाति । वाजो॒ हि मा॒ सर्व॑वीरं च॒कार॒ सर्वा॒ आशा॒ वाज॑पतिर्भवेयम् ।।

text:
With milk of Prithivî do I unite me, unite myself with
 waters and with plants.
 As such may I gain strength, O Agni.
meaning: सं मा॑ सृजामि॒ पय॑सा पृथि॒व्याः सं मा॑ सृजाम्य॒द्भिरोष॑धीभिः । सो॒ हं वाजँ॑ सनेयमग्ने ।।

text:
Store milk in earth and milk in plants, milk in the sky and
 milk in air.
 Teeming with milk for me he all the regions.
meaning: पयः॑ पृथि॒व्यां पय॒ ओष॑धीषु॒ पयो॑ दि॒व्य॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ पयो॑ धाः । पय॑स्वतीः प्र॒दिशः॑ सन्तु॒ मह्य॑म् ।।

text:
Thee by the radiant Savitar's impulsion, with arms of Asvins,
 with the hands of Pûshan,
 Controlled by Vâk Sarasvatî's Controller, with Agni's sole
 dominion I besprinkle.
meaning: दे॒वस्य॑ त्वा सवि॒तुः प्र॑स॒वे॒ श्विनो॑र्बा॒हुभ्यां॑ पू॒ष्णो हस्ता॑भ्याम् । सर॑स्वत्यै वा॒चो य॒न्तुर्य॒न्त्रेणा॒ग्नेः साम्रा॑ज्येना॒भि षि॑ञ्चामि ।।

text:
Maintainer of Law, true by nature, Agni is the Gandharva.
 The plants are his Apsarases, namely Delights. May he
 protect this our Priesthood and Nobility. To him All-hail!
 Ave! To those All-hail!
meaning: ऋ॑ता॒षाडृ॒तधा॑मा॒ग्निर्ग॑न्ध॒र्वस्तस्यौ॑षधयो प्स॒रसो॒ मुदो॒ नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
The Conjoined, Visvasâman, Sûrya is the Gandharva. His
 motes are his Apsarases, Swift-moving. May he protect,
 etc., as in 38.
meaning: सँ॑हि॒तो वि॒श्वसा॑मा॒ सूर्यो॑ गन्ध॒र्वस्तस्य॒ मरी॑चयो प्स॒रस॑ आ॒युवो॒ नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
The Highly-Blessed, the Moon whose rays are like the Sun's,
 is the Gandharva. The Asterisms are his Apsarases, Luminous.
 May he protect, etc.
meaning: सु॑षु॒म्णः सूर्य॑रश्मिश्च॒न्द्रमा॑ गन्ध॒र्वस्तस्य॒ नक्ष॑त्राण्यप्स॒रसो॑ भे॒कुर॑यो॒ नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
The Quick, All-reaching, Wind is the Gandharva. The
 Waters are his Apsarases, named Energies. May he
 protect, etc.
meaning: इ॑षि॒रो वि॒श्वव्य॑चा॒ वातो॑ गन्ध॒र्वस्तस्यपो॑ अप्स॒रस॒ ऊर्जो॒ नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
The Protecting, Strong-winged, Sacrifice is the Gandharva.
 Guerdons are his
Apsarases
, called Praisers. May he
 protect, etc.
meaning: भु॒ज्युः सु॑प॒र्णो य॒ज्ञो ग॑न्ध॒र्वस्तस्य॒ दक्षि॑णा अप्स॒रस॑ स्ता॒वा नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
The Lord of Creatures, Omnific, Mind is the Gandharva.
 Richas and Sâmans are his Apsarases, called Wishings.
 May he protect, etc.
meaning: प्र॒जाप॑तिर्वि॒श्वक॑र्मा॒ मनो॑ गन्ध॒र्वस्तस्य॑ ऋक्सा॒मान्य॑प्स॒रस॒ एष्ट॑यो॒ नाम॑ । स न॑ इ॒दं ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं पा॑तु॒ तस्मै॒ स्वाहा॒ वाट्ताभ्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Lord of the World, Prajâpati, whose are the homes above
 and here,
 Give great protection unto these, the Priesthood and Nobility.
meaning: स नो॑ भुवनस्य पते प्रजापते॒ यस्य॑ त उ॒परि॑ गृ॒हा यस्य॑ वे॒ह । अस्मै॒ ब्रह्म॑णे स्मै क्ष॒त्राय॒ महि॒ शर्म॑ यच्छ॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
Thou art the vapoury sea that giveth moisture. Blow on
 me, thou, healthful and blessing-laden.
 Thou art the Maruts’ own, the band of Maruts. Blow on
 me, etc.
 Seeker of aid art thou, receiving worship. Blow on me, etc.
meaning: स॑मु॒द्रो॑ सि॒ नभ॑स्वाना॒र्द्रदा॑नुः श॒म्भूर्म॑यो॒भूर॒भि मा॑ वाहि॒ स्वाहा॑ । मा॑रु॒तो॑ सि म॒रुतां॑ ग॒णः श॒म्भूर्म॑यो॒भूर॒भि मा॑ वाहि॒ स्वाहा॑ । अ॑व॒स्यूर॑सि॒ दुव॑स्वाञ्छ॒म्भूर्म॑यो॒भूर॒भि मा॑ वाहि॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text: Thy lights, O Agni, in the Sun, etc., as in XIII. 22.
meaning: यास्ते॑ अग्ने॒ सूर्ये॒ रुचो॒ दिव॑मात॒न्वन्ति॑ र॒श्मिभिः॑ । ताभि॑र्नो अ॒द्य सर्वा॑भी रु॒चे जना॑य नस्कृधि ।।

text: Lights of yours in the Sun, O Gods, etc., as in XIII. 23.
meaning: या वो॑ दे॒वाः सूर्ये॒ रुचो॒ गोष्वश्वे॑षु॒ या रुचः॑ । इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ ताभिः॒ सर्वा॑भी॒ रुचं॑ नो धत्त बृहस्पते ।।

text:
Give lustre to our holy priests, set lustre in our ruling chiefs
 Lustre to Vaisyas, Sûdras: give, through lustre; lustre unto
 me.
meaning: रुचं॑ नो धेहि ब्राह्म॒णेषु॒ रुचँ॒ राज॑सु नस्कृधि । रुचं॒ विश्ये॑षु शू॒द्रेषु॒ मयि॑ धेहि रु॒चा रुच॑म् ।।

text:
I ask this of thee with my prayer, adoring: thy worshipper
 asks this with his oblations.
 Varuna, stay thou here and be not angry: steal not our life
 from us, O thou Wide-Ruler.
meaning: तत्त्वा॑ यामि॒ ब्रह्म॑णा॒ वन्द॑मान॒स्तदा शा॑स्ते॒ यज॑मानो ह॒विर्भिः॑ । अहे॑डमानो वरुणे॒ह बो॒ध्युरु॑शँस॒ मा न॒ आयुः॒ प्र मो॑षीः ।।

text:
Heaven-like is Warmth, Hail! Heaven-like is Arka, Hail!
 Heaven-like is the Bright One, Hail! Heaven-like is Light,
 Hail! Heaven-like is Sûrya, Hail!
meaning: स्व॒र्ण घ॒र्मः स्वाहा॑ । स्व॒र्णार्कः स्वाहा॑ । स्व॒र्ण शु॒क्रः स्वाहा॑ । स्व॒र्ण ज्योतिः॒ स्वाहा॑ । स्व॒र्ण सूर्यः॒ स्वाहा॑ ।।

text:
I yoke with power and flowing butter Agni, divine, strong-
 pinioned, great with vital vigour.
 Through him may we approach the Bright One's station,
 ascending to the loftiest sky, to heaven.
meaning: अ॒ग्निं यु॑नज्मि॒ शव॑सा घृ॒तेन॑ दि॒व्यँ सु॑प॒र्णं वय॑सा बृ॒हन्त॑म् । तेन॑ व॒यं ग॑मेम ब्र॒ध्नस्य॑ वि॒ष्टपँ॒ स्वो॒ रुहा॑णा॒ अधि॒ नाक॑मुत्त॒मम् ।।

text:
With these thy two ne’er-wasting feathered pinions wherewith
 thou drivest fiends away, O Agni,
 Let us fly to the regions of the pious whither have gone the
 first-born ancient Rishis.
meaning: इमौ ते प॒क्षाव॒जरौ॑ पत॒त्रिणौ॒ याभ्याँ॒ रक्षाँ॑स्यप॒हँस्य॑ग्ने । ताभ्यां॑ पतेम सु॒कृता॑मु लो॒कं यत्र॒ ऋष॑यो ज॒ग्मुः प्र॑थम॒जाः पु॑रा॒णाः ।।

text:
The Drop, the powerful, the falcon, righteous, impetuous
 bird borne on his golden pinions,
 Great, stedfast, settled in the habitation—to thee be reverence!
 Forbear to harm
thee
!
meaning: इन्दु॒र्दक्षः॑ श्ये॒न ऋ॒तावा॒ हिर॑ण्यपक्षः शकु॒नो भु॑र॒ण्युः । म॒हान्त्स॒धस्थे॑ ध्रु॒व आ निष॑त्तो॒ नम॑स्ते अस्तु॒ मा मा॑ हिँसीः ।।

text:
Centre of earth, heaven's head art thou, essence of waters
 and of plants.
 Eternal, far spread refuge. Homage to the Path!
meaning: दि॒वो मू॒र्धासि॑ पृथि॒व्या नाभि॒रूर्ग॒पामोष॑धीनाम् । वि॒श्वायुः॒ शर्म॑ स॒प्रथा॒ नम॑स्प॒थे ।।

text:
Attached thou standest at the head of all the world. Thy
 heart is in the sea, thy life is in the floods. Give water:
 cleave the reservoir.

Help us with rain sent from the sky, Parjanya, firmament,
 or earth.
meaning: विश्व॑स्य मू॒र्धन्नधि॑ तिष्ठसि श्रि॒तः स॑मु॒द्रे ते॒ हृद॑यम॒प्स्वायु॑र॒पो द॑त्तोद॒धिं भि॑न्त्त । दि॒वस्प॒र्जन्या॑द॒न्तरि॑क्षात्पृथि॒व्यास्ततो॑ नो॒ वृष्ट्या॑व ।।

text:
By Bhrigus and by Vasus hath prayer-granting sacrifice
 been paid.
 Come, Wealth, into the house of him our dear, our well-beloved
 one.
meaning: इ॒ष्टो य॒ज्ञो भृगु॑भिराशी॒र्दा वसु॑भिः । तस्य॑ न इ॒ष्टस्य॑ प्री॒तस्य॒ द्रवि॑णे॒हा ग॑मेः ।।

text:
May Agni, served with sacrifice and gifts, protect our offered
 food:
 This homage be Good-speed to Gods!
meaning: इ॒ष्टो अ॒ग्निराहु॑तः पिपर्तु न इ॒ष्टँ ह॒विः । स्व॒गेदं दे॒वेभ्यो॒ नमः॑ ।।

text:
That which hath flowed from purpose or from judgment, or
 gathered from the wind or from the vision,
 Follow ye to the region of the pious whither have gone the
 first-born ancient Rishis.
meaning: यदाकू॑तात्स॒मसु॑स्रोद्धृ॒दो वा॒ मन॑सो वा॒ सम्भृ॑तं॒ चक्षु॑षो वा । तदनु॒ प्रेत॑ सु॒कृता॑मु ओ॒ल्कं यत्र॒ ऋष॑यो ज॒ग्मुः प्र॑थम॒जाः पु॑रा॒णाः ।।

text:
To thee I trust this man. Celestial Dwelling! treasure which
 Jâtavedas shall bring hither.
 After you will the Sacrificer follow. Here recognize him in
 the highest heaven.
meaning: ए॒तँ स॑धस्थ॒ परि॑ ते ददामि॒ यमा॒वहा॑च्छेव॒धिं जा॒तवे॑दाः । अ॑न्वाग॒न्ता य॒ज्ञप॑तिर्वो॒ अत्र॒ तँ स्म॑ जानीत पर॒मे व्यो॑मन् ।।

text:
Acknowledge him, ye Gods, in highest heaven. Ye who are
 present, know the shape he weareth.
 When he approacheth by the God-ward pathways, reveal to
 him the meed of pious actions.
meaning: ए॒तं जा॑नाथ पर॒मे व्यो॑म॒न्देवाः॑ सधस्था विद रू॒पम॑स्य । यदा॒गच्छा॑त्प॒थिभि॑र्देव॒यानै॑रिष्टापू॒र्ते कृ॑णवाथा॒विर॑स्मै ।।

text: Wake up, O Agni, etc., as in XV. 54.
meaning: उद्बु॑ध्यस्वाग्ने॒ प्रति॑ जागृहि॒ त्वमि॑ष्टापू॒र्ते सँ सृ॑जेथाम॒यं च॑ । अ॒स्मिन्त्स॒धस्थे॒ अध्युत्त॑रस्मि॒न्विस्वे॑ देवा॒ यज॑मानाश्च सीदत ।।

text: Convey our sacrifice to heaven, etc., as in XV. 55,
meaning: येन॒ वह॑सि स॒हस्रं॒ येना॑ग्ने सर्ववेद॒सम् । तेने॒मं य॒ज्ञं नो॑ नय॒ स्व॑र्दे॒वेषु॒ गन्त॑वे ।।

text:
With Darbha-bunch, with fencing-wood, with spoon, with
 altar, holy grass,
 With
laud
, lead this our sacrifice to go to heaven among
 the Gods.
meaning: प्र॑स्त॒रेण॑ परि॒धिना॑ स्रु॒चा वेद्या॑ च ब॒र्हिषा॑ । ऋ॒चेमं य॒ज्ञं नो॑ नय॒ स्व॑र्दे॒वेषु॒ गन्त॑वे ।।

text:
Our gifts, our charitable grants, our pious works, our fees to
 priests,
 May the Omnific's Agni set all this among the Gods in heaven.
meaning: यद्द॒त्तं यत्प॑रा॒दानं॒ यत्पू॒र्तं याश्च॒ दक्षि॑णाः । तद॒ग्निर्वै॑श्वकर्म॒णः स्व॑र्दे॒वेषु॑ नो दधत् ।।

text:
There where all never-failing streams of honey and of butter
 flow,
 May Agni, Visvakarman's own, place us in heaven among
 the Gods.
meaning: यत्र॒ धारा॒ अन॑पेता॒ मधो॑र्घृ॒तस्य॑ च॒ याः । तद॒ग्निर्वै॑श्वकर्म॒णः स्व॑र्दे॒वेषु॑ नो दधत् ।।

text:
Agni am who know by birth all creatures. Mine eye is
 butter, in my mouth is nectar.
 I am the triple light, the region's meter: exhaustless heat
 am I, named burnt oblation.
meaning: अ॒ग्निर॑स्मि॒ जन्म॑ना जा॒तवे॑दा घृ॒तं मे॒ चक्षु॑र॒मृतं॑ म आ॒सन् । अ॒र्कस्त्रि॒धातू॒ रज॑सो वि॒मानो ज॑स्रो घ॒र्मो ह॒विर॑स्मि॒ नाम॑ ।।

text:
Praise-verses, sacrificial texts, and chanted hymns am I in name.
 Thou art the best of all the Fires among the fivefold race
 of man
 That burn upon this earth of ours. Speed thou us on to
 lengthened life.
meaning: ऋचो॒ नामा॑स्मि॒ यजूँ॑षि॒ नामा॑स्मि॒ सामा॑नि॒ नामा॑स्मि । ये अ॒ग्नयः॒ प्राञ्च॑जन्या अ॒स्यां पृ॑थि॒व्यामधि॑ । तेषा॑मसि॒ त्वमु॑त्त॒मः प्र नो॑ जी॒वत॑वे सुव ।।

text:
O Indra, for the strength that slays Vritra and conquers in
 the fight
 We torn thee hitherward to us.
meaning: वा॑र्त्रह॒त्याय॒ शव॑से पृतना॒षाह्या॑य च । इन्द्र॒ त्वा व॑र्तयामसि ।।

text:
Thou, Indra, much-invoked, didst crush to pieces, Kunâru,
 handless fiend who dwelt with Dânus.
 Thou with might, Indra, smotest dead the scorner, the footless
 Vritra as he waxed in vigour.
meaning: स॒हदा॑नुं पुरुहूत क्षि॒यन्त॑मह॒स्तमि॑न्द्र॒ सं पि॑ण॒क्कुणा॑रुम् । अ॒भि वृ॒त्रं वर्ध॑मानं॒ पिया॑रुम॒पाद॑मिन्द्र त॒वसा॑ जघन्थ ।।

text: O Indra, beat our foes away, etc. as in VIII. 44.
meaning: वि न॑ इन्द्र॒ मृधो॑ जहि नी॒चा य॑च्छ पृतन्य॒तः । यो अ॒स्माँ अ॑भि॒दास॒त्यध॑रं गमया॒ तमः॑ ।।

text:
Like some dread wild beast roaming on the mountain thou
 hast approached us from the farthest distance.
 Whetting thy bolt and thy sharp blade, O Indra, crush thou
 the foes and scatter those who hate us.
meaning: मृ॒गो न भी॒मः कु॑च॒रो गि॑रि॒ष्ठाः प॑रा॒वत॒ आ ज॑गन्था॒ पर॑स्याः । सृ॒कँ सँ॒शाय॑ प॒विमि॑न्द्र ति॒ग्मं वि शत्रू॑न्ताढि॒ वि मृधो॑ नुदस्व ।।

text:
To aid us let Vaisvânara come from the distance far away:
 Come Agni, to our eulogies!
meaning: वै॑श्वान॒रो न॑ ऊ॒तय॒ आ प्र या॑तु परा॒वतः॑ । अ॒ग्निर्नः॑ सुष्टु॒तीरुप॑ ।।

text:
Sought in the sky, sought on the earth, sought after, all
 plants that grow on ground hath Agni entered.
 May Agni, may Vaisvânara with vigour, sought for, by day
 and night from harm preserve us.
meaning: पृ॒ष्टो दि॒वि पृ॒ष्टो अ॒ग्निः पृ॑थि॒व्यां पृ॒ष्टो विश्वा॒ ओष॑धी॒रा वि॑वेश । वै॑श्वान॒रः सह॑सा पृ॒ष्टो अ॒ग्निः स नो॒ दिवा॒ स रि॒षस्पा॑तु॒ नक्त॑म् ।।

text:
Help its that we may gain this wish, O Agni, gain riches,
 Wealthy One! with store of heroes.
 Desiring strength from thee may we be strengthened, and
 win, Eternal! thine eternal glory.
meaning: अ॒श्याम॒ ते काम॑मग्ने॒ तवो॒ती अ॒श्याम॑ र॒यिँ र॑यिवः सु॒वीर॑म् । अ॒श्याम॒ वाज॑म॒भि वा॒जय॑न्तो॒ श्याम॑ द्यु॒म्नम॑जरा॒जरं॑ ते ।।

text:
Approaching with raised hands and adoration, we have this
 day fulfilled for thee thy longing.
 Worship the Gods with most devoted spirit as Priest with
 no unfriendly thought. O Agni.
meaning: व॒यं ते॑ अ॒द्य र॑रि॒मा हि काम॑मुत्ता॒नह॑स्ता॒ नम॑सोप॒सद्य॑ । यजि॑ष्ठेन॒ मन॑सा यक्षि दे॒वानस्रे॑धता॒ मन्म॑ना॒ विप्रो॑ अग्ने ।।

text:
Home-hider Agni, Indra, and Brahma, and bright Brihaspati—
 May the All Gods, one-minded, guard our sacrifice in happy
 place.
meaning: धा॑म॒च्छद॒ग्निरिन्द्रो॑ ब्र॒ह्मा दे॒वो बृह॒स्पतिः॑ । सचे॑तसो॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वाय॒ज्ञं प्राव॑न्तु नः शु॒भे ।।

text:
Guard thou the Sacrificer's men, O Youthfullest, etc., as in
 XIII. 52.
meaning: त्वं य॑विष्ठ दा॒शुषो॒ नॄँः पा॑हि शृणु॒धी गिरः॑ । रक्षा॑ तो॒कमु॒त त्मना॑ ।।

text:
SWEET with the sweet, I sprinkle thee with Soma, strong
 with the strong, the nectar with the nectar,
 The honey-sweet with what is sweet as honey.
 Soma art thou. Get dressed for the Asvins. Get dressed
 for Sarasvatî. Get dressed for Indra the Good Deliverer.
meaning: स्वा॒द्वीं त्वा॑ स्वा॒दुना॑ ती॒व्रां ती॒व्रेणा॒मृता॑म॒मृते॑न । मधु॑मतीं॒ मधु॑मता सृजामि॒ सँ सोमे॑न । सोमो॑ सि । अ॒श्विभ्यां॑ पच्यस्व । सर॑स्वत्यै पच्यस्व । इन्द्रा॑य सु॒त्राम्णे॑ पच्यस्व ।।

text:
Hence pour ye forth the flowing juice, Soma, best Sacrificial
 food.
 He who, man's friend, hath run within the waters hath with
 the pressing-stones poured out the Soma.
meaning: परी॒तो षि॑ञ्च॒ता सु॒तँ सोमो॒ य उ॑त्त॒मँ ह॒विः । द॑ध॒न्वा यो नर्यो॑ अ॒प्स्व॒न्तरा सु॒षाव॒ सोम॒मद्रि॑भिः ।।

text:
Purified by Vâyu's strainer, Soma that has passed away forward
 is Indra's proper friend.
 Purified by Vâyu's strainer, Soma that has passed away
 backward is Indra's proper friend.
meaning: वा॒योः पू॒तः प॒वित्रे॑ण प्र॒त्यङ्क्सोमो॒ अति॑द्रुतः । इन्द्र॑स्य॒ युज्यः॒ सखा॑ । वा॒योः पू॒तः प॒वित्रे॑ण प्र॒त्यङ्क्सोमो॒ अति॑द्रुतः । इन्द्र॑स्य॒ युज्यः॒ सखा॑ ।।

text:
By means of this eternal sieve may Sûrya's Daughter purify
 The Soma that flows forth from thee.
meaning: पु॒नाति॑ ते परि॒स्रुतँ॒ सोमँ॒ सूर्य॑स्य दुहि॒ता । वारे॑ण॒ शश्व॑ता॒ तना॑ ।।

text:
Soma with Wine, pressed; filtered for the banquet, cleanses
 priest, noble, brilliancy and vigour.
 God, with the Bright give Deities enjoyment: give food with
 flavour to the Sacrificer.
meaning: ब्रह्म॑ क्ष॒त्रं प॑वते॒ तेज॑ इन्द्रि॒यँ सुर॑या॒ सोमः॑ सु॒त आसु॑तो॒ मदा॑य । शु॒क्रेण॑ देव दे॒वताः॑ पिपृग्धि॒ रसे॒नान्नं॒ यज॑मानाय धेहि ।।

text:
What then? As men whose fields are full of barley, etc., as
 in X. 32.
 Taken upon a base art thou. I take thee for the Asvin Pair.
 Thee for Sarasvatî. Thee for Indra the Good Deliverer.
 This is thy home. For splendour thee. Thee for mans’
 vigour. Thee for strength.
meaning: कु॒विद॒ङ्ग यव॑मन्तो व॒यं चि॒द्यथा॒ दान्त्य॑नुपू॒र्वं वि॒यूय॑ । इ॒हेहै॑षां कृणुहि॒ भोज॑नानि॒ ये ब॒र्हिषो॒ नम॑उक्तिं॒ यज॑न्ति । उ॑पया॒मगृ॑हीतो स्य॒श्विभ्यां॑ त्वा॒ सर॑स्वत्यै॒ त्वेन्द्रा॑य त्वा सु॒त्राम्णे॑ । ए॒ष ते॒ योनि॒स्तेज॑से त्वा वी॒र्या॑य त्वा॒ बला॑य त्वा ।।

text:
For each of you is made a God-appointed place: so grant to
 me a portion in the highest sphere.
 Surâ the strong art thou. This here is Soma. Entering
 thine own place do me no mischief.
meaning: नाना॒ हि वां॑ दे॒वहि॑तँ॒ सद॑स्कृ॒तं मा सँ सृ॑क्षाथां पर॒मे व्यो॑मन् । सुरा॒ त्वम॑सि शु॒ष्मिणी॒ सोम॑ ए॒ष मा मा॑ हिँसीः॒ स्वां योनि॑मावि॒शन्ती॑ ।।

text:
Taken upon a base art thou. Splendour of Asvins, Sarasvatî's
 manly vigour, might of Indra.
 This is thy home. I take thee for enjoyment. I take thee
 for delight, take thee for greatness.
meaning: उ॑पया॒मगृ॑हीतो॒ स्याश्वि॑नं॒ तेजः॑ सारस्व॒तं वी॒र्य॑ऐ॒न्द्रं बल॑म् । ए॒ष ते॒ योनि॒र्मोदा॑य त्वान॒न्दाय॑ त्वा॒ मह॑से त्वा ।।

text:
Thou art lustre: give me lustre, Thou art manly vigour:
 give me manly vigour.
 Thou art strength: give me strength. Thou art energy:
 give me energy.
 Thou art passion: Give me passion. Thou art conquering
 might: give me conquering might.
meaning: तेजो॑ सि॒ तेजो॒ मयि॑ धेहि । वी॒र्य॑मसि वी॒र्यं॒ मयि॑ धेहि । बल॑मसि॒ बलं॒ मयि॑ धेहि । ओजो॒ स्योजो॒ मयि॑ धेहि । म॒न्युर॑सि म॒न्युं मयि॑ धेहि । सहो॑ सि॒ सहो॒ मयि॑ धेहि ।।

text:
My she, Vishûchikâ, who guards these two, the tiger and
 the wolf,
 The lion and the wingèd hawk, may she guard this man
 from distress.
meaning: या व्या॒घ्रं विषू॑चिकोभौ॒ वृकं॑ च॒ रक्ष॑ति । श्ये॒नं प॑त॒त्रिणँ॑ सिँ॒हँ सेमं पा॒त्वँह॑सः ।।

text:
When, a delighted boy, I bruised my mother as I sucked
 her breast,

Free from my debt, O Agni, I become thereby. My parents
 are by me unharmed.
 United are ye all: with bliss unite me. Parted are ye, keep
 me apart from evil.
meaning: यदा॑पि॒पेष॑ मा॒तरं॑ पु॒त्रः प्रमु॑दितो॒ धय॑न् । ए॒तत्तद॑ग्ने अनृ॒णो भ॑वा॒म्यह॑तौ पि॒तरौ॒ मया॑ । स॒म्पृच॑ स्थ॒ सं मा॑ भ॒द्रेण॑ पृङ्क्त । वि॒पृच॑ स्थ॒ वि मा॑ पा॒प्मना॑ पृङ्क्त ।।

text:
The Asvins, the Physicians, Gods, stretched out the healing
 sacrifice,
 Sarasvatî with speech was a Physician, all with heroic powers
 investing Indra.
meaning: दे॒वा य॒ज्ञम॑तन्वत भेष॒जं भि॒षजा॒श्विना॑ । वा॒चा सर॑स्वती भि॒षगिन्द्रा॑येन्द्रि॒याणि॒ दध॑तः ।।

text:
Symbols of Dîkshâ are grass buds, of Prâyanîya sprouts of
 corn,
 Of Soma-purchasing fried grains are symbols, Soma-shoots
 and meath.
meaning: दी॒क्षायै॑ रू॒पँ शष्पा॑णि प्राय॒णीय॑स्य॒ तोक्मा॑नि । क्र॒यस्य॑ रू॒पँ सोम॑स्य ला॒जाः सो॑माँ॒शवो॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Âtithya's sign is Mâsara, the Gharma's symbol Nagnahu.
 Three nights with Surâ poured, this is the symbol of the
 Upasads.
meaning: आ॑तिथ्यरू॒पं मास॑रं महावी॒रस्य॑ न॒ग्नहुः॑ । रू॒पमु॑प॒सदा॑मे॒तत्ति॒स्रो रात्रीः॒ सुरासु॑ता ।।

text:
Emblem of purchased Soma is Parisrut, foaming drink effused:
 Indra's balm milked for Indra by the Asvins and Sarasvatî.
meaning: सोम॑स्य रू॒प क्री॒तस्य॑ परि॒स्रुत्परि॑ षिच्यते । अ॒श्विभ्यां॑ दु॒द्ग्धं भे॑ष॒जमिन्द्रा॑यै॒न्द्रँ सर॑स्वत्या ।।

text:
The Sacrificer's seat is the throne's symbol, the jar containing
 Surâ of the Altar.
 The mid-space is the northern Altar's symbol: the cloth for
 filtering is the physician.
meaning: आ॑स॒न्दी रू॒पँ रा॑जासन्द्यै॒ वेद्यै॑ कु॒म्भी सु॑रा॒धानी॑ । अन्त॑र उत्तरवे॒द्या रू॒पं का॑रोत॒रो भि॒षक् ।।

text:
Altar by Altar is produced, power, holy grass by holy grass.
 The stake is by the stake obtained, by Agni Agni carried
 forth.
meaning: वेद्या॒ वेदिः॒ समा॑प्यते ब॒र्हिषा॑ ब॒र्हिरि॑न्द्रि॒यम् । यूपे॑न॒ यूप॑ आप्यते॒ प्रणी॑तो अ॒ग्निर॒ग्निना॑ ।।

text:
The Asvins are the Soma store, Sarasvatî the sacred hearth.
 For Indra formed is Indra s seat, the Matrons' Hall, the
 house-lord's fire.
meaning: ह॑वि॒र्धानं॒ यद॒श्विनाग्नी॑ध्रं॒ यत्सर॑स्वती । इन्द्रा॑यै॒न्द्रँ सद॑स्कृ॒तं प॑त्नी॒शालं॒ गार्ह॑पत्यः ।।

text:
Orders he gains by orders, by Âprîs Âprîs of sacrifice,
 Post-offerings by fore-offerings, and by calls of Vashat Âhutis.
meaning: प्रै॒षेभिः॑ प्रै॒षाना॑प्नोत्या॒प्रीभि॑रा॒प्रीर्य॒ज्ञस्य॑ । प्र॑या॒जेभि॑रनुया॒जान्व॑षट्कारेभि॒राहु॑तीः ।।

text:
By victims he gains victims, by ground rice-cakes sacrificial
 food,
 By metres kindling-verses, and Vashat-calls by Inviting
 prayers.
meaning: प॒शुभिः॑ प॒शूना॑प्नोति पुरो॒डाशै॑र्ह॒वीँष्या । छन्दो॑भिः सामिधे॒नीर्या॒ज्या॑भिर्वषट्का॒रान् ।।

text:
Grain roasted, gruel, barley-meal, grains of rice roasted, milk
 and curd
 Are types of Soma: mingled milk, sweet whey, of sacrificial
 food.
meaning: धा॒नाः क॑र॒म्भः सक्त॑वः परीवा॒पः पयो॒ दधि॑ । सोम॑स्य रू॒पँ ह॒विष॑ आ॒मिक्षा॒ वाजि॑नं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Type of parched corn is jujube-fruit; wheat of the roasted
 grains of rice; Jujube the type of barley-meal, and Indra-grains
 of gruel-groats.
meaning: धा॒नानाँ॑ रू॒पं कुव॑लं परीवा॒पस्य॑ गो॒धूमाः॑ । सक्तू॑नाँ रू॒पं बद॑रमुप॒वाकाः॑ कर॒म्भस्य॑ ।।

text:
Symbol of milk are barley-grains, symbol of curd are
 jujube-fruits.
 Whey is the type of Soma, and milk-mixture type of
 Soma's pap.
meaning: पय॑सो रू॒पं यद्यवा॑ द॒ध्नो रू॒पं क॒र्कन्धू॑नि । सओ॑मस्य रू॒पं वाजि॑नँ सौ॒म्यस्य॑ रू॒पमा॒मिक्षा॑ ।।

text:
The Strophe is the cry, Bid hear? the answer is the antistrophe.
 Sacrifice! is the Dhâyyâ's form, Pragâthas’ the Yajâmahas.
meaning: आ श्रा॑व॒येति॑ स्तो॒त्रियाः॑ प्रत्याश्रा॒वो अनु॑रूपः । यजेति॑ धय्यारू॒पं प्र॑गा॒था ये॑यजाम॒हाः ।।

text:
By verse-halves comes the Ukthas’ type, Nivids by Padas he
 obtains.
 The type of Sastras is obtained by Pranavas, Soma by milk.
meaning: अ॑र्धऋचैरु॒क्थानाँ॑ रू॒पं पदैराप्नोति नि॒विदः॑ । प्र॒णवैः॑ श॒स्त्राणाँ॑ रू॒पं पय॑सा॒ सोम॑ आप्यते ।।

text:
Gained by the Asvins is the morn's libation, Indra's libation
 of mid-day by Indra.
 Sarasvatî obtains the third outpouring, the offering sacred
 to the Visve Devas.
meaning: अ॒श्विभ्यां॑ प्रातःसव॒नमिन्द्रे॑णै॒न्द्रं माध्य॑न्दिनम् । वै॑श्वदे॒वँ सर॑स्वत्या तृ॒तीय॑मा॒प्तँ सव॑नम् ।।

text:
By Vâyu cups he gains the cups of Vâyu, and by the basket
 gains the vat for Soma.
 By the two jars he gains two cleansing-vessels, and by the
 cooking-pot the pot for cooking.
meaning: वा॑यव्यैर्वाय॒व्या॑नाप्नोति॒ सते॑न द्रोणकल॒शम् । कु॒म्भीभ्या॑मम्भृणौ सु॒ते स्था॒लीभि॑ स्था॒लीरा॑प्नोति ।।

text:
By sacrificial texts are gained the Grahas, and by the Grahas
 lauds and laud-arrangements.
 By metres are obtained Ukthas and praise-songs, and by the
 Sâma-chant the Avabhritha.
meaning: यजु॑र्व्हिराप्यन्ते॒ ग्रहा॒ ग्रहै॒ स्तोमा॑श्च॒ विष्टु॑तीः । छन्दो॑भिरुक्थाश॒स्त्राणि॒ साम्ना॑वभृ॒थ आ॑प्यते ।।

text:
Draughts he obtains by pouring out libations, and wishes
 by the utterance of praises,
 By Samyu he obtains Patnîsamyâjas, and Consummation by
 Samishtayajus.
meaning: इडा॑भिर्भ॒क्षाना॑प्नोति सूक्तवा॒केना॒शिषः॑ । श॒म्युना॑ पत्नीसंया॒जान्त्स॑मिष्टय॒जुषा॑ सँ॒स्थाम् ।।

text:
He gains by vow of fasting Consecration, by Consecration
 gains the priestly guerdon.
 He gains by priestly guerdon faith: by faith comes knowledge
 of the truth.
meaning: व्र॒तेन॑ दी॒क्षामा॑प्नोति दी॒क्षया॑प्नोति॒ दक्षि॑णाम् । दक्षि॑णा श्र॒द्धामा॑प्नोति श्र॒द्धया॑ स॒त्यमा॑प्यते ।।

text:
So far the type of sacrifice was formed by Brahma, and the
 Gods.
 All this he gains, when juice is shed, in the Santrâmanî
 sacrifice.
meaning: ए॒ताव॑द्रू॒पं य॒ज्ञस्य॒ यद्देवै॒र्ब्रह्म॑णा कृ॒तम् । तदे॒तत्सर्व॑माप्नोति य॒ज्ञे सौ॑त्राम॒णी सु॒ते ।।

text:
The rite with sacred grass, wine, store of heroes, the mighty
 ones speed on with adorations.
 May we, sweet-singing sacrificers, setting Soma mid Gods in
 heaven, give joy to Indra.
meaning: सुरा॑वन्तं बर्हि॒षदँ॑ सु॒वीरं॑ य॒ज्ञँ हि॑न्वन्ति महि॒षा नमो॑भिः । दधा॑नाः॒ सोमं॑ दि॒वि दे॒वता॑सु॒ मदे॒मेन्द्रं॒ यज॑मानाः स्व॒र्काः ।।

text:
All essence of thine own in plants collected, all strength of
 Soma when poured out with Surâ—
 Therewith impel with joy the sacrifice, Sarasvatî, the Asvins,
 Indra, Agni.
meaning: यस्ते॒ रसः॒ सम्भृ॑त॒ ओष॑धीषु॒ सोम॑स्य॒ शुष्मः॒ सुर॑या सु॒तस्य॑ । तेन॑ जिन्व॒ यज॑मानं॒ मदे॑न॒ सर॑स्वतीम॒श्विना॒विन्द्र॑म॒ग्निम् ।।

text:
That which Sarasvatî poured out for Indra, by Asvins
 brought from Namuchi the demon,
 This flowing drop, brilliant and full of sweetness, I drink
 and feed on here, the King, the Soma.
meaning: यम॒श्विना॒ नमु॑चेरासु॒रादधि॒ सर॑स्व॒त्यसु॑नोदिन्द्रि॒याय॑ । इ॒मं तँ शु॒क्रं मधु॑मन्त॒मिन्दुँ॒ सोमँ॒ राजा॑नमि॒ह भ॑क्षयामि ।।

text:
Whatever portion of the savoury fluid is clinging here,
 what Indra drank with powers,
 That drop thereof with pure and holy spirit I drink and
 feed upon, the King, the Soma.
meaning: यदत्र॑ रि॒प्तँ र॒सिनः॑ सु॒तस्य॒ यदिन्द्रो॒ अपि॑ब॒च्छची॑भिः । अ॒हं तद॑स्य॒ मन॑सा शि॒वेन॒ सोमँ॒ राजा॑नमि॒ह भ॑क्षयामि ।।

text:
To Fathers who claim Svadhâ be Svadhâ and homage!
 To Grandfathers who claim Svadhâ be Svadhâ and homage!
 To Great-grandfathers who claim Svadhâ be Svadhâ and
 homage!
 The Fathers have eaten. The Fathers have rejoiced. The
 Fathers have been satisfied, Fathers, be ye purified.
meaning: पि॒तृभ्यः॑ स्वधा॒यिभ्यः॑ स्व॒धा नमः॑ । पि॑ताम॒हेभ्यः॑ स्वधा॒यिभ्यः॑ स्व॒धा नमः॑ । प्रपि॑तामहेभ्यः स्वधा॒यिभ्यः॑ स्व॒धा नमः॑ । अक्ष॑न्पि॒तरः॑ । अमी॑मदन्त पि॒तरः॑ । अती॑तृपन्त पि॒तरः॑ । पित॑रः शुन्धध्वम् ।।

text:
Cleanse me the Fathers who enjoy Soma! Grandfathers
 make me clean!
 May Great-grandfathers cleanse me with a sieve that brings
 a century.
 May my Grandfathers cleanse me, may my Great-grand-fathers
 make me clean.
 With sieve that brings a century may I obtain full length
 of life.
meaning: पु॒नन्तु॑ मा पि॒तरः॑ सो॒म्यासः॑ पु॒नन्तु॑ मा पिताम॒हाः । पु॒नन्तु॒ प्रपि॑तामहाः प॒वित्रे॑ण श॒तायु॑षा । पु॒नन्तु॑ मा पिताम॒हाः सो॒म्यासः॑ पु॒नन्तु॒ प्रपि॑तामहाः । प॒वित्रे॑ण श॒तायु॑षा॒ विश्व॒मायु॒र्व्य॑श्नवै ।।

text:
Agni, thou poorest life: send down upon us food and vigorous
 strength.
 Drive thou misfortune far away.
meaning: अग्न॒ आयूँ॑षि पवस्व॒ आ सु॒वोर्ज॒मिषं॑ च नः । आ॒रे बा॑धस्व दु॒च्छुना॑म् ।।

text:
Cleanse me the companies of Gods! May thoughts with
 spirit make me clean.
 Cleanse me all things that be! Do thou, O Jâtavedas, make
 me clean.
meaning: पु॒नन्तु॑ मा देव॒जनाः॑ पु॒नन्तु॒ मन॑सा॒ धियः॑ । पु॒नन्तु॒ विश्वा॑ भू॒तानि॒ जात॑वेदः पुनी॒हि मा॑ ।।

text:
Purify me, O Agni, God, refulgent with thy pure bright
 sieve,
 With powers according to thine own.
meaning: प॒वित्रे॑ण पुनीहि मा शु॒क्रेण॑ देव॒ दीद्य॑त् । अग्ने॒ क्रत्वा॒ क्रतूँ॒रनु॑ ।।

text:
O Agni, may the cleansing sieve, diffused through all thy
 fiery glow,
 Holy devotion, make me clean.
meaning: यत्ते॑ प॒वित्र॑म॒र्चिष्यग्ने॒ वित॑तमन्त॒रा । ब्रह्म॒ तेन॑ पुनातु मा ।।

text:
May Pavamâna with his sieve, Guest of all tribes, cleanse
 us to-day,
 He who is Cleanser make us clean.
meaning: पव॑मानः॒ सो अ॒द्य नः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ण॒ विच॑र्षणिः । यः पोता॒ स पु॑नातु मा ।।

text:
Savitar, God, by both of these, libation, purifying power,
 Purify me on every side.
meaning: उ॒भाभ्यां॑ देव सवितः प॒वित्रे॑ण स॒वेन॑ च । मां पु॑नीहि वि॒श्वतः॑ ।।

text:
Dear to all Gods hath come the cleansing Goddess, she who
 contains these many smooth-backed figures.
 Through her may we in sacrificial banquets taking our pleasure
 be the lords of riches.
meaning: वै॑श्वदे॒वी पु॑न॒ती दे॒व्यागा॒द्यस्या॑मि॒मा ब॒ह्व्य॑स्त॒न्वो॑ वी॒तपृ॑ष्ठाः । तया॒ मद॑न्तः सध॒मादे॑षु व॒यँ स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाम् ।।

text:
The Fathers who in Yama's realm are equal and unanimous—
 Their world is Svadhâ, reverence. To Gods let sacrifice be
 paid.
meaning: ये स॑मा॒नाः सम॑नसः पि॒तरो॑ यम॒राज्ये॑ । तेषां॑ लो॒कः स्व॒धा नमो॑ य॒ज्ञो दे॒वेषु॑ कल्पताम् ।।

text:
Equals, unanimous, my folk yet living among those who
 live—
 On me be set their glory through a hundred years in this
 our world.
meaning: ये स॑मा॒नाः सम॑नसो जी॒वा जी॒वेषु॑ माम॒काः । तेषाँ॒ श्रीर्मयि॑ कल्पताम॒स्मिं लो॒के सतँ समाः॑ ।।

text:
I have heard mention of two several pathways, way of the
 Fathers, way of Gods and mortals.
 On these two roads each moving creature travels, each
 thing between the Father and the Mother.
meaning: द्वे सृ॒ती अ॑शृनवं पितॄ॒णाम॒हं दे॒वाना॑मु॒त मर्त्या॑नाम् । ताभ्या॑मि॒दं विश्व॒मेज॒त्समे॑ति॒ यद॑न्त॒रा पि॒तरं॑ मा॒तरं॑ च ।।

text:
May this my sacrifice bring store of children, with ten
 brave sons, full-companied, for welfare—
 Life-winning, winning offspring, winning cattle, winning this
 world of ours and peace and safety.
 May Agni make nay progeny abundant. Do ye confer food,
 milk, and wanly vigour.
meaning: इ॒दँ ह॒विः प्र॒जन॑नं मे अस्तु॒ दश॑वीरँ॒ सर्व॑गणँ स्व॒स्तये॑ । आ॑त्म॒सनि॑ प्रजा॒सनि॑ पशु॒सनि॑ लोक॒सन्य॑भय॒सनि॑ । अ॒ग्निः प्र॒जां ब॑हु॒लां मे॑ करो॒त्वन्नं॒ पयो॒ रेतो॑ अ॒स्मासु॑ धत्त ।।

text:
May they ascend, the lowest, highest, midmost, the Fathers
 who deserve a share of Soma.
 May Fathers who have gained the world of spirits, gentle
 and righteous, aid us when we call them.
meaning: उदी॑रता॒मव॑र॒ उत्परा॑स॒ उन्म॑ध्य॒माः पि॒तरः॑ सो॒म्यासः॑ । असुं॒ य ई॒युर॑वृ॒का ऋ॑त॒ज्ञास्ते नो॑ वन्तु पि॒तरो॒ हवे॑षु ।।

text:
Our Fathers are Angirases, Navagvas, Atharvans, Bhrigus,
 who deserve the Soma.
 May these the holy look on us with favour: may we enjoy
 their gracious loving-kindness.
meaning: अङ्गि॑रसो नः पि॒तरो॒ नव॑ग्वा॒ अथ॑र्वाणो॒ भृग॑वः सो॒म्यासः॑ । तेषां॑ व॒यँ सु॑मतौ य॒ज्ञिया॑ना॒मपि॑ भ॒द्रे सौ॑मन॒से स्या॑म ।।

text:
Our ancient Fathers who deserve the Soma, who came, most
 noble, to our Soma banquet—
 With these let Yama, yearning with the yearning, rejoicing
 eat our offerings at his pleasure.
meaning: ये नः॒ पूर्वे॑ पि॒तरः॑ सो॒म्यासो॑ नूहि॒रे सो॑मपी॒थं वसि॑ष्ठाः । तेभि॑र्य॒मः सँ॑ररा॒णो ह॒वीँष्यु॒शन्नु॒शद्भिः॑ प्रतिका॒मम॑त्तु ।।

text:
Thou, Soma, art preeminent for wisdom: along the straightest
 path thou art our leader.
 Our prudent Fathers by thy wisdom, Soma, dealt out
 among the Gods their share of treasure.
meaning: त्वँ सो॑म॒ प्र चि॑कितो मनी॒षा त्वँ रजि॑ष्ठ॒मनु॑ नेषि॒ पन्था॑म् । तव॒ प्रणी॑ती पि॒तरो॑ न इन्दो दे॒वेषु॒ रत्न॑मभजन्त॒ धीराः॑ ।।

text:
For our sage Fathers, Soma Pavamâna, of old performed by
 thee their sacred duties.
 Fighting unvanquished, open the enclosures: enrich us
 with large gifts of steeds and heroes.
meaning: त्वया॒ हि नः॑ पि॒तरः॑ सोम॒ पूर्वे॒ कर्मा॑णि च॒क्रुः प॑वमान॒ धीराः॑ । व॒न्वन्नवा॑तः परि॒धीँरपो॑र्णु वी॒रेभि॒रश्वै॑र्म॒घवा॑ भवा नः ।।

text:
Associate with the Fathers thou, O Soma, hast spread thyself
 abroad through earth and heaven.
 So with oblation let us serve thee, Indu, and so let us become
 the lords of riches.
meaning: त्वँ सो॑म पि॒तृभिः॑ संविदा॒नो नु॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी आ त॑तन्थ । तस्मै॑ त इन्दो ह॒विषा॑ विधेम व॒यँ स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाम् ।।

text:
Fathers who sit on sacred grass, come help us: these offerings
 we have made for you; accept them.
 So come to us with most auspicious favour, and give us
 health and strength without a trouble.
meaning: बर्हि॑षदः पितर ऊ॒त्य॒र्वागि॒मा वो॑ ह॒व्या च॑कृमा जु॒षध्व॑म् । त आ ग॒ताव॑सा॒ शंत॑मे॒नाथा॑ नः॒ शं योर॑र॒पो द॑धात ।।

text:
I have attained the gracious-minded Fathers, have gained
 a son and progeny from Vishnu.
 They who enjoy pressed juices with oblation, seated on
 sacred grass, come oftenest hither.
meaning: आहं पि॒तॄन्सु॑वि॒दत्राँ॑ अवित्सि॒ नपा॑तं च वि॒क्रम॑णं च॒ विष्णोः॑ । ब॑र्हि॒षदो॒ ये स्व॒धया॑ सु॒तस्य॒ भज॑न्त पि॒त्वस्त इ॒हाग॑मिष्ठाः ।।

text:
May they, the Fathers, worthy of the Soma, invited to their
 favourite oblations
 Laid on the sacred grass, come nigh and listen: may they
 be gracious unto us and bless us.
meaning: उप॑हूताः पि॒तरः॑ सो॒म्यासो॑ बर्हि॒ष्ये॑षु नि॒धिषु॑ प्रि॒येषु॑ । त आ ग॑मन्तु॒ त इ॒ह श्रु॑व॒न्त्वधि॑ ब्रुवन्तु॒ ते॑ वन्त्व॒स्मान् ।।

text:
May they our Fathers whom the flames have tasted, worthy
 of Soma, come on God-ward pathways.
 Enjoying at this sacrifice their portion, may they be gracious
 unto us and bless us.
meaning: आ य॑न्तु नः पि॒तरः॑ सो॒म्यासो॑ ग्निष्वा॒त्ताः प॒थिभि॑र्देव॒यानैः॑ । अ॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञे स्व॒धया॒ मद॒न्तो धि॑ ब्रुवन्तु॒ ते॑ वन्त्व॒स्मान् ।।

text:
Fathers whom Agni's flames have tasted, come ye nigh:
 ye kindly leaders, take ye each your proper place.
 Eat sacrificial food presented on the grass: grant riches
 with a multitude of hero sons.
meaning: अग्नि॑ष्वात्ताः पितर॒ एह ग॑च्छत॒ सदः॑सदः सदत सुप्रणीतयः । अ॒त्ता ह॒वीँषि॒ प्रय॑तानि ब॒र्हिष्यथा॑ र॒यिँ सर्व॑वीरं दधातन ।।

text:
For those who, burnt with fire or not cremated, joy in their
 portion in the midst of heaven,
 May the Self-Ruler form the world of spirits and this their
 body as his pleasure wills it.
meaning: ये अ॑ग्निष्वा॒त्ता ये अन॑ग्निष्वात्ता॒ मध्ये॑ दि॒वः स्व॒धया॑ मा॒दय॑न्ते । तेभ्यः॑ स्व॒राडसु॑नीतिमे॒तां य॑थाव॒शं त॒न्वं॑ कल्पयाति ।।

text:
We call the Agnishvâttas, true to seasons, those who drank
 Soma in the Nârâsamsa.
 Prompt to give ear to us be they, the sages, and then let
 us be lords of wealth and treasure.
meaning: अ॑ग्निष्वा॒त्ताँ ऋ॑तु॒मतो॑ हवामहे नाराशँ॒से सो॑मपी॒थं य आ॒शुः । ते नो॒ विप्रा॑सः सु॒हवा॑ भवन्तु व॒यँ स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाम् ।।

text:
Bowing the bended knee and seated southward, accept ye,
 all, this sacrifice with favour.
 Injure us not for any sin, O Fathers, which we through
 human frailty have committed.
meaning: आच्या॒ जानु॑ दक्षिण॒तो नि॒षद्ये॒मं य॒ज्ञम॒भि गृ॑णीत॒ विश्वे॑ । मा हिँ॑सिष्ट पितरः॒ केन॑ चिन्नो॒ यद्व॒ आगः॑ पुरु॒षता॒ करा॑म ।।

text:
Lapped in the bosom of the purple Mornings give riches
 to the man who brings oblation.
 Grant to his sons a portion of your treasure, and, present,
 give us energy, ye Fathers.
meaning: आसी॑नासो अरु॒णीना॑मु॒पस्थे॑ र॒यिं ध॑त्त दा॒शुषे॒ मर्त्या॑य । पु॒त्रेभ्यः॑ पितर॒स्तस्य॒ वस्वः॒ प्र य॑च्छत॒ त इ॒होर्जं॑ दधात ।।

text:
O Agni Kavyavâhana, cause us to praise before the Gods,
 As our associate meet for lauds, wealth which e’en thou reputest
 wealth.
meaning: यम॑ग्ने कव्यवाहन॒ त्वं चि॒न्मन्य॑से र॒यिम् । तं नो॑ गी॒र्भिः श्र॒वाय्यं॑ देव॒त्रा प॑नया॒ युज॑म् ।।

text:
May Agni, Kavya-bearer, who hath worshipped Fathers
 true to Law.
 Announce to Gods and Fathers these our sacrificial offerings.
meaning: यो अ॒ग्निः क॑व्य॒वाह॑नः पि॒तॄन्यक्ष॑दृता॒वृधः॑ । प्रेदु॑ ह॒व्यानि॑ वोचति दे॒वेभ्य॑श्च पि॒तृभ्य॒ आ ।।

text:
Thou. Agni Kavya-bearer, when entreated, didst bear the
 offerings which thou madest fragrant,
 And gayest to the Fathers who did eat them with Svadhâ.
 Eat, thou God, the gifts we bring thee.
meaning: त्वम॑ग्न ईडि॒तः क॑व्यवाह॒नावा॑ड्ढ॒व्यानि॑ सुर॒भीणि॑ कृ॒त्वी । प्रादाः॑ पि॒तृभ्यः॑ स्व॒धया॒ ते अ॑क्षन्न॒द्धि त्वं दे॑व॒ प्रय॑ता ह॒वीँषि॑ ।।

text:
Thou, Jâtavedas, knowest well the number of Fathers who
 are here and who are absent,
 Of Fathers whom we know and whom we know not. Accept
 the sacrifice arranged with portions.
meaning: ये चे॒ह पि॒तरो॒ ये च॒ नेह याँश्च॑ वि॒द्म याँ उ॑ च॒ न प्र॑वि॒द्म । त्वं वे॑त्थ॒ यति॒ ते जा॑तवेदः स्व॒धाभि॑र्य॒ज्ञँ सुकृ॑तं जुषस्व ।।

text:
Now let us pay this homage to the Fathers, to those who
 passed of old and those who followed,
 Those who have rested in the earthly region and those who
 dwell among the Mighty Races.
meaning: इ॒दं पि॒तृभ्यो॒ नमो॑ अस्त्व॒द्य ये पूर्वा॑सो॒ य उप॑रास ई॒युः । ये पार्थि॑वे॒ रज॒स्या निष॑त्ता॒ ये वा॑ नू॒नँ सु॑वृ॒जना॑सु वि॒क्षु ।।

text:
As in the days of old our ancient Fathers speeding the work
 of holy worship, Agni!
 Sought pure light and devotion, singing praises, they cleft
 the ground and made red Dawns apparent.
meaning: अधा॒ यथा॑ नः पि॒तरः॒ परा॑सः प्र॒त्नासो॑ अग्न ऋ॒तमा॑शुषा॒णाः । शुचीद॑य॒न्दीधि॑तिमुक्थ॒शासः॒ क्षामा॑ भि॒न्दन्तो॑ अरु॒णीरप॑ व्रन् ।।

text:
Right gladly do we set thee down, right gladly make thee
 burn and glow.
 Gladly bring yearning Fathers nigh to eat the food of
 sacrifice.
meaning: उ॒शन्त॑स्त्वा॒ नि धी॑मह्यु॒शन्तः॒ समि॑धीमहि । उ॒शन्नु॑श॒त आ व॑ह पि॒तॄन्ह॒विषे॒ अत्त॑वे ।।

text:
Indra, with waters’ foam didst thou wrench off the head of
 Namuchi,
 Subduing all contending hosts.
meaning: अ॒पां पेने॑न॒ नमु॑चेः॒ शिर॑ इ॒न्द्रोद॑वर्तयः । विश्वा॒ यदज॑य॒ स्पृधः॑ ।।

text:
King Soma, pressed, the Drink of Life, left Death behind
 with Soma-dregs.
 By Law came truth and Indra-power, the pure bright drinking-off
 of juice. The power of Indra was this sweet immortal
 milk.
meaning: सोमो॒ राजा॒मृतँ॑ सु॒त ऋ॑जी॒षेणा॑जहान्मृ॒त्युम् । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
The Snipe of Angiras by thought from out the waters
 drank up milk.
 By Law came truth, etc., as in 72.
meaning: अ॒द्भ्यः क्षी॒रं व्य॑पिब॒त्क्रुङ्ङा॑ङ्गिर॒सो धि॒या । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
The Hamsa throned in light drank up by metre Soma from
 the floods.
 By Law, etc.
meaning: सोम॑म॒द्भ्यो व्य॑पिब॒च्छन्द॑सा हँ॒सः शु॑चि॒षत् । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Prajâpati by Brahma drank the essence from the foaming
 food, the princely power, milk, Soma juice. By Law, etc.
meaning: अन्ना॑त्परि॒स्रुतो॒ रसं॒ ब्रह्म॑णा॒ व्य॑पिबत्क्ष॒त्रं पयः॒ सोमं॑ प्र॒जाप॑तिः । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
The generative part enters the
yoni:
 it leaves aside the

retas
 and the
mûtra
.
 The caul-invested embryo leaves by its birth the covering
 folds. By Law, etc.
meaning: रेतो॒ मूत्रं॒ वि ज॑हाति॒ योनिं॑ प्रवि॒शद्र॒यिम् । गर्भो॑ ज॒रायु॒णावृ॑त॒ उल्वं॑ जहाति॒ जन्म॑ना । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Viewing both forms Prajâpati gave truth and falsehood
 different shapes.
 Prajâpati assigned the lack of faith to falsehood, faith to
 truth. By Law, etc.
meaning: दृ॒ष्ट्वा रू॒पे व्याक॑रोत्सत्यानृ॒ते प्र॒जाप॑तिः । अश्र॑द्धा॒मनृ॒ते द॑धाच्छ्र॒द्धाँ स॒त्ये प्र॒जाप॑तिः । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
By holy lore Prajâpati drank up both forms, pressed and
 unpressed.
 By Law, etc.
meaning: वेदे॑न रू॒पे व्य॑पिबत्सुतासुतौ प्र॒जाप॑तिः । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Seeing the farming liquor's sap, Prajâpati with the bright
 drank nut the bright the milk, the Soma juice. By Law,
 etc.
meaning: दृ॒ष्ट्वा प॑रि॒स्रुतो॒ रसँ॑ शु॒क्रेण॑ शु॒क्रं व्य॑पिबत् । पयः॒ सोमं॑ प्र॒जाप॑तिः । ऋ॒तेन॑ स॒त्यमि॑न्द्रि॒यं वि॒पानँ॑ शु॒क्रमन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑स्येन्द्रि॒यमि॒दं पयो॒ मृतं॒ मधु॑ ।।

text:
Wise, with mind, lead, and thread of wool the sages twine
 an amulet.
 Sarasvatî, Savitar, Varuna, the Asvins span sacrifice and
 healed his form for Indra.
meaning: सीसे॑न॒ तन्त्रं॒ मन॑सा मनी॒षिणा॑ ऊर्णासू॒त्रेण॑ क॒वयो॑ वयन्ति । अ॒श्विना॑ य॒ज्ञँ स॑वि॒ता सर॑स्व॒तीन्द्र॑स्य रू॒पं वरु॑णो भिष॒ज्यन् ।।

text:
This his immortal shape with mighty powers three Deities
 bestowing gifts compounded.
 His hair they made with sprouts of grass and barley, and
 roasted grain with skin and flesh supplied him.
meaning: तद॑स्य रू॒पम॒मृतँ॒ शची॑भिस्त॒स्रो द॑धुर्दे॒वताः॑ सँररा॒णाः । लोमा॑नि॒ शष्पै॑र्बहु॒धा न तोक्म॑भि॒स्त्वग॑स्य माँ॒सम॑भव॒न्न ला॒जाः ।।

text:
His inner shape Sarasvatî arranges and, borne on bright
 paths, the Physician Asvins:
 With Mâsaras and sieve his bone and marrow, as on the
 Oxen's hide they lay the liquor.
meaning: तद॒श्विना॑ भि॒षजा॑ रु॒द्रव॑र्तनी॒ सर॑स्वती वयति॒ पेशो॒ अन्त॑रम् । अस्थि॑ म॒ज्जानं॒ मास॑रैः कारोत॒रेण॒ दध॑तो॒ गवां॑ त्व॒चि ।।

text:
By thought Sarasvatî with both Nâsatyas forms lovely treasure
 and a beauteous body.
 Like shuttle through the loom the steady ferment mixes
 the red juice with the foaming spirit.
meaning: सर॑स्वती॒ मन॑सा पेश॒लं वसु॒ नास॑त्याभ्यां वयति दर्श॒तं वपुः॑ । रसं॑ परि॒स्रुता॒ न रोहि॑तं न॒ग्नहु॒र्धीर॒स्तस॑रं॒ न वेम॑ ।।

text:
By milk they generated bright immortal, productive seed,
 by Surâ seed from urine,
 Chasing afar folly and ill intention, crude food and wind
 and meat that loads the stomach.
meaning: पय॑सा शु॒क्रम॒मृतं॑ ज॒नित्रँ॒ सुर॑या॒ मूत्रा॑ज्जनयन्त॒ रेतः॑ । अपाम॑तिं दुर्म॒तिं बाध॑माना॒ ऊव॑ध्यं॒ वातँ॑ स॒ब्वं॒ तदा॒रात् ।।

text:
Heart with his heart Indra Good Guardian gendered: with
 rice-cake Savitar gave truth its being.
 Varuna, doctoring the lungs and liver, forms, as with Vâyu
 cups, the gall and kidneys.
meaning: इन्द्रः॑ सु॒त्रामा॒ हृद॑येण स॒त्यं पु॑रो॒डाशे॑न सवि॒ता ज॑जान । यकृ॑त्क्लो॒मानं॒ वरु॑णो भिष॒ज्यन्मत॑स्ने वायव्यै॒र्न मि॑नाति पि॒त्तम् ।।

text:
Cooking-pots pouring honey were the entrails: like a
 well-milking cow the pans were bowels.
 A hawk's wing was the spleen: through mighty powers the
 stool as mother was navel and belly.
meaning: आ॒न्त्राणि॑ स्था॒लीर्मधु॒ पिन्व॑माना॒ गुदाः॒ पात्रा॑णि सु॒दुघा॒ न धे॒नुः । श्ये॒नस्य॒ पत्रं॒ न प्ली॒हा श॑चीभिरास॒न्दी नाभि॑रु॒दरं॒ न मा॒ता ।।

text:
The pitcher was the father of the rectum by powers, the
 womb which first contained the infant.
 Plain was the hundred-streaming fount as penis: the jar
 poured forth libations to the Father.
meaning: कु॒म्भो व॑नि॒ष्ठुर्ज॑नि॒ता शची॑भि॒र्यस्मि॒न्नग्रे॒ योन्यां॒ गर्भो॑ अ॒न्तः । प्ला॒शिर्व्य॑क्तः श॒तधा॑र॒ उत्सो॑ दु॒हे न कु॒म्भी स्व॒धां पि॒तृभ्यः॑ ।।

text:
His face the basket, thence his head; the strainer his
 tongue, his mouth Sarasvatî and Asvins.
 The Chapya was his rump, his leech the filter, the bladder
 was his penis keen with ardour.
meaning: मुखँ॒ सद॑स्य॒ शिर॒ इत्सते॑न जि॒ह्वा प॒वित्र॑म॒श्विना॒सन्त्सर॑स्वती । चप्यं॒ न पा॒युर्भि॒षग॑स्य॒ वालो॑ व॒स्तिर्न शेपो॒ हर॑सा तर॒स्वी ।।

text:
Asvins with both cups made his eye immortal, the goat and
 cooked oblation gave it keenness.
 With wheat eyelashes and with jujube eyebrows they clothe
 as ’twere a black and brilliant figure.
meaning: अ॒श्विभ्यां॒ चक्षु॑र॒मृतं॒ ग्रहा॑भ्यां॒ छागे॑न॒ तेजो॑ ह॒विषा॑ शृ॒तेन॑ । पक्ष्मा॑णि गो॒धूमैः॒ कुव॑लैरु॒तानि॒ पेशो॒ न शु॒क्रमसि॑तं वसाते ।।

text:
The sheep, the ram to give his nostril vigour. the immortal
 path of breath by both libations.
 By Indra-grains and sacrificial jujubes Sarasvatî produced
 through-breath and nose hairs.
meaning: अवि॒र्न मे॒षो न॒सि वी॒र्या॑य प्रा॒णस्य॒ पन्थ॒मृतो॒ ग्रहा॑भ्याम् । सर॑स्वत्युप॒वाकै॑र्व्या॒नं नस्या॑नि ब॒र्हिर्बद॑रैर्जजान ।।

text:
The hull for strength made Indra's form: the immortal
 bearing for both his ears by two libations.
 Barley and sacred grass composed his eyebrows: from his
 mouth came the jujube and sweet honey.
meaning: इन्द्र॑स्य रू॒पं वृ॑ष॒भो बला॑य॒ कर्णा॑भ्याँ॒ श्रोत्र॑म॒मृतं॒ ग्रहा॑भ्यां । यवा॒ न ब॒रिर्भ्रु॒वि केस॑राणि क॒र्कन्धु॑ जज्ञे॒ मधु॑ सार॒घं मुखा॑त् ।।

text:
Hair of the wolf was on his waist and body: the beard upon
 his face was hair of tigers.
 Lions hair were his locks, for fame and beauty, worn on
 his head, his crest and sheen and vigour.
meaning: आ॒त्मन्नु॒पस्थे॒ न वृक॑स्य॒ लोम॒ मुखे॒ श्मश्रू॑णि॒ न व्या॑घ्रलो॒म । केशा॒ न शी॒र्षन्यश॑से श्रियै॒ शिखा॑ सिँ॒हस्य॒ लोम॒ त्विषि॑रिन्द्रि॒याणि॑ ।।

text:
